Welcome to Holly Hobbie & Friends - Fashion Party! Get ready for a stylish adventure with Holly and her best friends! Enjoy 6 fun-filled creativity centers with over 20 different fashion activities! Design clothing, dress up in the latest fashion, create your own unique look, visit the spa and have a party! Holly & Friends Fashion Fun Meet Holly, Amy, and Carrie! Design fabulous clothes for Holly and her friends in the Fashion Design boutique! Create unique outfits by choosing colors, styles, buttons and stickers for their clothes! Dress Up Time with Holly Hobbie It’s time for a fashion party! Select from a stunning variety of fashion items, like dresses, shoes, jewelry, accessories and more to dress up Holly and her friends. Show off your personal flare and style them your way! Holly & Friends Spa Day Head to the Spa with Holly and her friends! Pamper them with relaxing treatments like special steam, eye masks, face cream, and more! Enjoy your spa experience and get ready for a magnificent makeover! Marvelous Makeup with Holly Hobbie Use fun makeup like eye shadow, lipstick and blush in the Makeup Salon! You can also choose from tons of different hairstyles to make Holly & her friends look extra beautiful! Holly Hobbie Card Designer Take a picture with Holly and her friends! Design cards with stickers, frames, colors and more! Choose from 5 different themed backgrounds to make your very own Holly Hobbie greeting card! It’s the perfect place to record a personalized message for Holly and her friends! ★ Mobile Number & Phone Location enables you to know location of Incoming Calls, Mobile Contacts, Mobile Numbers & any Phone Number. ★ Browse your Mobile Phone Contacts sorted by locations (at Country/State/City level). ★ Block Calls and SMS from unwanted mobile phone numbers & Callers. ★ It will also show Telephone Operator of the mobile or landline phone number initially assigned to. Note: Mobile Number Portability(MNP) not supported ★ Support for multiple Themes ★ For all incoming calls, it also tells time of last communication with that mobile or landline phone number. ★ Following countries are supported: USA, Canada, India, United Kingdom(UK), China Note: This application will not show the actual physical location/GPS location of the caller. All location information is at State/City level only. PREMIUM FEATURES: ★★★★ Support for multiple premium themes ★★★★ No advertisements Landline and Mobile number series updated for India. Std codes updated for India with district information. All Area Codes updated for USA and Canada. This app will tell you location and not the Caller ID. It has many advantages over other Caller ID apps. It has offline support and works even without internet connection. FEATURES ★ Displays Location(Country/State/City) of Incoming and Outgoing mobile calls automatically on Call Screen Display. ★ Position to show Call Details Screen can be changed by dragging the Screen displayed on Call Screen while making/receiving Calls. ★ Browse PhoneBook Contacts sorted by Location (at Country/State/City level). ★ Displays time of last Communication with any phone number. ★ Notification about geographic location(at Country/State/City level) of Incoming Calls. ★ User friendly and robust User Interface for app navigation. ★ Trace/Search any phone number for its location. ★ View Recent Call Log/PhoneBook Contacts with geographic location(at Country/State/City level) ★ View Operator details for all Phone numbers. ★ Block Calls and SMS from unwanted phone numbers. Note:It will tell the Country/State/City of the phone number initially assigned/registered to and not the current location of the caller (i.e. actual physical location or GPS location or actual city while in roaming). For India, it will show at state level for mobile numbers and at city/district/state level for landline numbers. Use Case: 1.Trace location(city or state) of unknown phone numbers. 2.Browse your mobile contacts sorted by city or state. 3.Trace location(city and state) of any mobile and landline telephone numbers. 4.Block unwanted Calls & SMS. It's an ad supported free application.

description: Pocket Planets is a great tool to learn about the Sun and our 8 planets. Whether you're looking for some quick facts or complete comprehensive articles on a planet, Pocket Planets has got you covered. Test your knowledge of the planets in a fun and challenging quiz mode. This app is available offline, however, having internet will allow you to access even more information. Features: - Comprehensive Wiki Information Page for every planet - Quiz mode to help you memorize important facts about the planets - High Resolution Image Gallery of the Sun and Planets - Quick fact page on the Sun and Planets Planets that are covered: Mercury, Venus, Mars, Earth, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune. This app is completely free for a limited time.

description: 日本最大級の通販サイト「楽天市場」の公式アプリ！ 楽天市場の1億点以上の商品からあなたの気になるアイテムを簡単検索！ 【主な特徴】 １．サクサク動作で「商品検索」や「ランキング」等が利用できます。 ２．バーコードリーダーで楽天市場内の欲しい商品の最安値を簡単にチェックできます。 ３．お知らせ機能でお気に入りの商品の値下げ、再入荷などの情報がすぐ届きます。 ４. さらにアプリ限定ラッキーくじで毎日合計10,000ポイントが当たります！ 是非、アプリでのお買い物をお楽しみください！ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 【アプリ限定！6月はずっとポイント2倍キャンペーン実施中！】 ■キャンペーン実施期間： 2015/6/1（月）00:00～6/30（火）23:59 ■キャンペーン内容： 「楽天市場アプリ」からキャンペーンにエントリー＆お買い物で6月はずーっとポイントが2倍！ 詳細はこちらをご確認ください。 http://event.rakuten.co.jp/smart/campaign/point-up/app/always/ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 【サクサク検索でもう買い物にストレスを感じない！】 探したい商品をキーワード検索やジャンル検索でストレスなくサクサク検索できます。 スマートフォンのショッピングが今よりもっと楽しくなります。 【便利なお知らせ機能でアプリホームにお得な情報が届く】 ブックマークした商品の値下げや在庫追加をお知らせします。 気になる商品の値下げのタイミングを逃さずGetできます。 アプリ限定のキャンペーン告知も！ 【バーコード検索で気になる商品をダイレクトに探せる】 気になる商品をその場でピッ！！ 楽天市場で取り扱っている商品をバーコードから簡単に検索します。 【人気の商品は何？売れ筋商品ランキング】 気になる今の売れ行き商品は何？ 楽天市場では、1億点以上の商品から今一番売れている商品のランキングが閲覧可能。 各ジャンルや男女別など、様々なランキングも見れます。 【アプリ限定のポイントアップキャンペーン】 母の日や、父の日、バレンタインデーからクリスマスまで、大切な人へのプレゼントには楽天市場のシーズン特集。 人気アイテムがお得な価格で手に入れられるかも。 アプリ限定のポイントアップキャンペーンも実施しています。 【毎日挑戦！アプリ限定ラッキーくじでポイントゲット！】 毎日引けるラッキーくじで楽天スーパーポイントをゲット！ カワイイお買い物パンダがアニメーションで動きます。 【楽天市場では様々なジャンルの商品を扱っています！】 バッグ・小物・ブランド雑貨 スポーツ・アウトドア インテリア・寝具・収納 日用品雑貨・文房具・手芸 キッズ・ベビー・マタニティ 靴 レディースファッション 車用品・バイク用品 TV・オーディオ・カメラ 美容・コスメ・香水 おもちゃ・ホビー・ゲーム キッチン用品・食器・調理器具 ジュエリー・アクセサリー スイーツ・お菓子 食品 家電 メンズファッション 花・ガーデン・DIY 腕時計 ダイエット・健康 CD・DVD・楽器 ペット・ペットグッズ パソコン・周辺機器 本・雑誌・コミック 医薬品・コンタクト・介護 インナー・下着・ナイトウエア 水・ソフトドリンク ビール・洋酒 日本酒・焼酎 車・バイク 【楽天市場には季節ごとに様々な特集があります！】 バレンタイン ホワイトデー 母の日 父の日 ハロウィン クリスマス などがあります！ 【安心･安全なお買い物】 私たちは、お客様に安心･安全なお買い物を楽しんでいただける楽天市場を目指しています。 楽天市場は、個性豊かなショップがお客様に幅広い品揃えと楽しいお買い物体験を提供することを目指しています。 楽天は、お客様にどのショップでも安心・安全なお買い物を楽しんでいただけるよう、さまざまな取り組みを行っています。 http://event.rakuten.co.jp/smart/anshin/ ヘルプ･お問い合わせ http://ichiba.smp.faq.rakuten.co.jp/

Instant USB WiFi Tether Widget This widget allows you instantly share your phone internet connection (3G / 4G / HSPA / LTE) instantly with other devices. Instant USB Wi-Fi Tether works via USB and Wi-Fi. Does not require root access. Via USB it shares your phone internet connection with PC / Laptop / Tablet (Windows 8 / 7 / Vista / XP 64 / 32 bit), Mac OS X, Ubuntu, Fedora. Via Wi-Fi it shares internet with any Wi-Fi equipped devices. (Smart TV, Satellite receiver, Xbox etc.) For Wi-Fi tethering 3g / 4g should be activated in your phone. With Instant USB Wi-Fi Tether Widget you can turn ON / OFF your tethering connections instantly. Note: Make sure that your Android device supports tethering. Make sure that all of the necessary drivers (for tethering via USB) are installed and your devices are preconfigured for sharing. Do not need to install any drivers to tether via Wi-Fi. IMPORTANT: This application is home screen widget.  TO USE: Home -> Menu -> Widgets -> Instant Tethering Note: Android OS enables tethering by default, but some mobile carriers block tethering applications or cripple embedded tethering functionality, hoping to force customers -already paying a significant sum for mobile bandwidth -- on to more expensive mobile data plans. I am not responsible for payment to your mobile carrier.

SENSERE BIOGRAPHY Sensere, a gospel, neo-soul and rock band based in South Florida began their musical journey in the winter of 2003. James E. Wright, lll, formed the band. The group steps back into the past, but simultaneously are bursting forth into the future with a rock-infused soul-based gospel sound. The band’s music has a sprinkling of live horns, guitars, and shocking vocals to complete their total sound. Sensere’s style was created and inspired by the essence of true men and is one of the most authentic live sounds in Christian/Gospel music today. Sensere’s debut album, “Senserely Yours,” won over many supporters in South Florida. Their sophomore release, “The Soul of Future Worship, Vol. 1” CD is being well received in Chicago, Florida and other areas. Wright Sound & God’s Turn Records independently distribute the label and they are rapidly earning recognition and securing Sensere a spot as a tour de force in gospel music. Sensere received accolades from Paul Anderson of The Entertainment Bank. “If you enjoy top notch musicianship and off the hook vocals, you’ll definitely be impressed by Sensere’s new album. The group has an innovative sound that brings back memories of, The Mighty Clouds of Joy, The Temptations and Earth, Wind and Fire simultaneously, combined with the soulful vocals of Motown and Neo Soul. Sensere truly takes gospel to a completely new level with their unique brand. It’s excellent from start to finish”. This is a perfect example of what can happen when truly talented musicians and vocalists press forth to use the talents that God has given them, and they give it back to Him and His people with worship and praise. While their talent was undeniable, things really began to change regarding their exposure after collaborating with music veteran Eddie Pugh in 2008. Pugh worked with Warner bros, Casablanca records & film work and Columbia records and his keen eye for talent has helped other artist in the past rise to the top. Pugh’s connection with James Wright (founder of Sensere), stated, “Divine intervention connected us.” Wright’s talents are in his genes, he played with his father’s gospel band for at least a year. Wright also writes, arranges, produces, plays lead guitar, drums, bass, keyboards and does b/g vocals for Sensere. In 2009 Sensere’s new birth came through the recruiting of Brian Williams, Terrell Terry (vocals), Wildmayer Marcelin (guitar and sax), Darryl Efford (trumpet), Charles McKay (trombone) and John (John John) Robinson (drums).The original members Dwayne Charlton(vocals) and James Wright would witness this new era of Sensere. Wright stated, “Each of these guys are accomplished vocalists and musicians and could be perusing other careers. Nevertheless, all of them had the same vision as I, to trust God totally and put everything on the line regarding our mission. To touch as many lives and spirits as possible, to minister to people’s minds and hearts, and I needed a band that was willing to go all the way with me in that endeavor. We are partners in this journey, and everyone has input. Everyone is important; everyone believes in what we are doing and has a heart for Jesus. This is not about fame; it’s about hope and directing light to His people that He’s entrusting to us to deliver through song.” Wright is grateful that the entire band is on one accord, and it shows when they minister to the masses. Sensere recently performed at South Florida’s prestigious seventh annual “Jazz in the Gardens”, festival. They were the first gospel artist to grace the festival’s stage. When Mary, Mary performed at the Hard Rock Café in Hollywood, FL, Sensere was the featured guest artist. The months from June 2012, through August 2012 saw Sensere do television performances in Atlanta, GA, on Atlanta Live-Channel 57 and The Bobby Hurd Show, in Virginia, The 700 Club-July 13- and Turning Point International on CBN for the International market, airdate is November, 2012. Sensere taped the Bobby Jone

description: Packing List helps you to create and maintain packing lists. It not only lets user to create a list from scratch, but also allows you to generate lists from an existing one. This application comes with a pre-loaded packing master list. You can simply open the master list(or any existing list). Click on “Generate List/Mass Change” menu item. Check the items you want for your trip and you will have a new packing list ready in no time. You can group items by category, location and luggage. Each items also has note, quantity and weight fields. Mass change features allow you to edit lists more easily. You may also email and share your lists. Printing out a copy of the lists helps you in case of lost luggage. Key features include: • Pre-loaded master list • Create new list from scratch or generate from existing one • Support Multiple lists • Share/Sync lists between devices and users(full version with separate purchase of Packing List Cloud Connector only) • Reorder categories/items using drag/drop • Mass change for easy editing • Group by location/luggage for easy packing • Backup/Restore lists locally to/from SD card • Email/Share lists • Shortcut to particular list from home screen When you upgrade from lite to full version, you don't need to re-enter your data. They will be automatically loaded into the full version. Please check the help file for detailed information. ****** Important Notes (02/23/2015) ******* Due to storage security changes in Android KitKat+, lists are stored in external storage which is private to this app since v4.0.0. They will no longer be visible to the user. They will be automatically deleted when you uninstall the app. You must use "Backup and Restore" to recover your lists if you need to un-install/re-install the app or upgrade from lite to full version. Recent release notes: 2/23/2015 - V4.0.0 Change data storage location to application own storage Add local "Backup and Restore" Add "Mass Change" in "Group By Luggage/Location" view Allow edit list detail in list detail view Allow check weather in list detail view (full version) 8/15/2014 V3.3.3 Fix bug in entering unit/total weight when total weight is less than 1 lb Add "undo" bar when check items in "Hide Checked Items" mode Add quick change of location/luggage in "Group By Location/Luggage" view 7/9/2014 V3.3.0 Allow user to customize color of checked items Fix bug with shortcut not opening the correct list Fix bug with items not staying sorted in group by location/luggage Ignore case when sort alphabetically Add more options in Settings to improve usability 3/14/2014 - V3.2.4 Fix "Menu" not available in Tablet with Honeycomb issue Fix issue in sort manually Add master list in Russian and German Other bug fixes 1/27/2014 - V3.2.3 Add new languages - Russian and German Separate drag/drop re-ordering to its own mode. description: Finding a taxi in British-Columbia is now easier: in a few seconds, find a nearby company, call it and add it to your favorites list. Estimate the cost of your trip. Contribute to the list of taxi companies by adding it, if not already in the list. You can, moreover, evaluate a taxi company and post a review which will be visible by everyone. Key features : - Available in English and French - Add a company to your favorites’ list for quicker access - Estimate the cost of your trip * Please note: An internet connection is required to use the application (3G or Wi-fi). Taxi British-Columbia is available in the following cities: Abbotsford Burnaby Chilliwack Delta Kamloops Kelowna Nanaimo Prince George Richmond Surrey Vancouver Vernon Victoria … and more! Please see the complete list of cities in the application. If your favorite company is not listed, you can use the form in the application to let us know. * The estimated price feature is not a guarantee of the actual price and may vary depending on weather, traffic and other conditions beyond our control.

description: This app is designed to help you generate random Lotteries numbers from 1 to 49; Lotto 6/49, Lotto Max, Ontario Pick 3 and Pick 4 or any others games that required random numbers or you can pick your own numbers from 1 to 49. Under My Pick menu you can pick a Bonus number, Pick 3, Pick 4 and/or up to 6 numbers from 1 to 49 numbers. My Pick and My Numbers menu now allow you to send SMS/E-mail. This is a great feature added for you to send your picks to a recipient or your lotteries group to purchase tickets when you're unable to do so. The App is self explanatory. If want to keep track of you SMS message you can send Email to your email address. Link to Winning Numbers at http://www.OLG.ca website by pressing on Lotteries logo. Note: If your device only showing single digits, please reduce your font to smaller size. Don't trust Quick Pick Machine. METSOFT Lotto Numbers Generator could be your profound answers.

Word Bubbles for Kids is gaming fun for the whole family! Play with kids of all ages and help them to read and spell. And when the kids are asleep, enjoy a special puzzle mode for grown-ups! Puzzle modes: “Toddler”: Popping bubbles allows your little one to hear each letter of the alphabet and learn new words with a visual aid. ”Kid”: Helps your child to understand that writing and spelling is done from left to right. “Big Kid”: Teaches older children to write the words they’ve learned in earlier modes. ”Grown Up”: The mode for you! Diamonds Crush is a new highly enjoyable highscores puzzle game in which you must collect given number of diamonds to progress to the next level. How many diamonds can you collect? Submit your score to a global leaderboard to see who can collect the most diamonds! How to play: Put your finger on a diamond and move it to the neighboring diamond of the same color to create a chain! Longer chains give you better score! You have 45 seconds in each level, collect given number of diamonds to progress to the next level! Features: - global leaderboards included - you play against people all around the world - highly enjoyable game for all ages - great fun for the whole family - simple to play Powered by Dolby® on supported devices

Mantén un control de tu lectura diaria del libro 'Examinando las escrituras diariamente 2014', ahora sin necesidad de conexión a Internet en tu móvil. Descarga una sola vez y podrás leer durante todo el año. Características: - Marca cada día tu lectura. - Guarda aquellos textos que más te hayan gustado y accede a tu lista de favoritos desde el menú. - Puedes navegar entre los días con la botonera inferior, el calendario o haciendo un simple gesto para pasar las páginas. - Presiona sobre las citas bíblicas para ver su contenido. - Aumenta o reduce el tamaño de la letra para una cómoda lectura. - En el calendario podrás ver marcados los días de la conmemoración. Esta no es una aplicación oficial de la Watchtower. El libro 'Examinando las escrituras diariamente 2014' se ha recogido de la página oficial de los Testigos de Jehová (www.jw.org) a la cual le pertenecen los derechos de copyright de dicha publicación. Keep track of your daily reading of the book 'Examining the scriptures daily 2014', now without Internet connection on your mobile. Download once and read throughout the year. Features: - Make each day your reading. - Save those texts that you most have liked and access your favorites list from the menu. - You can navigate between days with bottom keypad, calendar or by a simple gesture to turn pages. - Click on biblical quotations to view its contents. - Increase or decrease the font size for easy reading. - In the calendar will see marked Remembrance day. This is not an official Watchtower app. The book 'Examining the scriptures daily 2014' is taken from the official site of Jehovah's Witnesses (www.jw.org) which belong to the copyright of such publication.

description: Galactic Invasion is an exciting new arcade space shooter game for the Android platform, inspired by classic video arcade game legends Space Invaders and Galaga. Try the free version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kresoftware.galacticinvaderslite While on patrol deep in space you encounter a fleet of alien invaders bent on conquest. Reinforcements are light years away and only you stand between the invaders and their advancement into Earth space. You alone must fight back this alien invasion force and rid the galaxy of this space borne menace. What users are saying: 5 stars. Reminds me of Galaga! I loved Galaga as a teenager. There is no telling how many tokens I fed it at the arcades. Galactic Invasion is more enjoyable… 4 stars. Space invaders on galaxy s-4g This is about as good as it gets when it comes to "space invaders" this is good old shoot em-up. It doesn't freeze, pause, etc,.. Includes the following features: - Two different ship control systems: o Tilt-based. Universal and simplistic controls. Simply tilt your device to move your ship left, right, forward or back. Tap anywhere on screen to fire. Hold and press to engage the auto-fire. Great for one-handed play! o On Screen Controls. Control the ship with an on-screen joystick and fire button for a classic arcade style experience. Configurable for right or left handed players. - 20 levels of increasingly difficult waves of invaders (15 levels in free version) - Options to change controls, difficulty, graphics, and sound allow for a customizable gameplay experience A limited free version of this app is also available: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kresoftware.galacticinvaderslite We strongly encourage and eagerly await any and all user feedback regarding our products. Please feel free to email us from either the link below or the in-game feedback screen regarding any comments, ideas, or issues regarding this app.

description: WEB BLOCKER PRO IS FREE NOW. Description: Web Blocker block websites, you don't need any special browser, this app will block all request to websites you block. You can use it as distraction blocker, so you can be focused on your work, or something else, it's up to you. + Block website that you don't want to see. + Most web blocking app use special browser, but web blocker is not + You can still using your favorite web browser. Require root access. Pro version features: + Password protect, so other people can't change the settings. + Time protect, so you can't change the settings for specified time (useful if you want to focus on something but always get distracted by some websites). + Icon hider, hide icon from app drawer and access the app from the dialler. If the website still not blocked, turn the internet off, and turn it on again. Still not working? contact the developer. Note: 1. the websites you block will stay blocked if you uninstall this app. so if you no longer want to use this app, make sure to remove all blocks first! 2. you can only block domain and subdomain, like www.example.com or blog.example.com, not a page such as www.example.com/somepages/here (credit to Gio Di Russo) 3. note that blocking example.com won't block www.example.com, and blocking www.example.com won't block blog.example.com. You have to define it one by one (sorry for this limitation). 4. Doesn't work on OPERA or OPERAMINI because they are using server side data. (credit to Mahabub Jitu) 5. I am not taking any of your data, this app doesn't have internet access permission, so there is no way I can do it! (credit to some jerk who said "this app is a scam!") 6. This app doesn't stack with apps that blocking ads (blocking ads is illegal anyway). 7. Does not work on proxy. If you use proxy, please exclude 127.0.0.1 a lot of 1* because people doesn't know how to root... how sad --"
release_text: * Now you can batch-add websites to block * Now the data retain on sdcard, so if you uninstall the app, the data still there * Free and pro version now share the same database

description: Subbr is Android application for editing and converting movie subtitles. You will never have to use your PC when it turns out subtitles do not match movie you are watching. Adjusting poorly synchronized subtitles is no longer a problem. You can validate and automatically fix detected errors by a single click. Finally save changes to selected format. Key Features: • Reading & writing following subtitle formats: TMPlayer, MPL, MicroDVD, SubRip (SRT), SubViewer 1.0, SubViewer 2.0 • Reading frame rate from associated video file in AVI, MP4, MKV format • Detecting character encoding • Built-in file manager • Automatic subtitles backup • Styling & coloring subtitles with one click • Editing texts with HTML tags • Validating and fixing faulty subtitles (PRO version) Ready to use on phones and tablets. In case of any problems with the application please contact me by sending an email.
release_text: 1.2.3 - Crash reporting 1.2.2 - Fixed crashes on Android 4.4.2 - Fixed no last subtitle in some cases 1.2.1 - Android 2.3.x support - Support for SubViewer 1.0 and SubViewer 2.0 - Subtitles backup - Changelog window - Display available and total capacity of device storages - Display folder size in properties window - New app icon - New title bar graphics - Redesigned folder icon - Few minor changes to the user interface - Fixed frame rate detection of MP4 files - Fixed charset recognition

description: Use our Dog Whistle application to train your dogs. It use different sonic sounds of high frequency (10 KHz - 20 KHz) Dogs can hear sound at higher frequencies than humans can. A dog whistle exploits this by emitting a high frequency sound to call to a dog. Many dog whistles emit sound in the upper audible range of humans, but some, such as the silent whistle, emit ultrasound at a frequency in the range 18–22 kHz. 1) best dog whistle 2) timer 3) run in background 4) installed to SD-card 6) totally free 7) tips how to train dogs 8) ++++ Some phone speakers are of poor quality. They could not produce ultrasonic waves. ++++ 9) no more mosquito bites 10) total dog whistle 11) best whistle sound 12) dog repellent 13) best anti mosquito repellent 14) dog games 15) dog and puppies sounds 16) anti dogs barking 17) sounds to annoy dogs 18) animal sounds ✔ sounds of the game ✔ sounds of the season A dog whistle (also known as silent whistle or Galton's whistle) is a type of whistle used in the training of dogs and cats. It was invented by Francis Galton; the whistle was mentioned in his book Inquiries into Human Faculty and its Development. In his discussion of his experiments to test the range of frequencies that could be heard by various animals, he notes that cats have the most all-round sensitive hearing, being able from a considerable distance to hear notes too high in frequency for humans to hear, and small dogs can also hear these notes, while large dogs cannot. The frequency range of a dog whistle is largely out of the range of human hearing. Human hearing is typically considered to be between 20 Hz and 20 kHz. A dog whistle is within the range of 23 to 54 kHz. Some dog whistles have adjustable sliders for active control of the frequency produced. Depending on the way the whistle is used, a trainer may simply gather a dog's attention or inflict pain for the purpose of behavior modification.

description: 【蒙恬筆】是專為 Android 手機/平板裝置所設計的中文手寫輸入法，提供書寫格及全螢幕書寫模式，讓您可以自在地手寫輸入中文、英文、數字，並提供候選字、聯想詞、常用符號、語音輸入及各種常用中文鍵盤等功能，大幅提高您的文字輸入效率及順暢性。 [超強特色] ‧辨識多種手寫文字，包含繁體中文(含香港字)、簡體中文、英文與數字。 ‧提供全螢幕書寫模式，讓您也能在小尺寸的手機面板上享受手寫的自在。 ‧在大尺寸的裝置更可以使用多字連續書寫模式來增加書寫速度。 ‧精準辨識潦草的連筆字等個人化筆跡，且不受筆劃順序限制。 ‧提供候選字、聯想詞、常用符號、常用中文鍵盤等輔助輸入功能。 ‧記憶筆跡與候選字關係，讓手寫系統越來越熟悉您的個人筆跡。 ‧提供手寫、中/英文鍵盤、符號表的快速切換，方便一連串中/英文、數字輸入的場合，避免繁瑣的切換動作。 ‧提供不同筆跡顏色、筆跡粗細等功能，可依個人的喜好設定。 [系統需求] ‧OS: Android v2.2 (含) 以上作業系統 ‧解析度：無限制
release_text: 20150528- 1. 新增表情符號 2. 其他問題修正 20150107- 1.修正-Google 頁面搜尋列, 輸入時,游標不會往前移動問題. 2.修正當機的問題. 3.修正UI操作問題. 如果您使用三星手機，預設輸入法由蒙恬筆變回三星輸入法時, 您可以參考我們的FAQ排除問題 FAQ：href=http://www.penpower.com.tw/faq-answer_f.asp?series_sn=84&product_sn=150&qsn=3690&m=18 如果您有任何意見，請來信給我們的客服信箱android@penpowerinc.com 以便加速為您服務，感謝！！

description: 集成大马主流华文报(星洲,南洋,当今大马,光华,光明,中国报...), 人性化的设计, 让您简单和快速的阅读各大大马报章, 即时掌握最新资讯！ 大马新闻列表: -星洲日报 (星洲 Sin Chew) -南洋商报 (南洋 Nan Yang) -当今大马 (当今大马 Malaysia Kini) -光华日报 (光华 Kwong Wah) -光明日报（光明 Guang Ming) -中国报 (中国报 China Press) -诗华日报 (诗华 See Hua) -华侨日报 (华侨 Oversea Chinese) -东方日报（东方 Oriental Daily) 大马新闻主要功能： -首创直屏(适合大多数手机)横屏阅读(适合Tablet,大屏幕手机Samsung Note使用) -智能清空过期新闻（无需手动清除过期新闻） -左右滑动屏幕阅读上/下一遍文章 -当前浏览新闻指针（返回新闻列表后您可以清楚知道所在位置) -已下载新闻内容图标显示 -缓存新闻(节省流量，下次浏览更快速) -管理新闻资源 -夜间/白天阅读模式 -调整新闻字体大小 -收藏新闻 -分享新闻 -设置图片显示(节省流量) 关键字: 星洲日报 南洋商报 当今大马 光华日报 中国报 诗华日报 华侨日报 东方日报 大马新闻 财经 大马报章 [Sin Chew] [Nan Yang] [Malaysia Kini] [Kwong Wah] [Guang Ming] [China Press] [See Hua] [Oversea Chinese] [Oriental Daily] [Malaysia News] [Chinese News]

description: Westpac Mobile PayWay enables your business to accept credit and debit card payments using a secure card reader connected to your smartphones or tablets*. Great for small businesses on the move that need the flexibility to take the sale to customers. • Accept card payments up to a maximum limit of $7,500 per month. • Automatic same day settlement to your Westpac account**. • Pay as you go - no minimum monthly fees (other fees may apply). • Compatible with most card types – eftpos, MasterCard®, Visa and American Express®***. • View your last 20 transactions. • Quickly email receipts to customers. • Assign multiple users to the one facility, each with their own password. How much does it cost? • Credit transaction fee – 2.4% of each transaction amount • Debit transaction charge - $0.30 per transaction • Card reader fee - $100.00 for each card reader All of the above fees are GST inclusive. Additional fees apply; see our Terms and Conditions. How to apply Apply using the app. All you’ll need to provide are details: • About you • Your business type and structure • An estimate of your average card sale • The Westpac account you’d like to settle to (account name must match your registered business or personal name) Need Help? If you have a problem accessing Westpac Mobile PayWay, try uninstalling and reinstalling the App or alternatively contact Westpac via, Website: www.westpac.com.au/mobilepayway Or call technical support on: 1800 029 749 (24 hours, 7 days) Things you should know: Applications for Mobile PayWay are subject to approval. Terms and conditions, fees and charges apply. Full details are available on request. This service is only available for Westpac Australia customers. Internet connection is required to use Mobile PayWay. Normal mobile data charges apply. Westpac Banking Corporation ABN 33 007 457 141 AFSL and Australian credit licence 233714. * Mobile PayWay is accessible on Android smartphones and tablets (version 4 and above). ** Applies to transactions processed before 6pm (Sydney time). Settlement takes place 7 days a week, 365 days a year - subject to system availability. Settlement must be to a Westpac account. *** If you want to accept American Express, you'll need to call 1300 363 614 to enter into a separate merchant agreement with American Express. MasterCard is a registered trademark of MasterCard International Incorporated. American Express is a trademark of American Express.
NixieWatch displays the present time on SmartWatch like a Nixie tube clock. This application is the widget extension of SmartWatch with LiveWare™ compatibility. [LiveWare™ extension for SmartWatch]

Oldies Music Radio is the best, free and personalized radio service that plays the best Oldies music you love. You can even customize and create your favorite radio station list. If you love Oldies music, you are in a treat. Install and run this app now, it won't disappoint you. Features: There are more than 100 radio stations. You can select your favorite stations and add them in a separate list You can also remove stations from your favorite list Long press any radio station to add to favorite. Also long press to delete any station from the favorite list. High quality music Even a slow internet speed is enough to run the radio station.

After the successful launch of The Phrasal Verb Machine, comes Phrasalstein, the definitive app to help you lose your fear of the horrifying phrasal verbs once and for all. This time around, our star is Doctor Phrasalstein who, with the help of his friends, will teach us 100 phrasal verbs using animations inspired by the classic “horror movie” genre, with a touch of humour and irony. You can find 60 of the 100 total animations in this first version of the App. The rest will be along soon in the next update and the App will, of course, continue to be free. Frequently, phrasal verbs have more than one meaning. For the examples we’ve selected, we’ve used the most common and well-known meaning for some while going with the more obscure meaning for others. In any case, you’ll always find an example sentence in English as well as other meanings whenever they are useful or necessary. What’s more, you’ll be provided with the translation in Spanish, German, Italian, Russian and French. If you liked The Phrasal Verbs Machine, we’re sure you’re going to love Phrasalstein. Have a “terrorific” time losing your fear of phrasal verbs!

description: "My Painting Book" series are starting with "Animals". Children learn animals and they also colour them. In this painting game, while they are figuring the bee, fish, owl, cat, turtle, butterfly, bird, parrot, rabbit, fox, bat and frog according to themselves, you can have a rest with the soft music at the back ground. Our painting book games will continue with new series. Painting games help children to develop their colour management and learn animals. Our desire from parents is to direct their children to colour in electronic form and draw on papers to develop their mental-muscle coordination. General Facilities of The Game: -Painting with a brush -Painting with a pencil -Detailed selection from color palette -Eraser function -Full clean of the screen function -Opportunity for sharing the painting in social web -Saving paintings in gallery -Zooming in-out the paintings Have Fun!

Zakupy internetowe na największej platformie handlowej Allegro. Od teraz na Twoim Androidzie będziesz miał mobilny dostęp do milionów przedmiotów w najlepszych cenach. Korzystaj z Allegro jak chcesz i skąd chcesz. Wypróbuj aplikację i przekonaj się jak prosto i wygodnie można kupować przedmioty na Allegro: • Aukcje internetowe, licytacje i zakupy w jednej aplikacji. Wyszukaj, kup i zapłać za przedmiot z poziomu Twojego telefonu lub tabletu. Możesz zapłacić przelewem bankowym online lub kartą płatniczą online. • Dwa tryby wyglądu - jeden przeznaczony specjalnie dla użytkowników tabletu, a drugi przeznaczony dla użytkowników smartfona. • Powiadomienia – o zdarzeniach w serwisie: wygranych, przegranych aukcjach, przebiciu oferty i innych. • Dostęp do Okazji Allegro - na ekranie głównym. • Podgląd - na przedmioty obserwowane, licytowane, ostatnio przeglądane lub kupione na ekranie głównym. • Wyszukiwanie - przeglądanie wyników wyszukiwania w formie zwykłego listingu lub trybu galeryjnego. • Kody kreskowe - wyszukiwanie przedmiotów przy pomocy skanera kodów kreskowych. • Filtrowanie, sortowanie i zawężanie do wybranej przez Ciebie kategorii wyników wyszukiwania. • Wystawianie komentarzy jako kupujący i sprzedający. • Udostępnianie - wysyłanie oferty znajomym na Facebook’a, Twitter’a oraz opcja wysyłki znalezionej oferty SMS’em. • Rachunki – sprawdzenie salda. • PAYU – przeglądanie listy wpłat. • i wiele, wiele, wiele więcej… Internet shopping at the largest trading platform Allegro. From now on your Android you will have mobile access to millions of items at the best prices. Enjoy the Allegro as you want and where you want. Try the app and see for yourself how simple and convenient you can buy items at Allegro: • Internet auctions, auctions and shopping in one application. Find, buy and pay for an item from your phone or tablet. You can pay online by bank transfer or by credit card online. • Two modes of appearance - one designed specifically for tablet users, and the other designed for smartphone users. • Notifications - about events on the site: winners, losers auctions, piercing the offer and others. • Access to Opportunity Allegro - on the main screen. • Preview - on items observed, auctioned, recently viewed or purchased on the home screen. • Search - browse search results in the form of ordinary Listing or galeryjnego mode. • Barcodes - find items using the barcode scanner. • Filtering, sorting and narrowing the selected category search results. • Exposing comments as buyer and seller. • Sharing - send Deals friends on the Facebook, Twitter will and the shipping option you found the offer sms. • Bills - check balances. • PAYU - view the list of payments. • And much, much, much more ...
release_text: Drodzy użytkownicy Allegro, z przyjemnością oddajemy w Wasze ręce nową wersję aplikacji, która zawiera: - usprawnione notyfikacje Dziękujemy za Wasze uwagi. Pracujemy nad tym, żeby aplikacja była jeszcze lepsza i spełniała Wasze oczekiwania.

description: Ukulele Chords Trainer Free (GCEA tuning) allows you to train your favorite chords. Can you remember the correct fingerpositions? - TRAINING : select a training and see if you can remember all the finger positions! - FIND CHORD: Quick find the chord you are looking for. - LIBRARY: Swipe through the library of chords. - GROUPS: Create your own groups of chords for your training. Please note: This free version contains ads and has limited functionality and chords (Major, minor, aug, dim, 7, m7, 6 and m6 are supported) For more chords, less ads and extra functionality please install the full version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dypodomys.ukulelechords

★ ★ ★ The best free wallpapers for your Android and Chat Messenger ★ ★ ★ No more boring message screen! Change your Whatsapp or Android face easily by choosing from these image galleries with a variety of themes like autumn, puppies, dew, beach, cities, sunset and much more. To change your Whatsapp wallpaper you just need to follow the steps bellow 1) Open Whatsapp 2) Select menu 3) Select wallpaper 4) Select this app to complete the action It was tested on Samsung Galaxy Y, Samsung Galaxy Note 3, Samsung Galaxy S4 Samsung Galaxy S3 and can also be used to change your Android background. To change your Android device wallpaper you just need to open the app and choose the image you want.

Tractor Farm City is a 2D physics-based racing arcade game. You need to use your skills to utilize both the gas and brake pedal when required. To win the stage is necessary to collect a number of coins and reach the end within the estimated time without flipping over. in some phases prevents objects from falling if the fall time lose -10 seconds. No permission required. We'll challenge you to get to the end! Thank you for your comments and stars!

En esta app encontrarás las oraciones cristianas de la Iglesia católica más importantes para que los puedas rezar siempre que necesites. Entre estos rezos se encuentran: - Padre Nuestro - Acto de contricción - Acto penitencial - Ángel de la guarda - Ave María - Credo de los Apóstoles - Credo de Nicea-Constantinopla - Examen de Conciencia - Gloria - Irradiar a Cristo - La Salve - La señal de la cruz - Magnificat - Oración al fallecimiento de un ser querido - Oración de la mañana - Oración de San Francisco de Asís - Oración para después de la Santa Misa - Alma de Cristo - Oración por nuestros seres queridos In this app you will find the Christian prayers of the most important Catholic Church so that you can always say you need you. These prayers include: - Our Father - Act of contrition - Penitential rite - Guardian Angel - Ave Maria - Apostles Creed - Nicene Creed - Examination of Conscience - Gloria - Radiate Christ - The Salve - The sign of the cross - Magnificat - Prayer to the death of a loved one - Morning Prayer - Prayer of St. Francis of Assisi - Prayer after Mass - Soul of Christ - Prayers for our loved ones

They don't want your body, THEY WANT YOUR BRAINS. You're a stuffed bunny and it's the end of the world. When you slowly catch onto the fact that your latest date is in fact, the newest member of the living dead, there's only one thing to do - run! ...or, should you hang around a bit longer? After all, this is probably the best a date has gone for you in a while. This choice (along with many others) are entirely up to you... Zombocalypse Now is a comedy/horror reimagining of the choose-your-own-ending books you grew up with. You'll be confronted with undead hordes, internet dating, improper police procedure, and the very real possibility that you'll lose your grip on reality and wind up chewing the carpets. The zombie apocalypse has never been this much fun. **FEATURES** •Includes all the interactive reading and gameplay features found in the previous Gamebook Adventures titles. •Read and dictate the direction of the story! Choose your own path to your impending doom! •Lots of achievements to collect and artwork to find throughout the book. These are placed on your achievement wall. •Hundreds of endings - at least seven of which don't include your horrible demise! •Full colour artwork along with new images specifically created for this edition - lucky you! Zombocalypse Now has been created using Tin Man Games’ critically acclaimed Gamebook Adventures Engine featuring: •Read the book horizontally or vertically on your tablet. •Artwork gallery. Find an illustration in the gamebook and be able to access it full-screen forever. •Bookmarking system which saves your position in the gamebook, much like putting your fingers between the pages to remember your previous page when reading the paperback! •Specially composed soundtrack and sound effects. Join Tin Man Games at www.gamebookadventures.com for lots more exciting digital gamebooks including the Fighting Fantasy series and Judge Dredd!

Flight information, indoor maps and weather information for London Heathrow Airport • 3 days worth of arrivals and departures information (yesterday, today and tomorrow) • Detailed map showing your current location within the airport, location of restaurants, bars, banks, toilets, shops etc. • General airport information (from Wikipedia) and airport news (from Twitter) • Facility to locate and book hotels nearby • 5 Day local weather forecast

description: 「智代アフター」は「CLANNAD」に登場するヒロインのひとり「坂上智代」と主人公「岡崎朋也」のその後を描いた作品です。 ゲーム内容は家庭用ゲーム機版と同仕様のストーリー展開で、主人公含む完全フルボイスでお届けします。 （ミニゲーム「Dungeons＆Takafumis」は収録されておりません） ご利用の前に、必ず以下の【ご注意】をご覧ください。 【ご注意】 ◆必ず後述の【対応端末】をご確認の上、ご利用ください。 ◆端末のアップデートがあれば、必ずアップデートを行った上でご利用ください。 ◆機種固有の問題点については【サポート情報】をご覧ください。 ◆購入後の最初の起動時にアプリ用データのダウンロードを行います。この時、端末の保存領域に481MB以上の空き容量が必要です。完了までには、良好なWi-FiやLTE接続時で十数分を要しますのでご注意ください。 【空き容量の確認方法】 空き容量は、本体の『設定』＞『ストレージ』から確認できます。 本体に最初から内蔵されているストレージと、後から装着したSDカードのストレージの２種類を利用する機種の場合、「空き容量」が複数表示されます。この場合、どちらかの「空き容量」が481MB以上であることをご確認ください。 なお、空き容量表示ページの最下段に表示される「アプリ本体のインストール領域」は、インストールしたアプリ本体が保存される場所の空き容量です。今回のアプリ用データ保存用の空き容量とは異なりますのでご注意ください。 【操作方法】 ゲームのタイトル画面で、メニューアイコンをタップするとメニューが表示され、「操作説明」を見る事等ができます。 なお、ゲームプレイ中にメニューアイコンをタップすると、「セーブ」「ロード」「環境設定」等が行えます。 ※メニューの表示に固有の操作が必要な機種について ・GALAXY Tab S 8.4 SC-03G, Note Edge SC-01G, S5 ACTIVE SC-02G, Tab S SCT21, Note Edge SCL24 では「履歴キーのロングタッチ」 ・isai VL LGV31, FL LGL24 では「タスクキーのロングタッチ」 ・Galaxy S6 edge SC-04G, S6 SC-05G, S6 edge SCV31では「バックキーのロングタッチ」 にてメニューが表示されます。 【作品紹介】 ◆ストーリー 高校を卒業し、町外れの廃品回収屋に就職した主人公「岡崎朋也」は、一人暮らしを始め、恋人となった「坂上智代」と楽しい毎日を送っていた。 そこへ、智代の弟「鷹文」が、「とも」という名の女の子を連れてくる。 鷹文が伝えたのは衝撃的な事実…ともが二人の異母姉妹である事、突然、父親に会いに来てしまったため急遽ここに連れて来たこと…を告げる。 衝撃を受ける智代。しかも事態はさらに深刻で、どうやらともの母親は育児を放棄してしまったらしい。覚悟を決めて、ともを受け入れる３人。 そして、もうすぐ夏休みに入ろうという頃、鷹文の昔の彼女＝智代の後輩「河南子」が家を飛び出し、二人のアパートに転がり込んで来た！ こうして、朋也、智代、とも、鷹文、河南子、みんなの夏が始まった。 ５人で過ごす、最初で最後の夏休みが…。 【キャスト】 岡崎 朋也…中村 悠一／坂上 智代…一色 ヒカル／坂上 鷹文…すずき けいこ／河南子…すずき けいこ／とも…佐々木 あかり　　ほか 【対応OS】 Android2.1以上 【対応端末】 対応端末は以下のリンク先からリストをご確認ください。 http://sp.v-motto.jp/sp/model_sp.php ※対応端末以外の機種ではご利用にならないでください。 ※最新のアップデートを行った後、動作を確認しております。 【お問い合わせ】 「デベロッパー」の「メールを送信」からお問い合わせ下さい。 【プライバシーポリシー】 本アプリは、個人情報を収集いたしません。また、情報を外部送信いたしません。 【制作・著作】 株式会社ビジュアルアーツ (C)VisualArt's/Key "Tomoyo After" is a work depicting the subsequent hero and heroine of one that appeared in "CLANNAD" "Sakagami Tomoyo" "Tomoya Okazaki". In game content storyline of home-use game machine version and the same specification, it will deliver a complete full voice, including hero. (Mini-game "Dungeons & Takafumis" can not have been recorded) Before you use, always refer to the [attention] below. The "installation area of ​​application body" displayed at the bottom of the space display page is free space in the location where the application body is installed is stored. [Works] ◆ Story Graduated from high school, hero of a job to salvage shop in the outskirts "Tomoya Okazaki" is started living alone, had sent the daily fun and became the lover "Sakagami Tomoyo". Thus, Tomoya, Tomoyo, Tomo, Takabun, Kananko, everyone of summer began. Spend in five, first at the end of the summer vacation is .... [cast] Tomoya Okazaki ... Nakamura Yuichi / Sakagami Tomoyo ... description: This application includes nearly 2000 carefully selected Islamic Quotes by eminent Islamic figures and the Holy Quran.

If a robot controlled by you fights with zombies, who will win? This is a 3D FPS game that is set in a ruined city. You should kill various zombies and boss monsters by controlling your robot. Are you afraid of zombies coming in flocks? Don’t worry. Your robot is basically equipped with many weapons like machine gun, guided bomb, missiles and napalm bomb. Also, you can use ammunition for your weapons without restriction. Whether you can kill all the zombies or not depends on your skill. Now, be the strongest Player. YouTube http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sLzk1JupKqc

Android version of the famous card game Buraco, played by millions of people worldwide. Choose the avatar you like most and play against other players online or against the artificial intelligence. Win to climb at the top of the ranks. Are you ready? The game is free but there are restrictions for FREE users. To unloick all join our VIP community. Features : - Single player mode, no need to be online - Multiplayer online mode with 2 or 4 players - Multiplayer with WIFI - Choose your favourite among 20 Avatars or upload your own. - Options for game speed and sounds - FriendList - Game chat - Online Rankings - Player Levels - Resume a Game if you were disconnected - Special Events - and much much more... VIP Features: - Unlimited matches per day - Clubs - Public Chat - PM with your firends Support us by voting our game ★★★★★ If you have any problem feel free to contact us! Due to the great number of Android devices please contact us for problems and we'll try to solve them as soon as possible with frequent updates.

Join Lola on her journey as she makes her way through a fun filled environment of bright colors, interactive characters and creative problem solving to get all of her friends to a party! Specifically designed for children 3-7 years old, Lola’s Math Train encourages children to learn key skills like adding, subtracting and puzzle solving all while having fun! What do professionals say about Lola’s Math Train? - WIRED: “I really like math", my six-year-old announced, Geekmom, Melissa Wiley - Famigo says: "5 stars! Cool" - It’s jeanette.com: ”By far the best app you could let your children between the ages of 3-6 play with.” - iMore.com: “Not only fun for your child, but also very educational” - The iPhone Mom: “Lola’s Math Train is another quality app from BeiZ and I have to say Lola’s friends are absolutely adorable.” Key Features: o Nineteen exciting mathematics games with Lola Panda™ o Various levels to choose from o Advancing difficulty as children’s skills improve o Child friendly usage experience: No in-app purchases or third party advertising o LOLA PANDA™ Progress Tracker keeps you updated on your child's progress. Available in languages: English, Danish (dansk), Dutch (Nederlands), Finnish (suomi), French (français), German (Deutsch), Korean, Norwegian (norsk), Russian (русский), Swedish (svenska), Spanish (español) and Japanese. Lola’s Math Train encourages children to learn mathematical key skills like adding, subtracting and puzzle solving all while having fun! While playing the games child becomes more associated with numbers and counting. As the child’s skills improve, the games gets more challenging, but still manages to be fun and engaging! This must be one of the best ways to teach children how to add and subtract. Check out also our other popular educational Lola Panda games and apps for kids: - Lola's ABC Party - I Spy with Lola - Lola's Alphabet Train - Lola's Beach Puzzle - Lola's Fruit Shop Sudoku All the best Lola Panda games and apps you can find from www.lolapanda.com. ***************************************** FOLLOW Lola Panda on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lola_Panda LIKE Lola Panda on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/lolapanda

description: The only ANT+ patch on the market worked on Nexus5, Nexus 6, Nexus 10, HTC_One (M7), LG G2. Samsung S4 Active "ROOT" IS REQUIRED! Enable built-in ANT+ hardware on your phone. Supports Android 4.2.2 ~ Android 5.1 10-days money back guarantee, no questions asked! Require rooted device and superuser app to install and uninstall. Requirement: - Bluetooth radio with ANT+ feature - BT Patcher app - Root permission and super user app for BT Patcher app - Nexus 5, Nexus 6, Nexus10, HTC One (M7), LG G2, Samsung S4 Active - "S-OFF" for stock HTC One (M7) build Highlight: - Work together with Bluetooth - Root permission NOT required to run ANT+ app after ANT+ enabled - Support Supersu cleanup and unroot. Root permission can be permanently removed after ANT+ enabled. - New 'Runtime firmware patch' in option menu. If ANT+ firmware patch required for the device, it auto loads ANT+ firmware at connecting and restores orignal Bluetooth firmware after connection closed. - Enable/Disable ANT+ anytime you want - Compatible with android OTA upgrade - Easy to uninstall - Reported by users, it also worked on Samsung Galaxy_Note3, Galaxy_S4 Google Play Edition, LG G3(model F400K) - 10-days no questions asked refund policy Known issues: - Great news! Thanks for the generous support from offical ANT+ developer of ANT Radio Service. The 3rd party ANT adapter providers issue has be fixed in ANT Radio Service 4.12.0. Android 5.0 starts to enforce explicit intent package name for binding 3rd party service. It will take me some time to work out a long term solution. - Endomondo requires to install ANT+ USB Service to detect ANT+ on your phone - ANT+ and LG G2 FM Radio cannot work at same time. ANT+ needs to be disabled before turning on FM Radio. Or you can enable "Runtime firmware patch" option - Some customized ROM builds might not work - Other models of LG G3 not work - You might need to restart the phone once after installation or update. If you are still using 2.0 beta version. please uninstall BT Patcher beta before updating to v2.05. Thank you all for taking time on v2.0 beta testing. Many issues have been found and fixed by your great effort! If you have any issues and need support or just want refund, please email me first. Writing a negative review won't help much. I cannot support or refund you without email address and order # Review feedback: It seemed people complained about the price and some even go further to undercut my hard work. Please allow me to explain. This is no simple task. It's not a simple configuration tool that turns on couple of system switches and copy over some files from other phones as many tried and failed. No sir, if it were that easy, you'd find the solution all over the Internet long time ago. It's about 4 months hard work and many days until 2am in the morning. It's about 10000 lines of JAVA and C++ code to create the driver for ANT+ and patch for Bluetooth stack. As for the price, I'd say you saved money and hassle from buying ANT+ usb adapter. Just consider the guy worked hard and did fix a problem of your phone. In return, you treat him a decent lunch.
release_text: Now support Nexus 5, Nexus 6 on android 5.0!

description: 일곱 개의 조각으로 뚝딱뚝딱 만드는 신기한 칠교놀이가 스마트폰(태블릿) 앱으로 탄생했습니다. 칠교놀이에 사용되는 나뭇조각은 사방 10cm쯤 되는 나무판을 직각삼각형 큰 것 2개, 중간 것 1개, 작은 것 2개 그리고 정사각형과 평행사변형을 각각 1개씩으로 나눈 것입니다. 칠교라는 이름 또한 조각이 7개여서 붙여진 이름이며, 이 조각으로 여러 가지 형태를 만들다 보면 창의력과 사고력이 쑥쑥 자라는 것을 느낄 수 있습니다. 깨비키즈 칠교놀이는? * 모양틀에 칠교조각을 채워 모양을 완성하는 과정에서 한 차원 높은 사고능력을 기르고 창의적인 아이디어를 지닌 어린이로 성장해 갈 수 있습니다. * 사물의 구조를 빠르게 이해하는 순간 판단력을 기를 수 있습니다. * 남녀노소를 불문하고 때와 장소에도 구애를 받지 않는 창의놀이입니다. * 설정에서 자신에게 맞는 조작방법(버튼조작/ 핸들러)을 선택할 수 있어요. * 스토리 모드는 정해진 소재를 다양한 모양으로 만들어볼 수 있어요. * 도전 칠교는 여러 가지 모양의 칠교를 연속적으로 만들어볼 수 있으며, 스스로 실력을 테스트해볼 수 있어요. www.kebikids.com ---- 개발자 연락처 : 1588-7930 Pick whip pick whip to create seven pieces of miraculous play chilgyo Smartphones (tablet) app was born. Chilgyo used to play that piece of wood about 10cm wooden board everywhere Two right-angled triangle is greater, will be the middle one, two small And one each square and a parallelogram is divided into. The name also 7 chilgyo piece blow was named, and Make two pieces when many forms of creativity and thinking ability Growing grow can feel. Chilgyo kkaebi kids play? * Shape framework chilgyo pieces to complete the look filled with a higher level thinking skills in the process of raising  As children grow up with creative ideas can go. * The moment quickly understand the structure of things can develop hand-eye coordination. * Time and place for all ages and do not get stuck to the window play. * Set the operation himself in the right way (button operation / handlers) have to choose. * Story mode creates a certain material into a variety of shapes I can see. * Challenge chilgyo chilgyo the multiform made continuously visible, and I can try for yourself and test your skills. www.kebikids.com

Find exactly what you're looking for, faster Easily find the information you need when you're on the go. The new minimalist design places the focus on your results so you can get the information you need in an instant. Favourite features • Get instant suggestions as you type with Search Assist. • Go hands-free with Voice Search. • Find local results faster with combined map and list view (US only). Helpful tips • Swipe right to toggle between web, image and video results. • Clear your search history and set Safe Search preferences in Settings. • Refine your query by tapping the arrows next to keyword suggestions.

It’s fast and easy to make prints, photo books, greeting cards and more anytime, anywhere right from your smartphone with the My KODAK MOMENTS app! And the new Tell My Story feature lets you create and share short, three-picture videos with your voice-over. Print your mobile photos in exciting new ways • Create and order photo prints and photo gifts directly from your smartphone • Pickup in store same day or have products mailed to your home • Choose from hundreds of photo greeting cards • Order prints up to 8x10” • Create even more in store by safely and securely connecting your smartphone to a KODAK Picture Kiosk via Wi-Fi Create a video with your picture and voice • Select any three pictures from your phone • Record a story of your photos – for added fun have kids record too • Perfect for sharing with family and friends via messaging or FACEBOOK • Your stories are saved in the app, or you can save to your phone Compatible with Android devices running OS4.1x and greater WiFi enabled KODAK Picture Kiosks are available at KODAK Express and selected Tesco stores. Once you download the app, you can access the app store locator to find a retailer near you or you can visit the store locator at: www.kodak.co.uk/go/findakiosk Get started by downloading the free app. *Internet connectivity required ------ My KODAK MOMENTS tracks usage of different app functions in order to deliver the best user experience available. By using the app, you are agreeing to the placement of performance cookies on your device. You can easily turn off tracking in the set up menu by unchecking the "Allow Cookies" checkbox.

description: 子供向けの人気動画がいっぱい！ 子供用ホームアプリこどもモードで人気の動画コーナーを手軽に使える形にしました。 教育用/知育動画有り、豊富な動画が見放題！ YouTubeフィルターで、子供向けの適切なビデオ動画のみを表示します。 このアプリでは、スマホ・タブレット上で(1)“子どもに見せても良い動画”の選択(2)“利用時間タイマー”の設定が可能になります。 子供にスマホを利用させるうえで、赤ちゃんや子供が使用するモードでは、危険な動画は表示されません。タイマー設定で決められた時間を過ぎるとアラームが鳴り、スマホの利用が制限されます。 ■機能１ ＜２つのモードの切り替え機能＞ １．「おとなモード」（パパママモード） 保護者が、こどもモードに表示する動画を設定します。 ２．「こどもモード」 子供が、おとなモードで許可された動画やアプリのみを使用できるモードです。 ■機能２ ＜安心機能＞ 「安心ムービー」（YouTubeフィルター） こどもに相応しくない動画やこどもが怖がる動画を排除した、「動物/ペット」、「乗り物」、「知育・教育」、「テレビ番組」、など、様々なジャンルの動画と、おとなモードで保護者が選択した動画が閲覧可能。広告や他の動画は表示されません。 豊富な動画がありますので、知育教材としてご利用いただけます。 音楽（童話、童謡）、こども図鑑（電車、飛行機、動物、魚等）、子守歌、えいご歌や英語のアニメその他幼児向け動画多数提供中です。ふなっしーや小っちゃいおっさん等のゆるキャラも追加しました。 おとなモードのムービーから、こどもモードで表示する動画は編集できます。 音楽動画を追加すれば、音楽プレーヤーとして、どうぶつえんの動画を追加すれば動物図鑑と言うように、設定次第で色々な使い方が可能です。 アプリ内の表記は極力漢字ではなくひらがなを使用しています。 こどもテレビでは、お父さんお母さんが許可した動画以外をブロックします。 ■充実の人気子供用動画（赤ちゃんから小学生までのこども用テレビ/ビデオ） 人気のアニメや歌、絵本、絵描き歌だけでなく、おやこで一緒に楽しめる知育系、折り紙、警察のパトカー/消防車両/バス等の乗り物図鑑、さかな等の名前が分かる魚図鑑等も提供中です。お出かけの車の中でもずっと楽しめます。 2歳でも遊べる無料アプリ ■お父さんお母さん向け注意事項 ・親子でご利用されることを推奨しております。一緒にあそぼと声を掛けてください。 ・動画はyoutubeにて削除または再生が制限された場合、こどもモードからも削除されます。ただし、お気に入りに設定されているものについては、お父さんお母さんがおとなモードから削除する必要があります。 ■対象年齢 0歳から12歳（赤ちゃん・幼児向けアプリ（ようじむけあぷり）です。） 特に1歳、2歳、3歳、4歳、5歳むけの動画を充実させています。 お父さん、お母さんが、お子様に合わせて動画を追加、削除することで、小さい子から小学生以上でも適切にお使いいただけます。 親子で、寝る前のひと時に是非ご利用ください。 おすすめムービーやランキングを追加しました。 ■こどもモードシリーズ こどもモードは、小さい子達の思考能力や感性を伸ばすことを目的とした知育アプリブランドです。 ■最近のトピック 間違い探しをおもしろムービに追加しました。 アンパンマン、プリキュア、トミカ、歯磨きじょうずかな追加しました。 寝かしつけ等育児のサポートに赤ちゃんが寝る音や子供が眠くなる音、夜泣きや眠れないとき、泣き止む動画が人気です。 of the popular children's movie is full! description: Apply the theme to transform your background screen, icon and launcher widget :D * How to apply a theme - Install Dodol Launcher (if you haven’t yet). >> http://dodol.naver.com/launcher - Press the home button and set the Dodol Launcher as the default home launcher by selecting [Use as default value for this task] or [Always]. - Open the launcher menu by swiping the home screen upwards, select the [Theme] menu, them select and apply the theme of your choice. * Why Dodol Launcher is so special - Cute, simple, vibrant, sophisticated, cuddly and warm themes are continuously updated. - The default widget offers convenient functions, including quick switch and memory cleaner - App/widget can be used easily with the dock and alert shortcut list. - Offers functions that can be used to decorate fonts / ring tones / keyboards - Offers detailed functions for screen rotation / individual icons / folders etc… - Supports functions in a convenient and stable manner by copying the home screen and creating backups of settings ** Precaution - Is available only in Android ver. 4.0.2 and above (ICS, Jellybean) - Some function cannot be applied in certain devices. * Customer Support - Contact : http://m.help.naver.com/serviceMain.nhn?falias=mo_launcher_app&type=faq - Official blog : http://dodolhome.blog.me - Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/dodolhome

Check out this cool new HD wallpaper for all Japanese anime and manga comics fans! Sharingan Live Wallpaper brings you mystical black and red background pictures of the Great Eye! Japanese combat techniques have always been inspiration for comics and this one is known as Heaven’s eye. Decorate your smartphone screen with fantastic Sharingan HD pictures and show your uniqueness! Its design will leave you mesmerized with mysterious black and red images. Become a master of martial arts without any physical contact by downloading this new stunning Great Eye background pictures now, for free. - Cool 3D live wallpaper for smartphones - Amazing Sharingan HD images for your screen - Social share button and more - Incredible HD graphics with full support for home - screen switching and landscape mode - Motion of light and flashes changes with time - There are several fantastic Sharingan background themes waiting for you! - Sharingan Live Background fits perfectly on both tablet devices and smartphones and it fully supports horizontal orientation - This live wallpaper app has optimized Battery Usage and it will sleep when you phone is inactive, so it won’t drain your battery - Compatible with 99% mobile phone and tablet devices - Choose your favorite background wallpaper for free! Sharingan Live Wallpaper is an amazing abstract app for Android™ and Samsung Galaxy that brings you unique experience of Japanese combat technique used mostly by the Uchiha clan members who have the ability to defeat the opponent through genjutsu with only eye contact. They use hypnosis to suggest thoughts and actions with the power of the Great Eye. With this cool wallpaper you have the chance to master both Sharingan’s abilities. One is the Eye on Insight, and the other is the Eye of Hypnotism. You too will be hypnotized with mesmerizing black and red swirls of the Eye! Sharingan background wallpaper will make your phone look super cool with exciting images of magic eye, also known as Mirror Wheel Eye. Follow the flow of chakra and feel the immense power of the traditional Japanese martial arts. It enables you to predict your opponent’s thoughts and actions and act accordingly. Seriously, the new Sharingan Live Wallpaper is the coolest app you can have right now! Your friends will envy you, and your opponents will be scared of you! With this useful background app you will memorize ninjutsu, genjutsu, and taijutsu! Become a true master of this mystical martial technique! Sharingan LWP will hypnotize you with swirled blades of the red and black eye. If you are a fan of Japanese anima and manga comics this is definitely the best abstract wallpaper app for you! Explore various Japanese combat techniques and find out why this one is the most popular! The Eye of Insight and the Eye of Hypnotism give you the power to read your opponent’s mind and to control his thoughts and actions. Exciting, isn’t it?! Who wouldn’t want to have this fantastic ability? The immense power of the Uchiha clan will help you find your inner strength you haven’t even been aware of. Imagine you live a life of the Naruto manga and experience the mightiness of the great red eye! Don’t hesitate! The Sharingan Eye is ready for download right now! Get the amazing Sharingan Live Wallpaper right away, completely free of charge and become the master of this mystical combat technique! *Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. * This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Samsung.

There are many calculators in use these days, but the fact is either that they are too complex making it hard for common man to use or they are too simple making it ineffective. This current calculator is a perfect-to-use one with required features in such a way that it is never a jargon to simple users.This android calculator's view is similar to that of Windows XP calculator. Some of the key features are: ** Display shows all the calculations done currently along with the answer. ** Currently stored memory value is also shown in the display. This serves an additional purpose such that the value stored in the memory need not be remembered by the user, as it will be shown in the display throughout.

★★★ Important Announcement ★★★ We now offer an All-in-One Pack, which includes access to the full versions of all of Intellijoy's existing and future apps and comes with a free 7-day trial. Get it here: https://www.google.com/url?q=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.intellijoy.pack This lite version of Kids ABC Letters contains three out of the six activities contained in the paid version. Followed by Kids ABC Trains, Kids ABC Phonics, Kids Learn to Read, and Kids Sight Words, Kids ABC Letters is the first app in our Reading Curriculum Series. Intended for children 3 to 7, this delightful game invites preschool-aged children to listen and learn the ABCs in ways that enchant them. With Kids ABC Letters, your preschool-aged kids will learn the alphabet letter names and will practice letter shapes, letter recognition, and finding letters in context. Kids ABC Letters does not teach your kids the phonetic sounds that the alphabet letters actually make. Knowing how the alphabet letters are pronounced is a separate educational goal, which is covered in a separate app, called Kids ABC Phonics. Including it in Kids ABC Letters would detract from the focus of this game and make it too complex to invite and delight children. The game has six wonderfully child-friendly sections. ✔ Naming Letters. A delightfully distraction-free way for kids to learn the name and the appearance of each ABC alphabet letter. Kids can tap on the letters to verify that they’ve learned the names correctly. ✔ Forming Letters. Kids get to practice remembering what the letters look like by sliding colorful puzzle pieces into place that make up the shapes of the letters. ✔ Recognizing Letters. Children get to play a fun game where they help the cat catch fish with alphabet letters on their sides as they swim by. By the time kids are done, they know the appearance and pronunciation of the letters by heart. ✔ Identifying Letters in Context. This simple educational game teaches kids to recognize alphabet letters as they appear in words. As a result, preschoolers learn that words are made up of letters (full version only). ✔ Matching Upper Case to Lower Case Letters (full version only). ✔ Ordering the ABCs (full version only). ★ Hey, how did you take the top spots in the Educational section? ✔ Kids love our games. Parents love to see their preschool-aged children being both educated and quietly happy. Google noticed our great reviews and the fact that we focus entirely on delighting children through learning and then featured and promoted our apps. ✔ Our games are laser focused. For example, the letters game doesn't teach phonics, and the phonics game doesn't teach reading. We keep the games clean and focused but magically inviting and nourishing. ✔ Our games don’t feature fun at the expense of education – or education at the expense of fun. We also know games that are too complicated don’t involve and delight kids.
release_text: 2.1 - Bug fixes and improvements 2.0 - All letters (A-Z) are now available in the Lite version - Improved graphics - Improved sounds - Added a setting option to choose between letter sets - Full screen immersive mode (for Android versions which support it)

description: Expense Tracker is a simple daily expense tracking application. Allows you to monitor your spending pattern. Features: * Multiple Accounts * See all your transactions from last 3 months. * Graphs allow you to see you spending patterns. * Easy to backup your transaction history and view on your spreadsheet program. * Import transactions from a file. * Support categorizing transactions. * Supports all 170 ISO currency formats. * Auto fills last transaction details based on the category or description chosen. * Search transactions * Backup and restore TAGS: Expense,Tracker,daily,money,manager,monitor,finance

description: Niké je najväčšou stávkovou spoločnosťou na Slovensku s vyše 800 pobočkami a Šport.sk je najväčší športový portál na slovenskom internete, ktorý mesačne navštívi viac ako 600 000 ľudí. Vždy vám prinášame niečo nové. V spolupráci vám teraz ako prví v regióne prinášame aplikáciu ponúkajúci stávkový servis kombinovaný s online výsledkami, ktorý je prehľadne usporiadaný po hracích dňoch, vrátane tabuliek, štatistík a vyhľadávania medzi viac ako 50 000 udalosťami za aktuálnu sezónu. NOVINKY: Verzia 4.3.1 vám prináša tieto vylepšenia v sekcii LIVE: - nový filter pre zobrazenie zápasov podľa súťaže alebo podľa času - rozšírený prehľad pre zobrazenie viacerých zápasov súčasne - rýchlejší update kurzov ★ Vylepšená stabilita aplikácie! PREHLAD FUNKCII: ✓ intuitivne a jednoduche uzivatelske prostredie ✓ prehladne a unikatne zatriedenie udalosti celej aktualnej sezony podla sportu, krajiny, ligy a kola ✓ jednoduche online stavkovanie a live stavky ✓ interaktivny editor pre jednoduche a rychle vyskladanie vlastneho tiketu ✓ vysledky sportovych podujati vratane strelcov golov, asistencii, striedani a trestov ✓ livescore – vysledky prave prebiehajucich podujati ✓ ligove tabulky (celkove, doma, vonku) vratane aktualnej serie poslednych zapasov jednotlivych timov ✓ PUSH notifikacie o priebehu zapasu, vyhrach, stave uctu alebo roznych akciach ✓ prehlad tiketov a ich kontrola cez ciarovy kod ✓ osobna zona pre rychly pristup k Nike sluzbam a informaciam o konte s moznostou jeho dotacie ✓ jednoduchy pristup k osobnym informaciam zabezpeceny cez PIN kod ✓ mapa pobociek s detailnymi informaciami ✓ rychle spravodajstvo zo sveta sportu s dorazom na futbal, hokej, basketbal a tenis ✓ moznost pridania ligy alebo udalosti medzi oblubene polozky pre rychly pristup ✓ vyhladavanie vo vsetkych ligach alebo timoch Nike is the largest gambling company in Slovakia with more than 800 branches and sport.sk is the largest sports portal Slovak Internet that month visited by more than 600,000 people. Always bringing you something new. The partnership will now be the first in the region bring application offering Bet online service combined with the results, which is neatly arranged after playing days, including tables, statistics and search among more than 50,000 events for the current season.   NEWS: Version 4.3.1 brings the following improvements in the LIVE section: - New filter to show only selected matches according to competition or by time - Greater insight to see several matches at the same time - Faster update rate   ★ Improved stability Applications! Features Overview: ✓ intuitive and simple layout ✓ Overview and classification of unique events throughout the current season by sports, countries, leagues and wheels ✓ simple online betting and live betting ✓ an interactive editor for easy and quick yields unprecedented vlastneho ticket ✓ the sporting events, including scorers, assists, penalties and substitution ✓ livescore - results of several ongoing events ✓ league tables (overall, home, away), including the current series last game of the teams ✓ PUSH notifications about the game, win, account status or various events ✓ overview of tickets and their control over barcode ✓ Personal Info for quick access to Nike services and account information with the possibility of subsidies ✓ Easy access to the personal information provided via a PIN code ✓ affiliates map with detailed information ✓ rychle news from the world of sport while football, basketball and tennis ✓ ability to add leagues or events to Favorites for quick access ✓ search all leagues or teams

******** To be used only on Android 7'' tablets ********** ***Only for the following devices:- Samsung Galaxy Tab, Amazon Kindle, HTC Flyer, Nook Color, eNTourage eDge and Toshiba Folio Do you need a simple way to track your income? Do you want to monitor the status of income earned by your project? Do you need to track your small business income and develop estimates and goals? You may not need costly income tracking software to track your income. Income Tracker lets you do it easily, quickly. Most importantly, systematically besides being able to visualize graphically different sources of income earned against the allocated goals. The app not only lets you track the income earned, but also lets you save its details, so you can see and keep a track over time. Alternatively, you can locally save the details of your income. Understanding and improving your earned income has never been easier. Looking forward to hearing from you at enroll@tickervalue.com

Elegant, fashionable and attractive Polka dots live wallpaper with tons of customization to play with. ★ Dots Type ★ Aside from a plain circle, you can choose various dot shape that we provide. They are: Diamond, Seal, Star, 8 Point Star, Heart, Sun, and 4 kinds of Flower ★ Dots color setting and Alignment ★ There are two kinds of color that you can set: primary dot color and secondary dot color. You can determine how the two colors combined with the Color alignment setting (Row, Column, Diagonal, Surround, and Random, Palette). You can also set how the dots aligned each other (Diagonal, Grid, Group of 4, and Shift Diagonal). ★ Dots Size and Gaps ★ You can specify the dot size between range 50 to 200 and the dot gaps value between range -10 to 50 ★ Dots Animations ★ You can set animation style/sequence whether animated uniformly or by row, column, and diagonal. Set the animation speed of the dots within range 0 to 30. ★ Background Customization ★ Make your own background combination with setting for: - Custom background color - Background gradient mode (solid, linear gradient, linear gradient flip, and radial gradient) - Background pattern (6 available for now) - Custom Background pattern color and opacity ★ Setting Randomization ★ Confuse how to get interesting Polka Dots design? use this "Randomize now!" Button to surprise you! ★ Other Features ★ - Smooth animation - Portrait and landscape support - Tablet support - MoveToSD support - Future updates If you like an elegant, fashionable and attractive Polka dots live wallpaper, then this would be the best Polka Dots live wallpaper for you =) To open and setting up your live wallpaper: Home-> Press menu-> wallpapers-> Live Wallpapers.
release_text: Version 2.2: - add new color alignment options (row palette, column palette, diagonal palette, random palette) Version 2.1: - new setting for animation style/sequence (uniform, row, column, diagonal)

description: Doit.im is the smartest way to manage your tasks with the implementation of Getting Things Done (GTD) methodology. It helps you efficiently handle your tasks, whether you are busy executives or smart staff. We’ve redesigned the entire user interface to make it simpler and more convenient. The brand-new task view of Today and Next Actions makes our tasks more focused and organized. Features: 1. Synchronize your tasks with the cloud to have all your tasks in control. 2. Completely implement GTD theory. 3. Support multi-level views: goals, projects, tasks, subtasks. 4. Manually sort your goals, projects, next actions and contexts. 5. Edit a task just on its view page. 6. Forward tasks to your companions and track the status of the tasks. 7. Support the customization of your avatar. * Still use to do list? It's time to try GTD and enjoy the completely different upgrading!
release_text: [Fixed] The problem that the filter lists could not be showed right has been fixed. [Fixed] The problem that the tasks under the filter are in wrong order has been fixed.

description: Explore Montenegro is an application that promotes cities, cultural - historical monuments and natural beauty of Montenegro. User interface is available in both Serbian and English. The structure of the application allows the user an easy overview of the most important tourist destinations. Explore Montenegro je aplikacija koja promoviše gradove, kulturno – istorijske spomenike i prirodne ljepote Crne Gore. Dostupan je korisnički interfejs na srpskom i na engleskom jeziku. Struktura aplikacije omogućava korisniku jednostavan pregled najznačajnijih turističkih destinacija.

app_name: How to Train a Draco: The Game
description: Draco is simply is another name for the Dragon, the huge, mystical, magical beast from the fairy tales or the movies. Some people are trying to kill dragons in the movies, but not in this game. Others are smart enough to know, that the best ever mount are dragons, as they fly, they are powerful on it's own, and they are loyal. But your dragon is extremely selfish, stubborn, obstinate so to tame your dragon needs a lot of time, effort, luck and of course a lot of talent, so act as a main hero of a fantasy movie! Now it's your time, to be part of a Tale never told, a Movie never made, a book never written where people are not against dragons, where knights and nobles are riding this beasts up to the skies and their dragons help them on their adventures. Your 2 goals are the following: to train your dragon for the adventures of the future, and to tame it for being the best ever mount in the history of any tales. You have 2 choices: a road to immortality begins riding your dragon, or your road to oblivion begins not riding it. And who knows - maybe one day a movie or 2 will propagate your unmatched adventures and glory. Features: - Unique and exciting Dragon Controlling game - Google Play Leaderboards, Achievements - Meet with different and exotic challenges to improve your dragon - 5 different areas where your familiar could level up - Intuitive and easy control system - Lot of different skins - Beautiful, detailed, cute cartoonish graphics looking like a movie! - Collect coins, bonuses and different type of power-ups!
