description: Enjoy one of the fun and fantastic NEW song for FREE, and be on your way to discovering the rest. KIDS SONG MACHINE, the leading children´s musical application with more than 2,000,000 downloads, is back!! Kids Song Machine made the Education Top 10 in countries such as USA, France, UK, Spain, Germany, Japan, Italy, and Australia, among others. KIDS SONG MACHINE 2 –Around the World offers us a fantastic interactive tour through the most beautiful places in the world that will delight the smallest children at home. Kids will enjoy this fun musical trip complete with marvellous interactive elements. Because the best way to learn is by playing! KIDS SONG MACHINE 2 – Around the World includes 6 new songs: • USA: We’ll be singing around the world • UK: London Bridge is falling down • FRANCE: Horsey horsey don’t you stop • INDIA: The elephant walks • ITALY: Italy is where I want to be • CHINA: Under the Dragon PRINCIPAL CHARACTERISTICS: • Fun songs to dance, sing, or clap along with, etc. • Song lyrics to facilitate the learning process. • Interactive elements and sound effects that are activited by touching the screen. • Delightful, colorful graphics. • Easy-to-use for the whole family. Thanks for believing in Kids Song Machine! Enjoy your trip around the world! More info at www.kidssongmachine.com.

Touch Square is a fast paced game where the object is to touch the squares as they spawn. If you are not quick enough then game over. Sounds simple, but wait! Watch out for the deceptive circular "bomb" pieces, one touch and they end your game!

A new season means a new look for your sweet home! Are you ready to give to your special place a new fresh design? Imagine yourself chillin’ on a new sofa, having tea with your friends at a cool and modern table! It will be awesome and you will feel really amazing living in a new environment. How does the bedroom of your dreams look like? Is it purple? Or is it pink? Does it have fluffy little pillows everywhere or do you prefer lovely poofs around the room? Play this game and design the perfect room for you and your cozy dreams! We have gathered cool and girly beds, wallpapers, lights and plush teddy bears for you to arrange in this cute bedroom, so all you gotta do is to let your creativity work and to create the one bedroom you have always dreamed of! description: Dedaloop is a digital board game for the entire family. Find your way through six missions on an every-turn-changing maze. Play solo or with your friends (up to 4 players on the same device) in two fantastic, hand-drawn environment: a jolly-like pirates theme and a more geekish steampunk theme! Dedaloop is a light strategy game with some puzzle elements. The simple rules and addictive game mechanics make it perfect for family play or a relaxing solo session. All graphics and soundtracks are original and have been made from scratch. Each player has six object to reach. Only one object at a time can be seen; when you reach your current one, you can look to the next. The first player who completes the missions and comes back to the the starting point wins. Features - Never play the same game twice - Play solo against the computer - Local multiplayer - Up to 4 players on the same device with Pass'n'Play - 2 hand-drawn game theme

Buraco, Canastra, Burraco. Doesn't matter how it is called, what matter is that now this famous game is availabe on Android devices. You will be able to play a lot of the game variations: International rules, Italian Buraco Federation rules, Portuguese rules, or any rules variation you like. You can also create you own variation! Besides that, a lot of graphic options are available, such as: Background images, back cards images, animation speed, compact games on table (ideal for small screen devices), portrait or landscape modes. Game Characteristics: * 2 or 4 players * Clockwise or Counter-Clockwise * Three levels of difficult: Easy, Normal or Hard * Total points per game: 2005, 3000, 5000 or ilimited * Discard Pile can be opened or closed * Vulnerability option * Preset rules: International, Italian Federation, Portuguese variations, etc Rules Variations: * Allow/Disallow JOKER * Allow/Disallow Groups (same rank) * A-K or 2-A Runs can worth 500 points * Aces can be used before 2, after K or in both cases * Allow/Disallow A-A Runs * A-A Runs can worth 1000 points * Allow/Disallow Half-Clean Runs (Italian Buraco Federation) * Going Out Condition: Need a clean run, need a dirty run or no condition This game is a must have for all Buraco lovers!

description: A lovely room decoration game for little girls where they can apply their imagination and creativity. With 8 fantastic themes: Preschool room, Kitchen, Cupcake house, Princess bedroom, kids bedroom, Christmas room, kids bathroom and palace garden, this colorful app promises loads of free fun and cheer - perfect for girls in age group 4-9 years. Girls can juggle between so many options in the different themes as below: wall and ceiling color/wallpaper, mirror, bed design, floor color, window, lights, dressing table, rug, toys, frames, decorative items, utility items, outdoor items, etc. Features: * Hundreds of designs possible with the available options. * Zoom in to see designs in more detail. * Girls can save their creations in Photos and use them as wallpapers.

description: Jota+ is the best text editor for Android. Jota+ is easy to use. And have the great ability and great performance. For documentation, for programming, Jota+ provides the best experience of a text editing. ★features of Jota+ - Support multi-file feature. - Support 1 million characters. - Support many character codes and Auto-Detect feature. - Search/Replace (Support Regular Expression) - Highlight searching words. - Support font customize. (Proportional / Mono Space / ttf,otf font ) - Support Install-shortcut feature. - Auto save. - Show Line numbers. - Show Tab/Line-break mark. - Count characters/words/lines. - Customizable Toolbar. - Syntax highlight support many languages. (awk,X11-basic,css,c/c++,java,javascript,lua,Objective-C,pascal,php,python,ruby,sh,tex,xml,html) And it's customizable. - Customizable Fixed Phrase management. - Clipboard management. - Built in file browser with bookmark management. - Free Wallpaper by Non Miyabi. http://sites.google.com/site/nonsillustgallery/ - Detect file modification. - Support physical-keyboard devices. - Support Bluetooth Keyboard. - Safe app without any evil permission requests. - Support many kinds of Cloud Storage Services. ( Dropbox, GoogleDrive, OneDrive etc...) - Support multi window feature for Samsung devices. ★FREE version is for trial, so some features are locked. But you can use free version as a Text editor with sufficient capabilities You can buy PRO-KEY app from Google Play to unlock extra features. ★For donors of Jota Text Editor (with Google Play Store). The support for donors has been finished. Thank you! ▼Google Analytics and Mobile Ads are built into the app. Please confirm our privacy policy. You can opt-out Google Analytics. (see menu-preferences-misc) ▼Warning. We prohibit the distribution of Jota+ on places other than Google Play. It has been confirmed that the pirated app mixed malware has been distributed. And we do not provide support to pirated apps. Please be careful. ▼We don't reply to anything on Review Comments. If you have troubles or suggestions, send us an email. ▼FAQ Q. Can't save on external SD card. A. Android 4.4 (KitKat) or later doesn't support to write on external SD card. Save it on internal storage, or use cloud storage. Q. I can't find my file in file browser. A. Please check off "Text File Only" in side menu. Q. I bought PRO-KEY, but couldn't activate. A. Try following... Make sure that your device is connected to the internet and logged into Google. Confirm that PRO-KEY is installed in System Settings. Click Menu - Preferences - Activate PRO-KEY. reboot the device and start Jota+. uninstall and re-install Jota+ or PRO-KEY. - If you have troubles with the activation, please send an email to the developer. ▼About Permissions - modify or delete the contents of your USB storage - read the contents of your USB storage for loading/saving to internal storage. - full network access - view network connections for mobile ads. for Google Analytics (see privacy policy). - install shortcut for installing a shortcut of the file onto Home app. (c) 2012-2014, Aquamarine Networks.

description: Hunter's car is damaged in the middle of mysterious forest and mindless zombies are wondering everywhere! Pick up your Sniper Rifle and get ready to survival and defend yourself against incoming hungry Zombies! Try to test your shooting agility with this Sniper Game. It’s easy to learn but hard to master game! When you are battling in the land now owned by the dead you will meet tougher Zombies, so keep your skills fresh and stats high. Collect things to repair your car like hammer, nails, gas etc… Prepare yourself for a survival world you won’t forget... Game Features: *Hunt Zombie *Mysterious forest shooting landscape *HQ graphics *Lens focus for sharp shooting *Different missions *Amazing hunter abilities *Amazing Head shots *Lots of different hungry zombies *Fun for all ages *Realistic Survival Game Hunt those stupid wondering zombies from afar! In these amazingly detailed 3D environments you will find bloody fun and satisfaction!!

This is a neat word search game in which you need to find hidden animals in a grid. It has a huge collection of animals - ranging from the tame domestic to the wild wild ones. Various animals are arranged randomly and are "hidden" in a grid going in many directions, and your objective is find those animals. When you find an animal successfully, the app highlights it for you and you move on the next. It also keeps track of your score in terms how many animals you were able to discover in a puzzle. And what's more ... you earn REAL points (mPoints) that can be used for REAL rewards on retailers like Amazon etc.
release_text: - Even More Rewarding than before - Added a bunch of New Rewards ! - Fixed a Glitch in the Reward System

description: Easily manage text messages in a new and up to date format compliant with the Android design guidelines and visually based on the stock messaging app from Google, with added features. Features: - Easily switch between conversations by dragging out the sliding menu on the left side of the screen. - Start a new conversation by sliding out the menu on the right side of the screen - Manage old messages with a single click - Choose between 10 different themes or make your own from scratch - Emoji support (1300+ to choose from) - Google Voice support - Desktop messaging through Pushbullet - Android Wear support - Quick reply popup - Quick message templates - Light Flow support - Support for sending and viewing picture and group messages - Option to choose background images for conversations menu and message list - Custom animations - Widget - Individual notification settings - Contact blacklisting settings - Security settings - And so much more! If you are having problems receiving notifications, you may need to uninstall 3rd party messengers such as Go SMS. Please email me if you have issues before leaving a poor review and I will help you out with whatever it is. Credits: - Aaron Klinker for the icon - Jeremy Feinstein for his SlidingMenu on GitHub - Google for their stock messaging app off of which this app is visually based - Alexey Slavutsky for Russian translation - Felix Hopfer for German translation - Spadewalk for French translation - Antonio Porcelli and Enrico Speranza for Italian translation - Tobias Prahl for Swedish translation - Alireza Afkar for Persian translation - Kamil Wojtczyk for Polish translation - Yusuf Rende for Turkish translation - Cyanogenmod and Google for emoji icons - And everyone else who's contributed NOTE: Due to limitations of the Android System starting in Android 4.4, you will not be able to use your tablet for Google Voice support. It will only be possible to use Google Voice on a device that has SMS functionality. This is due to the new SMS API's included with KitKat and setting up a default SMS application, which can't be done on a tablet.
release_text: Version 8.60: - MMS fixes for Lollipop devices - Reworked scheduled messaging background - Force enable mobile data when sending MMS messages Version 8.53: - Bug fixes for Developer Tips in the Get Help section of settings Version 8.52: - Bug fixes for Android Wear Version 8.51: - Bug fixes Version 8.50: - Pushbullet integration for sending replies from a computer! - Android Wear support in anticipation for release this summer - Bug fixes

description: “Составь слова из слова 2” - это официальное продолжение одной из лучших игр для улучшения и расширения Вашего словарного запаса, тренировки памяти и мозга! Если Вы хотите провести время интересно, весело и с пользой, эта игра создана именно для Вас! Правила игры на удивление просты и гениальны одновременно: в игре ДВЕСТИ ЗАДАНИЙ, которые разбиты на ПЯТЬ уровней по СОРОК заданий в каждом. Для перехода на следующий уровень Вам необходимо выполнить все задания на предыдущем. В каждом задании Вам дается ключевое слово, из букв которого необходимо составить как можно больше слов. Варианты слов должны состоять из трех и более букв. Чем больше слов Вы угадаете, тем больше получите очков. Также за угаданные слова даются монетки, которые можно использовать для покупки различных подсказок, открывать первые буквы в словах или слова целиком. Цель игры - решить все задания и пройти все уровни! Возможности игры: • 200 интересных уровней • Стартовый капитал • Возможность приобрести монеты для получения большего количества подсказок • При покупке любого пакета монет РЕКЛАМА отключается автоматически • приятный интерфейс • соревнование за позиции в таблице рейтингов Game Center • постоянная поддержка и развитие приложения. По всем вопросам, связанным с работой наших приложений пожалуйста обращайтесь к нам по адресу: maxus.desing@gmail.com Тренируйтесь, играйте и получайте удовольствие! "Make a word from the word 2" - is the official sequel to one of the best games to improve and expand your vocabulary, memory and brain training! If you want to spend time interesting, fun, and with the benefit of this game is created just for you! Rules of the game are surprisingly simple and brilliant at the same time: the game TWO JOBS, which are divided into five levels by FORTY jobs each. To move to the next level you need to complete all the tasks in the previous. In each task you are given keyword, the letters you want to make as many words. Variations of words must consist of three or more letters. The more words you guess right, the more points now. Also for the guessed words are coins that can be used to purchase a variety of tips to open the first letters of words or whole words. The goal - to solve all the assignments and pass all the levels! Game features: • 200 exciting levels • Start-up capital • Opportunity to purchase coins for more tips • When purchasing any package coins Trade off automatically • a pleasant interface • Competition for positions in the league table of Game Center • ongoing support and development of the application. On all matters relating to the work of our applications please contact us at: maxus.desing @ gmail.com Train, play and have fun!

auナビウォーク for Google Play(TM)とは？ 】 auナビウォーク for Google Play(TM)は、現在地から目的地までの最適なルートを最新地図と音声&バイブレーションでご案内するトータルナビアプリです。 乗換案内や地図・スポット検索にも対応。初めての土地でも見慣れた街のように移動できます。 【無料機能のご紹介】 ★乗換検索 公共交通機関を利用する経路を案内します。 一部の地域（首都圏・大阪・名古屋）では簡易路線図からの乗換検索も可能です。 ★地点検索 全国の地図・スポット情報から、フリーワード/住所/カテゴリによる地点検索ができます。 ★グルメ検索 「個室あり」「飲み放題あり」など、お好みの条件を設定してグルメスポットを検索できます。 クーポンのある店舗ではクーポン情報も表示されます。 ★電車混雑リポート 近くを運行している電車の混雑状況を確認することができます。 また、自分が乗っている電車の状況を投稿して共有することもできます。 ★ショートカットアイコン 「現在地の地図」や「グルメ検索」などの機能をホーム画面に作成し、ワンタッチで検索することができます。 ※有料登録すると、「周辺のwifiスポット検索」、「現在地から自宅への経路」などの機能もご利用いただけます。 ★時刻表ウィジェット ホーム画面上に登録した駅の「時刻表」を追加することができ、アプリの起動なしに時刻や終電などを確認できます。また、サイズは2種類あるのでお好みのサイズをお選び頂けます。 ★リアルタイム降雨レーダー 直近1時間～50分先までの降雨の移り変わりを地図上で確認することができます。 【有料機能のご紹介】 ★トータルナビ 徒歩/電車/バス/飛行機/クルマなど、さまざまな交通手段から最適なルートを検索し、音声&バイブでナビします。 ★屋内ルート案内 地上から地下街を通り、ターミナル駅や地下鉄駅の電車のホームまでのルートや、電車の乗換の際のホームからホームや駅出口までのルート、地下街やターミナル駅の駅ビル内にある店舗への屋内ルートなどを表示します。 ★ARナビゲーション トータルナビの音声ナビゲーション時にご利用いただけるARナビゲーションは、端末のカメラで撮影した実際の風景上に、緑色の線や矢印で進む方向をご案内します。 ★時刻表検索 鉄道・バス・飛行機・フェリー等の時刻表を閲覧できます。（対応路線のみ） ★鉄道運行情報 鉄道の遅延・運休などの情報が分かります。障害が発生している場合には、迂回ルートが検索できます。 また、よく使う路線を登録しておけば、障害発生時にメールでお知らせします。 ★駅構内ルート案内 ホームからホームへの移動や、駅出口までのルートを駅構内図でご案内します。 大きな駅や、初めて降りる駅でも安心です。 ★途中駅表示 乗換案内の経路結果から停車する駅の一覧を表示することができます。あと何駅で到着するのか簡単に確認することができます。 ★ピンポイント天気/降雨レーダー 現在地や指定したスポット周辺の気温･降水量･天候･風向･風速を、1時間毎に48時間先まで、1日毎に1週間先まで確認できます。 また、1時間前～6時間先までの降雨情報を地図に表示することができます。 ■ご注意 ※最新バージョンのアプリは、Android OS 2.3以降に対応しています。 ※端末のスペックにより、アプリの挙動やGPS精度が低下する場合がございます。 ※有料メニューの利用には月額300円コース(税抜)の会員登録が必要となります。 ※すでに「auかんたん決済」もしくは「auまとめて支払い」で月額課金しているお客様は、Google ウォレットで会員登録すると重複登録となり、二重に月額費用が発生することがあります。自動解約にはならないため、ご自身で解約手続きをお願いいたします。 ※本アプリのプライバシーポリシーは、[TOPランチャー「More｣ボタン]＞「ヘルプサポート」＞「お問い合わせ」＞「プライバシーポリシー」からご確認いただけます。

The award-winning and bestselling MorphWiz has finally landed on Android as the fun and easy-to-use MorphWiz-Play! MorphWiz, the brain child of Dream Theater keyboardist, Jordan Rudess, and award-winning developer, Kevin Chartier, took the music app business by storm, winning Billboard's Best Music Creation App, the Best App Ever award for Best Music App, and an Electronic Musician Editor's choice award. Jordan uses MorphWiz on stage and in the studio with his prog-metal band, Dream Theater. MorphWiz-Play takes the deep synthesis and immersive visuals of MorphWiz and packages it into 30 custom presets programmed personally by the Wizard himself, Jordan Rudess. You’ll love experimenting with all of the presets, and you will be blown away by one of the coolest methods of controlling sound that you've ever laid hands on. Jordan states, “Our goal was to create an instrument that would allow the seamless morphing of the audio and visual domain while delivering a seamless musical experience. I believe the multitouch platform opens up a whole new world of creation for electronic musical instruments. MorphWiz features a totally unique pitch control system that is still uncharted territory in today’s musical instrument world. This is the heart of MorphWiz.” Here are some highlights from the onboard patches! Dream Machine - Slide through dreamy whole tone scales as the MorphWiz galaxy spins around your visual waveform! Axis Of Love - Get physical with your device and move it all around to add cool FM synthesis and special FX to your sound. Morphtronics - become immersed in an expressive melodic world where the sound echoes all around you. Rush Analog - The classic analog filter sweep comes alive in this patch which we dedicate to the spirit of RUSH! Morph Talker - Let MorphWiz do the talking and do watch your language as you slide around on the playing surface! The Spirit Carries On - There is nothing like expressing a beautiful melody on MorphWiz and this patch i personally use to enjoy playing our Dream Theater song, entitled "Sprit Carries On." C Blues Tilt - We provide the right scale and the sounds so all you do is have to rock out and remember to move your device around to bring out the cool raspy blues tones! Try turning off the Lock Pitch switch as well to get the slippery bends that you need to get deep into the Blues!

How many steps do you take each day? Count your steps with Runtastic Pedometer PRO for Android and find out how many calories you burn or what distance you cover each day. Start your personal step counter on your phone with just a click & take your first step towards a healthier future. APP FEATURES & BENEFITS: (limited in LITE version) * Automatic step detection (no matter where your phone is stored – pockets, purse, arm, hand) * Calculation of calories burned * Step counter calculates speed & distance * Step frequency calculation * Training and activity log incl. analysis * Overall stats of all your activities * Share your activities on Social Media like Google+, Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp and many more * Sync with Runtastic.com: Manage all data online * Users can save body metrics like weight and height for a more accurate calorie count Runtastic Pedometer and Step Counter PRO is the ideal way to track your daily steps and movement as the app motivates you to walk more, collect more steps and cover greater distances by foot. Our Pedometer app helps you reach the recommended 10,000 steps per day. Positive side effect: More steps and longer walking distances mean that you’ll burn more calories too! Take your first step today, download the Runtastic Pedometer PRO app on your phone and push yourself to a fitter, healthier lifestyle with your personal step counter!
release_text: * Fresh, New Design Runtastic Pedometer now boasts a lighter, simpler, more elegant for you. * G+ Sign In You can now sign in with your Google account. Start sharing your activities on Google+ as well! * Battery Saving Mode New, energy-saving step detection reduces battery drain.

CF, 뮤직비디오, 스포츠, TED, 애니메이션 등 매일 업데이트되는 다양한 동영상. 영상에 따라 최대 4개국어(영어, 일어, 중국어, 한국어) 자막을 지원. 단어장, 번역기, 문장 리스닝도 한번에 이제 쉽고 재밌게 어학공부하세요! 1. 매일 업데이트 되는 다양한 동영상 - 다양한 카테고리별 동영상이 매일 업데이트 됩니다. - 검색을 통해 원하는 동영상만 찾아 볼 수 있습니다. 2. 자막을 보며 어학 공부 - 영상에 따라 최대 4개국어(영어, 일어, 중국어, 한국어) 자막이 지원됩니다. - 추후 기타 언어도 지원할 예정입니다. 3. 사전, 번역기능 - 영상 플레이중 어려운 문장이나 단어는 번역기능과 사전을 통해 바로바로 찾아볼 수 있습니다. 4. 리스닝 기능 - 자막을 포함한 동영상은 리스닝 기능을 이용할 수 있습니다. - 음성인식을 통해 발음 연습을 할 수 있습니다. 5. 단어장 - 영상 플레이중 저장한 단어들은 단어장에 저장할 수 있습니다. - 외운 단어 / 못외운 단어를 구분해서 학습할 수 있습니다. 6. 문장 청취 - 영상 플레이중 저장한 문장들은 문장청취에 저장할 수 있습니다. - 공부한 문장 / 공부할 문장을 구분해서 학습할 수 있습니다. 7. 즐겨찾기 동영상 - 영상 플레이중 마음에 드는 동영상은 따로 저장할 수 있습니다. - 학습에 도움이 되는 유용한 동영상들을 저장해주세요. 감사합니다! ---- 개발자 연락처 : haruno_hi@naver.com CF, music videos, sports, TED, animation and various videos updated daily. Imaging follow-up in four languages ​​(English, Japanese, Chinese, Korean) support subtitles. Vocabulary, translator, sentence listening too at a time Language study is now easy and fun now! One. Variety of videos updated daily - Videos are updated every day by a variety of categories. - The search will only be able to browse through the desired movie. Two. Watching subtitled language study - Video follow up to four languages ​​(English, Japanese, Chinese, Korean), subtitles are supported. - The future will support other languages. Three. Dictionaries, translation function - Video of a difficult sentence or word play and advance through the translation function can be found right away. Four. Listening Function Subtitle functionality, including video available for listening. - Speech recognition, you can practice the pronunciation. 5. Vocabulary - Play of the stored image can be stored in the vocabulary words. - Memorized words / memorized the words to distinguish between right and you can learn. 6. Listen sentence - Play of the stored image can be saved to listen to sentences are sentences. - Study in one sentence / study and can learn to distinguish between sentences. 7. Favorites - Video Play of my favorite video can be stored separately. Learning to save videos to help you back valuable. Thank you!

This app provides prayer times and finds the direction to the Qiblah wherever you are in the World. You will be able to get prayer times at your location by using your phone's geoloaction feature. Alternatively, you will be able to search by a place name. You will also be able to find the nearest masjids and driving directions from your location. ★ User interface in Bangla, English, French, Hindi, Malay, Spanish ★ Qiblah direction is shown on a compass on your android. ★ Sehri and Iftar times are also shown during Ramadan. ★ Prayer time available for other countries ★ Niyyat for each waqt is shown. ★ Locations and directions of nearby Mosques are shown Take the app with you when you visit overseas! Salah time and mosque finder works for (almost) all countries in the world. description: The First e-manga in the World！ Vol.2!! Instantly switch between Japanese and Spanish text and audio! Common every day begins to change from various encounter. Coffee shop fuss story!! ■■Casts（Voice actors）■■ ▽Voice actors for Japanese ・Aoi Tokura / Hiro Shimono ・Keiichi Iwase / Hikaru Midorikawa ・Shion Koga / Daisuke Hirakawa ・Hiroshi Amami / Ryo Horikawa ▽Voice actors for Spanish ・Aoi Tokura / Daniel Willy ・Keiichi Iwase / Eduardo Iduñate ・Shion Koga / Diego Osorio ・Hiroshi Amami / Eduardo Iduñate ■■Story■■ An ordinary college student, Aoi Tokura, was having a bad day. It was so bad as he was told to be ugly by a good-looking guy on the train. Walking down the street in rain, Aoi found a small 1, but cozy cafe, Rainy Color. He started to work as a part time as he enjoyed a cup of hot chocolate he was served. Then a guy came into Rainy Color... it was Keiichi Iwase, the one who told Aoi was ugly!!?? ■■The directions for this application■■ If the tap of the screen right-hand side is carried out, it can move to the following page. If the tap of the screen left-hand side is carried out, it can move to the last page. e-manga is a form of a digital manga which the text and the audio are made in multi-languages, such as Japanese and English, and they are compatible with Android, iPhone and iPad. The text and the audio are instantly able to switch between Japanese and other languages. Both the Japanese and other language versions are featuring performances by famous anime voice actors.
Ever wanted to be more like Mad Men's Don Draper? Now you can, with this handy pocket compendium of some of his greatest advice!

description: A gorgeous strategy game with an award-winning interface, Anthill is based on the real-world behaviour of ants. By drawing pheromone trails, you direct your ground forces to different destinations, working with streams of units rather than individuals. Your mission is to protect the hill as wave upon wave of enemy bugs are thrown at you with tower defence gameplay. Slay a bug carry out air raids upgrade your troops with four types of ants to deploy: workers, soldiers, spitters and drones. ⊳ FEATURES ⊲ - Tower defence gameplay protect your ant hill - Variety of units to deploy workers, soldiers, spitters and bombers - Real critters to defeat evil enemy beetles, bugs and flies - Draw pheromone trails simple touch and slide interface - Upgrade your units grow and develop your colony ⊳ SUPPORT ⊲ If you face any technical issue with the game and/or device please contact us. This will enable us to fix and update the game, making it better for all. Email us for support here at support@thumbstar.com **************************************** For the latest news and updates on our games check us out on… Website www.thumbstar.com Facebook search Thumbstar Twitter @thumbstar ****************************************

description: Самоучитель английского языка по настоящему простому времени (The Future Simple Tense). Обучение составлению предложений. Часть 3: время "The Future Simple". Требуемый уровень знания английского: начинающий, но обучающийся должен иметь представление о базовые словах из английского. Учитесь английскому, составляя реальные предложения. Если не знаете как правильно, программа подскажет правильный вариант. В данной части программы предлагается урок английского языка на составление предложений в одном из 12 времён, а именно: The Future Simple Tense (настоящее простое время). Одно из очень распространённых времён английского языка, которым нужно уметь владеть для успешного обучения английскому языку. Когда сомневаетесь в правильности ответа используйте теорию, доступную в справке программы, либо просто используйте подсказки, которые доступны после вашего ответа. Другие части этого приложения: Часть 1. Present Simple (настоящее время): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.intriga_games.intrigaenglishteacher Часть 2. Past Simple (прошедшее время): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.intriga_games.englishlessonpastsimple Teach English in the present prime-time (The Future Simple Tense). Education suggestions. Part 3: The time of "The Future Simple". The required level of English: beginner, but the student must have an understanding of basic words of English. Learn English, making real proposals. If you do not know how well the program will prompt the correct option. In this part of the program offers lessons English language proposal writing in one of the 12 times, namely: The Future Simple Tense (now prime time). One of the very common era of the English language, which must be able to own a successful English language training. When in doubt about the correctness of the answer using the theory available in the software Help, or just use the tips, which are available upon your response. Other parts of this application: Part 1. Present Simple (now): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.intriga_games.intrigaenglishteacher Part 2. Past Simple (elapsed time): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.intriga_games.englishlessonpastsimple
release_text: ОБНОВЛЕНИЕ 11.03.13 Продолжаем фиксить найденные баги. Ошибки, которые Вы отправляли на почту - также исправлены. description: Beat the Challenge & Destroy all targets by Kicking the Ball in Real Kick Football ★☆★☆★ Features includes: ★☆★☆★ - 60 completely different & freaky challenges, - first game on the market with advanced kicking simulation, - easy to learn, hard to master, - play as a female or male, - represent your favorite country, - beat challenges in 5 countries; - visit five visually astonishing football stadiums, - visit different countries and experience local soccer atmosphere, - very precise shooting mechanics, - arcade feeling with simulation, Penalty kicks in football game were never so exciting: you can travel aroung soccer countries and score goals by defeating tricky challenges: destroy targets, smash cartoons and become champion of football leagues. Manage your football career become one of the top eleven player on the earth - none of the other soccer players can compete will compete with you. Dream league could become real if you want - just start beating challenges, score goals and perform fantasy shootout madness. Don’t give up and destroy all targets. Visit top fifa rated countries in 2014: Brazil, Italy or Spain. Challenges specially crafted for soccer empires are awaiting for you greatness. Let them taste it. Realistic Shooting Engine based on Physics: Arcade mechanics with dynamic and simple feeling, which allows you perform soccer tricks not from this planet. Diversified gameplay: Shoot, strike and become most effective soccer striker. Penalty Shootout provides you unique experience of football games. Referee will not interfere with your play as in real football match. Game includes most exciting element of real soccer matches - penalty shooting. Flick kick the ball and watch amazing graphics on the field. Become the most effective player and prove that your worth is similar to best fifa or uefa players on the world. Even world cup isn’t such exciting as our game. Unique emotions: Kicking and scoring in matches is boring, soccer game stripped from unnecessary elements is available in this flick kick pure experience. Become superstar similar to best players of uefa champions league and fifa world cup. Become one of the top eleven and manager of your road to the ultimate soccer objective - being the best.

** NO ADS. NO IN APP PURCHASE. LONG PLAYTIME. ** "My Little Work - Garage is an excellent app that lets kids experience what’s it like to work in garage through fun mini games. The app features eye-catching graphics and a wide range of rewards to keep players coming back." //geekswithjuniors.com "The possible combinations are never-ending, especially if you consider the range of colors and additional objects and accessories. Awesome, outstanding and worth every penny!" //topbestappsforkids.com "My Little Work Garage will surely keep your creative kids entertained for hours on end. This is a great app from one of our favorite developers" //kids-app-reviews.com Let's play garage! Clients are waiting to get their cars fixed! They need new tires, fuel, an oil change, a thorough wash, an awesome paint job, a new front or maybe just a cool accessory? Help them out and earn money to buy new parts for your own dream racing car and race together with up to 4 players on the device. My Little Work – Garage is the first game in a series from Filimundus where small children can play and pretend that they are working at a real work place, just like adults. No stress and infinite play time. Suitable for children between 3 and 9 years. Features: • Run your own garage with customers lining up for help! • Gas station where you fill up fuel or charge vehicles. • Fix the engine, fill up oil, add washer fluid, find broken parts. • Choose between different wacky tires for your car. • Change front, mid-section or back to create thousands of extraordinary and funny cars! • Spray paint just like in a real garage. Add cool flames and other effects. • Earn money and buy parts to build your own racing cars. • Compete in races with up to 4 simultaneous players • Wonderful characters with non-language voices, suitable for all ages and nationalities! • Kid-friendly, simple interface. • No in app-purchases About Filimundus: Filimundus is a game studio dedicated to create entertaining and educational apps for children of all ages! We strongly believe good games stimulate children’s creativity and imagination. We are very serious about privacy. We do not track behavior, analyze nor share information in our games.

Los resultados se mostraran en pantalla. With this app, you can meet your net salary and your withholding AFP, ISR, ISSS in just 2 taps. 1. Put your salary Two. Tap "Ok" Ready! The results will be displayed on screen. description: Was macht ein Hotel erfolgreich? Welches Produkt verlangt der Markt? Wie erreiche ich meine Kunden? Mit diesen Fragen muss sich der Spieler in Hotel Manager II herumschlagen: es gilt den Markt genau zu analysieren, den richtigen Preis zu finden, sorgfältig zu kalkulieren - kurzum erfolgreich zu managen. In Hotel Manager II hat der Spieler nicht nur die Möglichkeit verschiedene Szenarien zu spielen, sondern auch diese zu kreieren. Jedes Szenario konfrontiert den Spieler mit neuen Gästegruppen und veränderten Rahmenbedingungen. What makes a hotel successful? Which product the market wants? How do I reach my customers? With these questions, the player manager II must grapple in the hotel: it is necessary to analyze the market carefully to find the right price to carefully calculate - in short, to manage successfully. In Hotel Manager II, the player has the opportunity not only to play different scenarios, but also to create them. Each scenario confronts the player with new guest groups and changing conditions.
release_text: Several bugs fixed. Customers can now be adressed through different channels (sales-menu). Different prices can be applied to consumer groups (logis-menu).

description: "Mosaique is one of those apps that transcend traditional puzzle games." - iDownloadBlog "If you have fond memories of Tetris, or just like puzzle games and own an iPhone, you should pick up Mosaique." - Gamezebo "The UI is very simple, or dare I say, elegant in this game...a neat approach to casual gaming." - Android Police *** AS CHOSEN BY C-NET AS ONE OF THE BEST MOBILE GAMES OF MAY 2013 *** Solve the Mosaique! Lose yourself in the pastime of another world! With just seven levels the game can be easily completed in the time it takes for sunlight to reach the Earth. Arrange and clear tiles of matching colors to beat each level and discover the hidden depths behind this addictive puzzle game. The pride of the Vraxis moon colonists is yours to enjoy! - Algorithmically generated levels. Different each game! - Play as you please. Mosaique gives back only as much strategic challenge as you put in. - No time limits. It's a game, not a test. - 10 minute original soundtrack to help you slip away. - Elegantly designed interface and visual experience. Immerse yourself! Shake the game and watch the sand-filled tiles float around in an anti-gravitational field! Check out our website for more information about Mosaique: www.winningblimp.com
release_text: (1.4.3) Fixed bug that prevented some users from launching up Mosaique NEW FEATURES: -Restored ability to clear lines of tiles consecutively -Game Services integration! Record your high scores to online leaderboards and win new achievements! -Indication of when you last cleared Mosaique. To make it easier to play consecutively, you can now check when your last game clear was. -Switchable sound effects. By popular demand! You now have independent control over the music and the sound effects.

description: "Italian Trains Timetable" is the iconic Italian trains apps, which made the history of Android in Italy. Its first release was in September 2009. Great music discovery is effortless and free with Pandora. Just start with the name of one of your favorite artists, songs, genres or composers and we'll do the rest. It's easy to create personalized stations that play only music you'll love. Tap into an entire world of music, including almost a century of popular recordings - new and old, well known and obscure. Create up to 100 personalized radio stations with your free account. Not sure where to start? Create a free account to explore hundreds of music and comedy genre stations. Already a Pandora listener? Even easier. Just log in and enjoy the same free radio service. Your Pandora is the same across the web, on your phone, on your TV, and in your car - access your free personalized radio wherever you want to hear great music or comedy. Note: Pandora may use large amounts of data and carrier data charges may apply. For best results, we recommend you connect your device to trusted WiFi networks when available.

description: REVIEWS: "Anyone who enjoys the fun of a day on the pitch will certainly find plenty to enjoy" 148apps.com "...the developers have a handle on making simple, wacky games that are fun to play and make you smile." Technobrains.com "it’s fun…and offers replayability by way of difficulty progression and the unlocking of new characters...?" ThePortableGamer.com “…a fun little game for your free time. It’s simple to pick up and play, and despite the simple mechanic there is a lot to enjoy maneuvering…” AppAdvice.com If your after a game that has a light hearted take on soccer, and still provides a genuine test, Soccer Stealers could be right up your street. isoccerapps.com ★★★★★ Soccer fans around the world REJOICE! Your favourite casual soccer game is back with a vengeance! Soccer Stealers: Reloaded is packed with loads of new goodies to collect and an amazing array of wacky power-ups. How many medals can you collect while avoiding those pesky referees? Will you make full use of those special winged cleets and tornado flags? Can you dice enough watermelons to sabotage bad cops, aliens from mars, and an entire company of reckless referees? You won’t know until you try it out, but we guarantee that Soccer Stealers Reloaded is sure to get your fingers tappin and heart thumping. NEW FEATURES 1、NEW Customize your character and Dress to Impress: What’s your style: Afro? Buzz? Shaved? Pony-tailed? 2、NEW Redeem medals for goodies: Collect medals and trade them in at our very own Gamegou shop 3、NEW Real-time match selections allowing you to enter matches currently being played in 3 major leagues: England, Germany, Italy 4、Rapid racing action 5、Intelligible one-touch control

"Hello Chalk" is an easy & fun drawing APP. It's good for drawing lunch menu, todo list, drawing funny things and etc Features - Realistic look & feel of chalks, black board and board pens - Cool stroke sound - Intuitive user interface - In-app-billing items for more functions Check out our hello drawing series. - Hello Crayons - Hello Color pencils - Hello Chalk Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Hello-Chalk/217927548240939 ==== This is the notice for updated version of 'Hello' Series and 'Water Color Pencil' app, related to function of 'Image Save to External Storage.' If you have device with Android JellyBean or previous version, when you save image to exteral storage, image files will be saved to exteral storage folder with App Name and immediately you can show that image on Gallery. (This is the conventional rule of older version of Hello Series and WCP app.) If you have device with Android KITKAT, when you save image to exteral storage, image files copied on Camera Folder of your external storage. Surely, you can see your image on Gallery. If you got the toast message 'Cannot Save To Camera Folder' when save image, please execute basic 'Camera' app of device and make one or more photo. After that, you can save image to camera folder successfully.

You have alcohol, some beverages and fruits and wonder what cocktails you can make? My Bar is for you. Just choose what ingredients you have and My Bar will show you a list of all cocktails you can enjoy and offer to your friends. Check out the screenshots! Features: ★ BROWSE ALL COCKTAILS ★ just a list of all cocktails available. Do you really care about 9000 cocktails other applications offer? Most of them you probably won't like. We include only carefully chosen and most popular cocktails. The cocktails you can make are highlighted, you know that you can make it. For other cocktails missing ingredients are listed. ★ MY BAR ★ all your ingredients in one place. For each one, quickly see what cocktails you can make with that particular ingredients. ★ MY COCKTAILS ★ all cocktails you can make using only ingredients you have. Below that list - cocktails that you almost can make, missing one or two ingredient. You can easily see what exactly you need to add to your bar shelf to expand a list of your cocktails. ★ CUSTOM COCKTAILS AND INGREDIENTS ★ Create your own unique cocktails and add new ingredients. ★ FAVORITE COCKTAILS ★ Manage your favorite cocktails and have them quickly accessible in a separate tab. ★ MANAGE BAR ★ choose what ingredients are on your bar shelf, see how many cocktails are available with particular ingredient. ★ BROWSE BY CATEGORY ★ Select a category to see only IBA official cocktails or shooters etc. For ingredient list select a category to see only strong alcohol, beveragers etc. ★ SEARCH ★ Quick cocktail and ingredient search option. ★ COCKTAIL DETAILS ★ Description, detailed recipe with variations and a list of needed ingredients including garnish. ★ INGREDIENT DETAILS ★ Browse all cocktails with Tequila, for example, quickly see which of these cocktails you can make right now. ★ If you cannot find a cocktail you love, tell us! We will update our cocktail database regularly. ★ Having problems with application? Want a feature we don't have? Contact us at support@mybarapp.com and we will try to help. ★ Don't want any ads? Support our development and get a Pro version. Thank you! keywords: cocktail, cocktails, drink, drinks, bar, recipe, recipes, mix, bartender, alcohol, margarita, liquor, booze, tequila, vodka
release_text: This update - features requested by our users, thank you! - Ability to add pictures to custom ingredients and cocktails (hence new storage permissions). - Automatic data backup with Android service (no custom pictures backup, sorry) - Import/export of custom ingredients and cocktails. - Other minor fixes.

description: The Best VOICE CALL recording feature-packed app, that lets you record any phone call you choose to save, and allows you to save it in format you wish to “FOR FREE”!! Listen to the recording or share it with your friends!! The default storage destination of all calls is ‘External SD Card’, so the size of your recordings is not just limited to your phone memory. ########### IMPORTANT NOTE ################## - App may not function if other call recording applications are in use. Please close or delete ( uninstall ) all other recording apps. - App may not function properly if the cellphone model you are using does not support the call recording function, and can only be used if custom ROM is installed. - Please don’t leave a one-star review if the app does not work. The app works perfectly in the vast majority of devices e. g Samsung Note 2, Samsung Note, Galaxy S3 , Samsung Galaxy Tab II, Samsung Galaxy Win, Lenovo Mobile LNV-L etc - its NOT working on Galaxy S DUOS , FLY mobiles, Motorola RZR ** i - XT890, Song Xperia etc. ############################################## ★ SIMPLE Total Call Recorder, is an amazing voice call recording mobile application, with a user friendly design, that enhances user experience, of application usage. ★ ENABLE/DISABLE CALL RECORDING Enjoy the privilege to decide which call to record and which not to, at your own convenience. ★ SHARE RECORDED ITEMS Now, share your recordings, with anyone anywhere! Total Call Recorder provides an option to share recordings with friends through, Bluetooth, Gmail, message and leading messengers. ★ SAVE RECORDINGS TO YOUR SD CARD The default storage memory for all your recordings is now your SD card, so limited phone memory is no longer a limitation. ★ EASY TO MANAGE RECORDING LIST This Voice call recording application has a simple, well organized, recording list and helps distinguish between received and dialed calls. ★ DELETE RECORDED ITEMS Deleting unwanted recordings could never be simpler! Total Call Recorder, provides an easy delete option, that lets user, easily delete all unwanted recordings. ★ BUILT IN AUDIO PLAYER Built-in audio player, to play recorded files. It help supporting greater number of devices. ★ WORTH USING This user friendly, manageable, voice call recording application, is a must to use App for all Android users. Want us to help you find the best video/audio gems? NEED MORE FEATURES: Check our paid version with more features. If you have any suggestion, please drop us an email support@toxsl.com

С 1-го февраля введены новые, универсальные билеты: http://ru-metro.livejournal.com/3661145.html Моё приложение самое первое, которое начало поддерживать новые билеты! ============================================================ ʍ Программа считывает московские универсальные билеты (метрополитен и ТАТ). ☎ Должна работать на телефонах с поддержкой NFC ( http://clck.ru/q9aN ). ✉ Об ошибках просьба писать на почту, а в случае падения программы отправлять багрепорты. И ещё раз: читаются только проездные на 1,2,5,10,20,60,70. Любые другие карты (например, петербургского метро или социальные) не могут быть считаны. Подписывайтесь на мой Гугл+ для всякого интересно по теме RFID: https://plus.google.com/101556997781950359321 . Там пока пусто, но если будет что важное — обязательно напишу. Тэги: RFID, NFC, Mifare Ultralight, MiFairy, считыватель билетов метро. On February 1, introduced new, universal tickets: http://ru-metro.livejournal.com/3661145.html My application is the first thing that began to support the new cards! ================================================== ========== ʍ program reads Moscow universal tickets (subway and TAT). ☎ should work on phones with support for NFC ( http://clck.ru/q9aN) . ✉ report problems, please write to the post office, and in the event of a program to send bug reports. Once again, read only travel on 1,2,5,10,20,60,70. Any other cards (such as the St. Petersburg metro or social) can not be read. Subscribe to my Google + for all interested on RFID: https://plus.google.com/101556997781950359321 . There is still empty, but if that is important - always write. Tags: RFID, NFC, Mifare Ultralight, MiFairy, subway ticket reader.

Spanish Food Recipes with video explanations. Exclusive Spanish cooking recipes for cooking authentic Spanish food. This is a must have app if you are food lover who loves to cook new food daily especially if want to try out some Spanish recipes. Spanish cuisine is a way of preparing varied dishes, which is enriched by the culinary contributions of the various regions that make up the country. It is a cuisine influenced by the people who, throughout history, have conquered the territory of that country. The Spanish cuisine presented in this spanish recipe apps is collection of variety of dishes from the following Spanish regions – Andalucia, Aragon, Asturias, Balearic Islands, Basque Country, Canary Islands, Cantabria, Castile-La Mancha, Castile and León, Catalonia, La Rioja, Extremadura, Galicia, Madrid, Murcia, Navarre and Valencia. It was in Catalonia that first Spanish cookbook was written. It is a rural culture with triple cuisine. Following are some of the Popular Spanish Food under various Categories Spanish Starters : Canarian wrinkly potatoes, Coca, Escalivada, Migas, Pa amb tomàquet, Patatas bravas, Pincho, Pulpo á feira, Tapas, Tortilla de patatas, Tumbet, Zarangollo. Main Spanish dishes : Arroz a la cubana, Arròs negre, Chicharrón, Chireta, Cuchifritos, Escabeche, Fideuà, Gachas, Gazpacho manchego, Merienda, Paella, Pinchitos, Pringá, Ropa vieja Breads and pastries : Empanada, Ensaïmada, Hornazo, Mollete, Polvorón, Talau Spanish Soups and stews : Ajoblanco, Cocido, Cocido madrileño, Escudella, Caparrones, Fabada French, Gazpacho, Marmitako, Olla podrida, Ollada, Pipérade, Pisto, Salmorejo Spanish Condiments and sauces : Almogrote, Mojo (sauce), Nocilla, Palm syrup, Paprika, Piquillo pepper, Romesco, Sherry vinegar, Sofrito, Tomate Frito, Xató Spanish Desserts : Alfajor, Churro, Flan, Crème brûlée, Frangollo, Marzipan, Panellets, Quince cheese, Tarta de Santiago, Teja, Tortas de Aceite, Tortell, Turrón Dairy products (Spanish Cheeses) : Afuega'l pitu, Cabrales cheese, Cuajada, Idiazábal cheese, Garrotxa cheese, Manchego cheese, Mató cheese, Natillas, Picón Bejes-Tresviso Spanish sausages : Morcilla, Botifarra, Cecina, Chistorra, Chorizo, Fuet, Jamón, Jamón ibérico, Jamón serrano, Lacón Gallego, Lechazo, Lomo, Longaniza, Mojama. Non-alcoholic Spanish beverages : Café con leche, Horchata All the spanish food listed above may not be available as recipes in our app. But through this app we provide you some spanish recipes for everyday cooking. All the spanish food recipes by top chefs and top restaurants of world published in YouTube are available here. We are sure that you won’t fail to find any spanish recipes you are looking for in the 500 recipes available in our Spanish Recipes VideoBook. Disclaimer: Spanish Food Recipes Videos are fetched from publically available videos in YouTube. Copyright for the videos belongs to the uploaders of respective videos or to the original creators.

description: The Official FIFA App Download the Official FIFA App to keep right up to date with live scores from across the globe, breaking news and photos, and exclusive videos, interviews and features from FIFA.com. Our Live Scores section enables you to follow minute-by-minute scores from 197 domestic leagues and several continental competitions, while you can engage with fellow fans by commenting on matches and articles. We also provide comprehensive coverage of every FIFA competition with a special focus on the FIFA World Cup Russia 2018 as we bring you news, photos and videos ahead of July’s Preliminary Draw. You can also relive the 2014 FIFA World Cup Brazil and all the greatest moments in World Cup history by browsing through our exclusive videos, photos and matches of all the previous World Cup editions. In addition, you can keep track of the FIFA/Coca-Cola World Ranking, and explore how FIFA brings to life its passion for developing the game and building a better future with stories from our worldwide projects. The Official FIFA App is a must-have for any football follower. So, download it and have ‘The Beautiful Game’ with you any time, any place. Want to find out more? See what FIFA Club members and other football fans say: www.fifa.com/app www.twitter.com/fifacom www.facebook.com/fifa
release_text: · We highlight the best of club football and other FIFA tournaments, as well as gearing up to the FIFA World Cup Russia 2018 with the latest news, photos and videos ahead of July’s Preliminary Draw · Relive Brazil 2014 and all the greatest moments in World Cup history by browsing through our exclusive videos, photos and matches of all the previous editions · Experience an overall improvement in performance, making for a quicker and more reliable app · The FIFA App is now available in Russian

description: Astronomy ephemeris app for calculating high precision ephemeris and positions of Sun, Moon and the Planets for engaged amateur astronomers and planetary observers, prefering data and facts instead of pritty picture-apps. Planetdroid finds rise, culmination and set times, the beginning of seasons, lunar phases and planetary aspects. Augmented reality (AR) view: See the positions of planets or comets live on a camera image and search your selected object with your phone! Since version 3.0 Planetdroid comes with a visibility diagram. You see the elevation above the horizon of your selected body (white line) of the current nicht and the elevation of the sun (dark yellow line), as well as the twilight times. The horizontal black line ist the horizon, the vertical red line your selected time. Since version 3.3 it is possible to save locations offline. The file containing the locations is sdcard/.com.strickling/location.txt. It can be edited with any test editor. To start the editor, simply click menu in the location selection form. Download elements for asteroids and comets from the internet. Supports GPS localization. Calculates (select or deselect different items in the menu): - time of rise, culmination, set, - azimut of rise and set - equatorial right ascension and declination - ecliptical coordinates and distance - azimut an elevation - equation of time, true local time, sidereal time - diameter, brightness, central meridian, position angle of the axis - for comets and asteroids: motion velocity and direction - Civil, nautical and astronomic twilight - begin of the seasons, lunar phases, and lunar age - times of opposition, conjunction and greates elongation for planets. - time of perihelion for comets On some devices without front camera Google Play Store will indicate, that Planetdroid is not compatible with your device. The front camera is needed for the augmented reality screen. If you like to install Planetdroid without using augmented reality, please install it from my website: http://www.strickling.net/android_engl.htm#PlanetDroid Thanks to Mark Huss for his AstroLib containing the VSOP-routines and to the translators Nenad Trajkovic (Serbian), Alfredo Caronia (Italian), IDris a.k.a. MANsur, Ghost-Unit (Russian), Sizhuang Liu (Chinese), M. César Rodríguez (Spanish) and Osama Al Shammari (Arabic). Required Permissions: - Hardware controls: Camera. Required for AR. May cause compatibility refusal for devices without front camera. Try installation from my website! - Exact location: For site-specific calculations eg. rising and setting times. - Internet Access: Online access to asteroid and comet orbital databases and online selection of an observation site. - SD card access: Storing orbital elements data, settings and location coordinates for offline search. More translators are welcome! If you like this app and prefer using it in your language, contact me! Translation is very easy. Frequent users are asked to purchase the Planetdroid donation version to share the Android market fees. Bugs or problems found? Please send error report for error loclisation and removal or send an email instead of giving bad ratings! Key words: sun, moon, planet, planets, solar system, coordinates, position, physical ephemeris, planetoid, planetoids, asteroid, asteroids, comet, comets, ephemeris, sky, astronomy, observation, rise, set, culmination, azimuth, azimut, elevation, coordinates, position, physical ephemeris, conjunction, opposition, elongation, Augmented Reality, AR, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptun, Pluto, Ceres, Pallas, Juno, Vesta, droit, planetdroit, planet droid, planet-droid, planetandroid
release_text: 4.8.1 - Move2SD enabled, Bugfixes, Menu in AR screen for devices without menu key by tipping onto screen 4.8.0 - Swipes and clicks on visibility view change date and time. - Menu item "show orbital elements" for minor bodies - no display of semimajor Axis for e > 1

description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم Muslim zone is an all-in-one app that satisfies every Muslim's basic needs with a unique and user-friendly experience. The app comes as a package, which includes accurate prayer times, Qibla compass, Quran text + translation. It is also one of the f first fully-featured application to bring you the iqamah timings of your local mosques. The app also includes a widget with a colourful theme that helps you stay on time for your prayers. If you liked the app, feel free to rate it and share with your friends and family. Features: ✓ Accurate Prayer time calculator based on your current location ✓ The Holy Quran with recitations and translations - crystal clear Madani compliant images. - gapless audio playback - ayah bookmarking, tagging, and sharing - over 15 audio recitations are available with highlighting support (tap the screen for to get the audio toolbar). - search - night mode - customizable audio repeat - translations / tafsir in over 20 different languages, with more coming soon. ✓ Iqamah Times from your local Masjid ✓ Nearby Masjids ✓ Adhan Notifications (Vibrate and Adhan) ✓ Directions to Nearby Masjids ✓ Animated Qibla compass to show you the direction to Mecca ✓ Muslim calendar to estimate Hijri date ✓ Many Quranic Translations ✓ Beautiful app and widget design ✓ Duas Collection from Hisnul Muslim (Fortress of a Muslim) - Arabic - Transliteration - Translation - References - High quality audio - Beautiful recitations for each du'aa ✓ Finding the location automatically using Network or GPS, or manually by searching in the Internet. The methods that were implemented in this application are: 1 - University of Islamic Sciences, Karachi 2 - North America (ISNA) 3 - Muslim World League (MWL) 4 - Umm Al Qura, Makkah 5- Egyptian General Authority of Survey Asr Juristic Method: 1) Maalik, Shafi and Hanbali 2) Hanafi We are extremely humbled and appreciative for all the supporting feedback we get every day from Muslims all over the world. If you enjoy and benefit from this app, please take a moment to help support us by rating myDuaa! JazakumAllahu khayran! Like us on facebook : https://www.facebook.com/MuslimZoneApp حصن المسلم, دعاء, قرآن
release_text: v2.1.5 - FC Fixed v2.1.4 - Location Fix - Bug Fixes v2.1.3 - Iqamah Timing Fix v2.1.2 - Bug fixes and layout fixes v2.1.1 - UI Improvements/Fixes - Added More Dates for prayer timings - Audio and Sharing for Duas - Improved Animations - Improved Location Provider - Interstitials Ads Added, may be disabled via settings ***Please report all bugs to my email provided. In bug report please include screenshot if possible and what you did exactly.***

Points can then be exchanged for real gift cards from Amazon.com, Starbucks, Nike, GameStop, Target and hundreds more of your favorite brands. //The Best Rewards// * Gift Cards from Amazon, Target, Starbucks, Groupon, and hundreds more * Airline miles from Delta, US Airways, and Alaska Airlines * Charitable donations to Autism Speaks, American Cancer Society and more * Tablets, Digital Cameras, Laptops and other goodies //Popular Trivia// *Pop Culture *Sports *Science *Geography *TV Shows *Celebrities …and many more are added all the time. //About Perk// *Perk is the #1 mobile rewards program

*** iOS users LOVE EleEidotr EleEditor sets the standard for Evernote® lovers by winning the People's Choice Award in Evernote Devcup 2013! Hit Top 5 in the US, Canada, France, and Japan Apple App Stores *** EleEditor allows you to dynamically enhance your Evernote® files. Sift and sort through Evernote® and export key points, images and diagrams to EleEditor. In EleEditor you can expand and edit these notes and materials with the flexibility to adjust layout and image size and add handwritten notes. Save the new notes back to Evernote® with tags and notebooks, or backup your notes to other drives. Make the best use of Evernote® data by converting jumbled information into polished documents with EleEditor. Organize Evernote® elements with the Scrapbook >> Collect elements from multiple Evernote® notes >> Preview Evernote® elements in thumbnails in the scrapbook sidebar >> Preview website contents and capture screenshots >> Use searchable note titles to find relevant material Import Online Content >> Browse websites in the built-in browser >> Crop and save web pages into the scrapbook >> Drag items from the scrapbook and create new notes in your own style Evernote® Makeover >> Adjust brush size, color and opacity when sketching >> Insert text boxes >> Adjust image size >> Enjoy flexible layout—simply slide your finger to move inserted items to desired locations Share and Backup the Easy Way >> Back up your notes to Dropbox >> Export notes in PDF format, save them back to Evernote® or share them via E-mail >> File format fully compatible with NoteLedge. Import and continue to edit your notes in NoteLedge with more editing options Works seamlessly with Evernote® >> Preserve tags and Notebooks created in Evernote® >> Extract text, images, video, audio, and website links from Evernote® to the Scrapbook with ease >> Save your works to Evernote® in searchable PDF format >> Supports offline note editing (you need to connect to the Internet to access Evernote® content) Become our fan on Facebook to learn more about our dedication, fan events and our great products! http://www.facebook.com/kdanmobile We value your feedback, but we cannot answer you in the comments. Please contact us directly at appservice@kdanmobile.com or leave your comment in our Facebook fan page, we are committed to serve our customers. EleEditor is neither sponsored nor affiliated with Evernote®. Evernote® is a trademark owned by Evernote Corporation, and EleEditor is only integrated with the Evernote®API. Kdan Mobile Software Ltd. does not represent Evernote Corporation.

Starship Commander is a fast-paced top-down perspective free space shooter game. Required skills are more than fast reactions and memorising enemy attack war patterns. The player must also have strategy skills to equip proper upgrades and use the appropriate skills during specific space missions. Starship Commander - Space War is a classic game inspired by classic sci-fi movies like Star Trek and old school retro games like Space Invaders or Elite, making a fresh but old style game for your Android mobile. There are three game modes (Easy, Medium and Hard), and the goal of the game is to get as many lightyear points as you can before the end of the game. What do you waiting for? Start your spaceship engines and join to this ultimate galactic space war game. Main features: # 7 different alien invaders with 100+ unique spaceships to fight against # 90+ missions in 16 unlockable galaxies war with 3 difficulty levels # Ability to change weapons and use active skills during the space missions # 6+ fully customizable spaceships with 120+ upgrades (including turrets and special modules) # Huge alien bosses # Continuously challenging survival mode with infinite stages # Ultra hard Chaos Rise war mode for elite players This version of Starship Commander is free to try, however at some point during the campaign, you must purchase the full version in order to finish the game. Some of the listed features become available only after the full game is unlocked. *** Get bonuses and unlock additional unique features by entering promotional codes in the game. Visit our Facebook page for more information! https://www.facebook.com/TubiGames/app_190322544333196 *** Troubleshooting Tips: # The game supports 2 texture modes, use HIGH for devices with resolution 480x800 or above, and use LOW for anything below. # If you experience missing textures or white screens during the game, you might have ran out of texture memory. Try switching the texture mode setting to LOW and/or the details setting to DISABLED. # Turning sound and music OFF in the options menu may increase the game performance on slower devices. # When you complete a transaction through Google Play, the purchased item should appear immediately when you return to the application. If it doesn't, go to the unlock menu, and enter code "0000000001". This will restore all transactions you have made through Google Play. (Requires Internet access.) *** Gameplay Tips: # LY (Light Year) is the game currency for purchasing ship upgrades and for unlocking new galaxies to venture forth. Spend it wisely! # If you ran out of LY, you can finish accomplished missions again to get more. Asteroid rich missions are especially good for this purpose. # Rerunning a mission on Hard difficulty increases the LY gain. # Equipped turrets and turret modifiers can be switched any time during a mission. Equipped special modules can be used as active skills once within their cooldown interval. Equipped upgrades are passively modify your ship properties. # If you find a mission too hard, finish another mission first! You may also change difficulty setting to Easy for that specific mission. # Different enemies may require different strategies. Although a weapon with great amount of damage can be efficient against large and strong enemies, weapons with smaller damage but fast rate of fire could be better against smaller foes. ***

"A game worth playing, with piggies worth saving." -- GAMEZEBO "Recommended for Kids, Tweens and Teens" -- FAMIGO Who hasn’t heard about the classic children fairy tale of Big Bad Wolf and the Three Little Pigs? The big bad wolf is always preying around. An this time Maximize Games just release a game which is base by this story. The bad wolf has captured Oin-oink’s (A cute piglet who plays as the main character) cousin. Join Oin Oink on his journey to save his cousin in ‘Push the box’. It’s a new exciting puzzle game with attractive graphic that will definitely give you a challenge. Feature : • Unlock all 100 levels of fun • Various unique obstacle • Game Center and various achievements • Suitable for all types of ages • Simple yet challenging gameplay • Interesting graphic • Addictive gameplay How To play : 1. You could only push the Box, and can not pull the box. 2. You could only push horizontally and vertically. 3. If the box sticks on the wall, it could not be pulled anymore. 4. Avoid from the enemy's sight 5. And there are many more obstacle which will get harder

Want to transform the look of your already slick smartphone into something even better? Allow me to introduce you to 'DigitalSoul'. *** This app is a Launcher theme for ADW EX, ADW.Launcher,APEX Launcher Pro, LauncherPro(LP), & LauncherPro Plus. It's (this theme) is used in conjunction with one of the Launchers listed above, allowing you to drastically modify the look of your phone with ease (and a little bit of patience!). --- PLEASE NOTE: This is not a standalone app and therefore will not launch on it's own. You will need to have one of the above Launcher apps installed on your device in order for this theme to work! --- *** Features: ★400+ internally coded HDPI app icons ★180+ extra HDPI app icons in an Icon Pack for use with ADW's Custom Shortcuts (that is a total of over 400 apps!) ★5 Custom created Theme wallpapers in a Wallpaper Pack ★Launcher Pro theme support (icons and wallpapers must be added manually from the Theme packs) ★Other Launchers support including Crazy Home, Crazy Home Lite, dxTop Lite, Panda Home, Open Home paid & free ★Icon Pack should also work with Launch-X Pro & Free, VTL Launcher, Circle Launcher Paid, and several more customization related apps. *** A few important details: -The theme will automatically change your primary system app icons, wallpaper, and certain graphics. Not all devices are created the same, so certain icons might not automatically change when applying the theme. description: Going to Berlin? Get this FREE City Guides Catalog, a personal advisor in your pocket which helps you plan and have the perfect trip. With restaurants, attractions, hotels and TripAdvisor reviews you love, stored in the app, all available offline -- no data roaming charges! Key reasons millions of travelers love this app: FREE Need we say more? Download the app now, there’s absolutely no risk, and we’re sure you’ll love it! WORKS OFFLINE There is no need for a live data connection while using this app, as everything is stored on your phone, after you do an initial update. This means you won’t be charged for expensive data roaming, and the app is super fast to use. You can update user reviews periodically when you are on WiFi. RESTAURANTS, ATTRACTIONS, HOTELS All places that are listed on TripAdvisor.com in this city are included in the app. THOUSANDS OF USER REVIEWS TripAdvisor’s community of millions of worldwide travelers ensures that content is fresh, plentiful and honest. With over 50 million reviews and thousands more added daily, City Guides offer the best and most recent content. SELF-GUIDED TOURS TripAdvisor members and destination experts have handpicked the best itineraries in the city for you, enabling you to explore interesting neighborhoods, famous landmarks and hidden gems. Using the phone's GPS, you can follow along and read about the interesting sights along the route. CREATE YOUR OWN TRIP JOURNAL Want to remember the places you visit? It is now easy to do this with TripAdvisor City Guides. Simply Check In, take a photo and add a note for each location, and your journal and travel album will be created for you automatically. You can share it with friends and family on Facebook, or just use it to remember your trip. And, you can even Check In while you are offline and share later when you are online. POWERFUL YET EASY TO USE Searching for pizza around Times Square? Coffee near the Eiffel Tower? Or do you just want to find a highly recommended place near you? With this app you can easily search any way you want, and find exactly what’s best for you and your travel companions. POINT ME THERE Once you have selected a restaurant or attraction, this app will guide you there using the fun & useful “Point Me There” screen, which uses the phone’s GPS and Compass. CITY FACTS Written by TripAdvisor members and edited by professionals, City Facts articles provide helpful information for when you plan your trip, such as when to go, how to get around in the city, what neighborhoods to visit, etc. GPS-BASED This app leverages the GPS in the phone to show you the best restaurant, attractions etc nearby. The app also uses the compass to guide you to a place once you selected it
It is tempting your screen. Use your fingers to tap the screen and find out the unlock point to unlock it! The sexiest beauty! The most tempting screen-lock!

Astronomy ephemeris app for calculating high precision ephemeris and positions of Sun, Moon and the Planets for engaged amateur astronomers and planetary observers, prefering data and facts instead of pretty picture-apps. Planetdroid finds rise, culmination and set times, the beginning of seasons, lunar phases and planetary aspects. Augmented reality (AR) view: See the positions of planets or comets live on a camera image and search your selected object with your phone! Since version 3.0 Planetdroid comes with a visibility diagram. You see the elevation above the horizon of your selected body (white line) of the current nicht and the elevation of the sun (dark yellow line), as well as the twilight times. The horizontal black line ist the horizon, the vertical red line your selected time. Since version 3.3 it is possible to save locations offline. The file containing the locations is sdcard/.com.strickling/location.txt. It can be edited with any test editor. To start the editor, simply click menu in the location selection form. Download elements for asteroids and comets from the internet. Supports GPS localization. Calculates (select or deselect different items in the menu): - time of rise, culmination, set, - azimut of rise and set - equatorial right ascension and declination - ecliptical coordinates and distance - azimut an elevation - equation of time, true local time, sidereal time - diameter, brightness, central meridian, position angle of the axis - for comets and asteroids: motion velocity and direction - Civil, nautical and astronomic twilight - begin of the seasons, lunar phases, and lunar age - times of opposition, conjunction and greates elongation for planets. - time of perihelion for comets On some devices without front camera Google Play Store will indicate, that Planetdroid is not compatible with your device. The front camera is needed for the augmented reality screen. If you like to install Planetdroid without using augmented reality, please install it from my website: http://www.strickling.net/android_engl.htm#PlanetDroid Thanks to Mark Huss for his AstroLib containing the VSOP-routines and to the translators Nenad Trajkovic (Serbian), Alfredo Caronia (Italian), IDris a.k.a. MANsur, Ghost-Unit (Russian), Sizhuang Liu (Chinese), M. César Rodríguez (Spanish) and Osama Al Shammari (Arabic). Required Permissions: - Hardware controls: Camera. Required for AR. May cause compatibility refusal for devices without front camera. Try installation from my website! - Exact location: For site-specific calculations eg. rising and setting times. - Internet Access: Online access to asteroid and comet orbital databases and online selection of an observation site. - SD card access: Storing orbital elements data, settings and location coordinates for offline search. More translators are welcome! If you like this app and prefer using it in your language, contact me! Translation is very easy. Frequent users are asked to purchase the Planetdroid donation version to share the Android market fees. Bugs or problems found? Please send error report for error loclisation and removal or send an email instead of giving bad ratings! Key words: sun, moon, planet, planets, solar system, coordinates, position, physical ephemeris, planetoid, planetoids, asteroid, asteroids, comet, comets, ephemeris, sky, astronomy, observation, rise, set, culmination, azimuth, azimut, elevation, coordinates, position, physical ephemeris, conjunction, opposition, elongation, Augmented Reality, AR, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptun, Pluto, Ceres, Pallas, Juno, Vesta, droit, planetdroit, planet-droid, planetandroid, Planet droid

description: Nextdoor is the free, private social network for you, your neighbors and your community. It's the easiest way to connect and talk with your neighbors about the things that matter in your neighborhood. When neighbors start talking, good things happen. People across the country are using Nextdoor to: • Quickly get the word out about a break-in • Organize a neighborhood crime watch • Recommend a trustworthy babysitter • Find out who does the best paint job in town • Ask for help finding a lost dog • Find a new home for an outgrown bike • Finally remember your neighbors’ names To stay updated on Nextdoor news, follow us on Facebook and Twitter: • Facebook: www.facebook.com/nextdoor • Twitter: twitter.com/nextdoor

description: In this game we have to prepare our girlfriend for the Friday night party. She has many dresses and accessories and does not know which ones to wear, so she appeals to you. You have to choose between simple dresses blue, pink, scarlet, white or green, and the most special dresses, the big train puffed or white burgundy, open green , dark green, purple, a beautiful shade of orange and a very special color, brown. After choosing the dress that you like, you have to choose the hair. She is brunette but you have to choose a hairstyle, you can choose the hair in a bun, hair stretched, hair in bun with a tail or hair caught in two pigtails. Still you have to choose accessories, she has many and can not decide which one to wear. You can choose rings, earrings, bracelets, necklaces, pins, hair clips or gloves. The rings are pink, purple, green, gold and silver shoes are red, white, black or blue and boots they have available are yellow. You can choose between crowns of gold, pink, red or silver necklaces you can choose the color pink, blue or gold brick. After choosing these accessories, our friend is ready to party. Hopefully she will love the dress and the accessories because she has to look beautiful. Thank you for your help. Control: Play the game using your fingers.

Nike+ FuelBand is the smart, simple and fun way to get more active by measuring your everyday activity and turning it into NikeFuel. Your Nike+ FuelBand wirelessly connects to your app, allowing you to see your progress on your mobile device and get the motivation you need to get moving. · View your progress against your goal broken down by day, week, or month. · Save all your information directly to your Nike+ profile online. · Customize your device display, change the time and update your Daily Goal - straight from the app. · Track NikeFuel and intensity for specific activities with Nike+ Sessions. · Stay active by enabling Move Reminders in your Device Settings that encourage you to Win the Hour. · Compete for the top slot on your Friend leaderboard. · Stay constantly connected to your app with Bluetooth 4.0. To use this app, you’ll need a Nike+ FuelBand SE and a device running Android 4.3 or above. This app does not support the FuelBand 1.0. The Nike+ FuelBand app is optimized for the following devices: -Samsung Galaxy S5 -Samsung Galaxy S4 -Samsung Galaxy S3 -Nexus 5 -HTC One -Moto X

What is High-intensity interval training (HIIT)? High-intensity interval training (HIIT), also called high-intensity intermittent exercise (HIIE) or sprint interval training (SIT), is an enhanced form of interval training, an exercise strategy alternating periods of short intense anaerobic exercise with less-intense recovery periods. HIIT is a form of cardiovascular exercise. These short, intense workouts provide improved athletic capacity and condition, improved glucose metabolism, and improved fat burning. Why choose our mobile app for HIIT Cardio Training? Our HIIT sequences is built by HIIT professionals and our HIIT program is easy to learn and follow. Our app include powerful key features including: - HIIT Tutorial - HIIT Timer - Training Day Record - Facebook Community - Easy to Use Interface
