description: Tropical Fish Shop is beautiful, exotic and incredibly addictive! Follow Annabel in her amazing sea adventures, enjoy breathtaking scenery, and help her save the Tropical Fish Shop! Once upon a time, a young girl called Annabel wished she could leave her boring city job behind and stay in a tropical paradise. Once upon a time, a likeable Tropical Fish Shop owner, whose name we might never know, was struggling to save his store from being crushed by a mountain of debt. It was under a lucky star that the two of them found each other...but the owner of the struggling shop doesn't need just any old fish to keep his business afloat. Each day he gives Annabel a new list of specific items she needs to collect. Your job is to help our young heroine catch her quota. To check off everything on your list, you'll need to line up matching sea creatures of various types as fast as you can. You'll be angling for yellow-and-orange fish, pink seahorses, and bright-green jellyfish, just to name a few. If you match up more than three fish at one time you get a lift net, which allows you to capture one of any species you want. The faster and more efficient you are, the more bonuses you can earn. Don't worry if you get stuck--the game will bail you out with hints. There are fun twists along the way, such as an electric ray that zaps the surrounding fish if you move it. Be sure to watch out for air bubbles--you'll need to line those up to make sure you don't run out of oxygen. If you do, you'll be sleeping with the fishes, and not in a good way. See if you can collect all the trophies and help Annabel save the shop! From the creators of Shopper's Paradise! Follow a young girl in this amazing sea adventures and help her save the Tropical Fish Shop from going out of business. - beautiful high-resolution scenery - 43 levels, 2 mini-games, competitions: hours of gameplay - a new take on the classic genre

After you have polished the car must apply a coat of paint, choosing owner change his rims and if the owner wants, she can apply a tuning. Thank you for choosing this game and invite you to choose and other car games and games for girls to see if you're doing as well as you did before. Instructions: Use your fingers to play

nogago Hiking Biking Maps provides maps and navigation for Hikers, Road Cyclists and Mountain Bikers. NOW WITH WORLD-WIDE TOPOGRAPHIC MAPS. Map viewing, searching and navigation works always and anywhere with voice directions spoken in many languages. Our routing is optimized for hiking and biking. Compared to Google Maps and other online map services, nogago Maps has the following benefits: - works outside network coverage (i.e., abroad, on the plane, in the mountains, in that valley where coverage is shaky, ...) - avoids expensive data tariffs - gives you more usage time on your trips by consuming fewer power than online apps - does not track you in any way - more precise topographic information (thanks to Jonathan de Ferrantis' viewfinderpanorama elevation models). Download offline maps conveniently and with high speed while having network coverage. You can either download maps by searching for cities that you are interested to visit or navigate on the map to an area that you want to download. All maps, search and navigation features are also available online, in case you did not download a map yet. Map downloads are secured and carried out in German data centers. nogago Hiking Biking Maps & Navigation is open source and licensed under the GPL v3 ( http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html ). We are happy to have additional contributors, learn more at opensource.nogago.com nogago Hiking Biking Maps & Navigation has been forked from OSMAND to - improve usability, map handling and download - focus features on pedestrian/bike scenarios - manage and control what is transferred to which online provider Our future plans are to - implement your feature requests (send them to support@nogago.com ) - implement hillshading

description: ★ Top Developer (awarded 2013) ★ Sharing the same top quality gameplay, graphics and interface as the rest of our app library, Sudoku Free is an essential download for any Sudoku or brain training fan! You never need a paper puzzle again! - 1500 Sudoku puzzles over 5 difficulty levels, covering easy through to medium, hard, extreme levels. - Super smooth interface and graphics. - Statistics tracking, including fastest times, average times and completion % for each level. - Optional hints and board aids. - Two sets of Sudoku board art and fonts. - Two different modes for notes input to cater for all playing styles. - Undo supported. - Suitable for both Phones and Tablets. description: The very popular Bow Valley Mountain Bike Trail Guide is now available as an app! The Bow Valley app includes all Banff, Canmore and Lake Louise trails open to mountain biking; including all trails located at the Canmore Nordic Centre. Bonus trails include Pipestone and Bow River Loop, not included in the original book. Find and ride classic trails including Lake Minnewanka, Reclaimer and Moraine Lake Highline with ease. FEATURES •Complete maps, elevation profiles, trail descriptions •Location tracking enabled; showing you exactly where you are on the trail •Works without a cell signal or Wi-Fi, once the app is downloaded you’ll have full access to all maps even without cell reception •The FULL list of Canmore Nordic Centre summer trails is included; helping you get around this maze of trails •Auto pan and zoom maps to selected trails

Are you hoping your son will learn and fall in love with playing chess? Playing Chess has proven to help exercise both sides of the brain, increase one's IQ and helps in increasing problem-solving skills. However, many a times, children and even adults find it challenging to learn as there are many rules and a lack of interactivity and animation. Galaxy Chess is designed specially to help you learn chess easily. It is infused with 3D Alien Monsters, battle animations, explosions, lightning and bombs to help learning and playing chess fun, easy and addictive. Imagine the thrill of watching how your Queen zap the Bishop with a lightning bolt or the Rook check mate the King with fiery meteors! 3 Different Game-play to choose from: #1 : Play the classic Galaxy Chess Edition #2 : Play the Last Monster Standing Edition #3 : Play the Special Monster Chess Edition You can also design your own chess board and choose your winning colors! Be amazed with Galaxy Chess Please send any technical support to s4samueltan@gmail.com for faster response.

description: "Спорт-Экспресс" и МТС представляют приложение "Мой Футбол", в котором вы найдете все, чем живет чемпионат России по футболу. В вашем распоряжении - все самые оперативные новости, статьи, фото- и видеорепортажи, онлайн-трансляции и статистическая информация. Скачав приложение, вы сможете настроить его под себя – выбрать только те команды, за которым вы хотите следить. Вам станут доступны: - новости о ваших любимых командах в режиме online; - аналитические материалы лучших спортивных журналистов страны; - обновляемая лента фоторепортажей; -видеохайлайты и авторские телепрограммы; - текстовые трансляции всех встреч Российской футбольной премьер-лиги; - полная статистика всех турниров с 1992 года, включая турнирные таблицы, календари матчей, таблицы бомбардиров и ассистентов, информацию о желтых и красных карточках и средних оценках по амплуа. Просим сообщать о всех замечаниях и предложениях по работе приложения на наш электронный адрес - sport@sport-express.ru с пометкой Android в теме письма. Мы приложим все усилия, чтобы сделать приложение "СЭ" еще более качественным и удобным. "Sport-Express" and MTS are the application "My Football", where you will find everything that lives of the Russian football championship. At your disposal - all the latest news, articles, photos and video reports, online broadcast and statistical information. After downloading the application, you can configure it for yourself - choose only those commands for which you want to monitor. You will be available: - News about your favorite teams in the online; - Analytical materials of the best sports journalists in the country; - Updated photo reports tape;  -Videohaylayty copyrights and television programs; - A text translation of all meetings of the Russian Premier League; - Full statistics of all tournaments since 1992, including standings, calendars matches scorers table and assistants, information on yellow and red cards and the average score on the line. description: TALKING RAPPER does much more than just talk. Instead of only responding to touch or simply repeating what he hears, you can do much more with this cool guy: play with a beatbox – complete with tons of hot beats and jammin’ sounds, scratch the record, paint graffiti on the wall and invite your friends. Discover all the possibilities of “TALKING RAPPER” and learn just what it takes to be a successful rap artist. ★ WHAT FANS ARE SAYING ★ + “I love the beatbox! It’s a great addition and I can spend hours and hours making beats.” + “Painting graffiti has never been my thing, but I’m slowly picking it up.” WHAT YOU CAN DISCOVER WITH TALKING RAPPER! * Talk to him and he’ll repeat what you say. * Discover all his movements. * Have him play a real beatbox. * Scratch the record with your favorite song. * Paint graffiti and send it to your friends. Record a video and share it with the world! Enjoy the new update! We've improved the application and increased its functionality speed! Now you can play non-stop! AND MORE… TWO HIGH-QUALITY INSTRUMENTS TALKING RAPPER includes two fun musical instruments typical of the rap scene. 1. Enjoy your very own BEATBOX. Have fun crafting your own beats or adjust the rhythms ones already included. Combine them however you’d like! 2. SCRATCH the record to your favorite song! Pick one from your music library and start scratching away. It’s never been this easy!

Logic dice game is very addictive dice puzzle game for android. It puts your intelligence, agility and eye-hand coordination up to test. If you like games like 2048 or threes then you should like our game as well. Game instructions: - rotate the dice to find the number displayed in dice menu. When you find the number touch it to claim the points. - if the dice shows number larger than 6 it means you have to touch more than one side to obtain the number of dots. If for instance dice shows 0/9 it means you have to touch 6 (dice will display 6/9) and then 3. Or 5 and 4. The moves shows how many moves you can make to reach the goal. Contains three difficulty levels and two play modes: - normal mode: you have only few seconds to reach the goal - after you do so the timer resets and you have another few seconds to reach next goal. - time trial - you have 60 seconds (or less in normal and hard difficulty) to grab as many goals as possible. Logic dice game contains the leaderboards which means you can compete with the friends.

description: Fill your screen with this Viking and join to Arka Gdynia Fans

Take role of an engigmatic space rocket pilot/designer! Use these rockets to take revenge upon your enemies! Rocket Thruster gives you an ability to remote-control a multi-purpose rocket and use it to explore vast levels, collect valuable minerals and complete various tasks. You are going to face an inhospitable world, full of diversed traps - starting from an unstable gravity fields, through narrow tunnels full of rough rocks and even security turrets. Remember that you are alone against your foes - only your skill can help you with the journey. Apart from that there's few helpful things. One of them is a hook on a chain, that your rocket is equipped with. With its help you can unlock closed passages, steal resources from your enemies or simply avoid an imminent crash. The other useful thing are upgrade system, which will allow you to buy various upgrades for collected minerals. But be careful - destroying your current rocket means destroying its upgrades as well... Face Rocket Thruster today!

Please read before you download: This program will not help you hack native android games, it was created for the old console games. If you love retro games and using emulators to play them, then this app is for you. UniPatcher allows you to apply patches to the game rom. What is a patch ? The patch is a file with the modified data of the game. For example, a game translated from Japanese to English. You download the patch containing the translation. It must be applied to the Japanese version to get the English version. Unipatcher supports the most popular formats patches: • IPS for Nintendo, Super Nintendo, Sega MegaDrive / Sega Genesis, Gameboy and other games • UPS is widely used in the Game Boy Advance and other games • PPF created for Sony PlayStation games • DPS for some Nintendo DS games How to use? Very simple: • Choose a patch • Choose a game • Click "Save" Very important: if the game and patch compressed (zip, rar, 7z or other), they first need to unzip (I recommend the free program ZArchiver). Additional features: • Fix checksum in Sega Mega Drive ROMs • Add/Delete SMC header in Super Nintendo ROMs If you have any problems with the program please contact me by e-mail mashin87@gmail.com . In a letter to specify the full name of the game and the patch (better add the patch in attachment). So we can solve your problem quickly.

description: ICE Data Provider allows easy access to vital ICE (in case of emergency) information, in times of emergency. Split into two activities (emergency contacts list, and medical notes page), the system helps to simplify data retrieval for first responders and medical professionals. The contacts section, allows you to quickly select contacts from your phone and add them to your ICE contact list. The medical notes section provides access to all relevant medical information through a single page. This makes ICE Data Provider a fast, simple, and exceptionally effective way to relay vital personal and medical information, during emergency situations.

Andhra Bank “Safe-T” Mobile Application allows you to generate One Time Password (OTP) instantly for authenticating transactions in Internet Banking rather than receiving it through SMS. All that is required is to follow simple steps for registration. Registration Steps: 1. Download Andhra Bank “Safe-T”application on the registered mobile phone. 2. Login to Andhra Bank Internet Banking, select “Safe-T” Tab, click on register option, select mobile phone device type, Set PIN on Internet Banking and receive activation URL on your registered mobile Number. 3. Click on the activation URL received in the SMS to activate or paste the activation URL received in the SMS on the Safe-T mobile application. 4. Use six digits PIN set in STEP-2 to generate OTP on Safe-T mobile application on your device. Enter the same generated OTP to activate Safe-T Mobile Application in Internet Banking. Note: 1. The app generates OTP/OAC on entry of the wrong PIN, but the same will not be accepted by the system for authorisation of Internet Banking transaction. Only the OTP/OAC generated using the PIN which has been set in the step 2 of registration process will be valid. 2. GPRS connectivity is required for the activation process

Discover How Project Management Can Be Made Easy! Project management consists of more than just a large building project and can encompass small projects as well. No matter what the size of your project, you need to have some sort of project management. How you manage your project has everything to do with its outcome. Whether you are a project manager who is in charge of a large company project or you have a small project that you need to complete, you need to know the basics of project management. Trying to get a project off the ground can be daunting, as can the problems that can come with the project. You might run into snags during your project that may cause you some headaches. Project management can be one challenge after another. If you have been feeling overwhelmed when it comes to project management and a bit disorganized, you can benefit from this book. Once you learn the secrets to project management, you can learn not only how to successfully manage your projects at work, but also to manage individual projects. Here is what you will discover inside... ★ Chapter 1 – Introduction ★ Chapter 2 – Creating A Project Management Methadology ★ Chapter 3 – Where Does The Buck Stop? ★ Chapter 4 – Can You Manage Yourself Out Of A Paper Bag? ★ Chapter 5 – Setting The Stage For A Successful Project ★ Chapter 6 – The Importance Of Developing And Maintaining A Budget ★ Chapter 7 – Taking Action - Execution Of The Plan ★ Chapter 8 – Rules To Manage By ★ Chapter 9 – Your Personality And Project Management Style ★ Chapter 10 – The Cycle Of Decision Making ★ Chapter 11 – Getting Your Project Back On Track ★ Chapter 12 – Keeping It Moving ★ Chapter 13 -Problems and Solutions You will learn how you can make your project work and be the successful project manager. *** On Sale Now! (Normal Price $19.99) *** Get it now before promotion ends!

Funmotion provides fun and easy way to create your stop motion clip. Tap and hold to record your video, and use it repeatedly to create your sequences. Simply click the tick button when you are ready and have your clip ready. Quick, simple, fun and easy. Explore your creativity and share your clip with your friends. How to use fun motion? - Tap and hold anywhere on the screen to record your video - Tap repeatedly to create sequences - When you are done, tap the tick button on the right to finalise your clip You can also create lapse alike video by tapping your screen faster. The duration of your tap decides the frame rate for your stop motion video. Happy exploring! description: Birthdays, Valentines Day, Special Occasion, Love, New Years, Easter, Thank You, Christmas, Greeting card app, Cards "R" Us Cards "R" Us is an app that allows you to send personalized greetings along with recorded messages to your friends and relatives. The cards can be sent via email or text SMS. Users can set remainders in the app. There are 8 categories of cards in the app. Each category has 40 cards divided in 5 sections. BlingBoard is an all in one social widget that combines your Missed calls, SMS, Gmail, Twitter and Facebook widgets in one android widget on your home screen. With BlingBoard you can stay updated with your friends, colleagues and family, and interact with them quickly and effortlessly. It’s free, fun and easy to use! THE PRESS "BlingBoard is a really nice, easy-to-use app that centralise all your main communication activity"(TheNextWeb) "The ultimate social widget for Android bringing everything from Gmail, Twitter, missed calls and more into one easy to use and beautiful widget." (AndroidCommunity) "Blingboard is a stunning little widget that looks great and is both convenient to glance at email, calls, text and social networks plus it is fun to use" (AndroidTapp) 2 WIDGET SIZES: 4x2 Widget with messages content 4x1 Notification Widget WHAT SOCIAL NOTIFICATIONS - Missed Calls - SMS Messages - Gmail unread count - Facebook news feeds (similar to Facebook widget) - Twitter feed items (similar to Twitter widget) REPLY INSTANTLY - Dial to your Missed Calls - Reply to SMS messages - Launch Gmail - Facebook: Check links directly from the widget (YouTube videos will launch the YouTube App, etc..) - Twitter: Check links directly from tweets - Simply launch the related app when no notifications. EASY ON THE EYES Designed from the grounds-up with simplicity in mind without compromising functionality. FREE Did we mention it’s free? HOW TO INSTALL After downloading BlingBoard you will need to add the widget to your homescreen. At your home screen: Menu > Add > Widgets > BlingBoard. For more help please visit our website: http://jappka.com/Android/BlingBoard/faq.html CLEAR OPTION Use the sweep button to clear notifications from the selected tab. The clear button will remove items from BlingBoard widget only. NOTES - Up to 20 message/feed items for each tab - Up to 140 characters for each message/feed item - SMS: only new sms messages will be displayed, SMS messages prior to BlingBoard installation will NOT be displayed --------------------------------------------------------- If you have any feedbacks or suggestions, we are always happy to hear from our users! Please email us at: support@jappka.com or follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/JappkaApps --------------------------------------------------------- Try our other apps: ------------------- Bataria - Battery Power Saver Bataria Pro Battery Currents

With vivid colors and playful sound effects, toddlers will learn to solve a series of puzzles in the shapes of well-known farm animals (such a cow, a horse, a rooster, and more!). If you've unlocked the full version previously but the puzzles are still locked, please tap one of the locked puzzles and select the "Already purchased? Restore your access!" option.

description: This is the contact editor (and only the editor) from the Android 2.1 sources. I just fixed it to make it work with arbitrary contact sources (like CardDAV-Sync) and removed the dependencies on the internal API to make it work with Android 2.2 and later. So all credits go to Google. This editor is a replacement/alternative for your native editor and it's invoked in the same way. It will be started whenever you try to edit or create a contact (and you select "Contact Editor Free"). If you can edit all your contacts you may not have any benefits from this app. It is useful if you use some custom Sync-Adapter that does not feature its own editor (like CardDav-Sync) and your editor can not edit those contacts. However some people reported it is useful if your phone's manufacturer removed the ability to edit custom labels. Also, have a look at "Contact Editor Pro" an improved version of this editor. ( https://market.android.com/details?id=org.dmfs.android.contacteditorpp ) Get support and news via Twitter https://twitter.com/dmfs_org This app can not edit or remove contacts from read-only sources like Facebook or Cloudtact! This is due to the definition of read-only! Also, if you see a blank screen when editing contacts that are aggregated with a Facebook contact, try to remove and recreate your Facebook account. Facebook limits access from other apps which breaks the contacts API in a way. For further information see http://techcrunch.com/2011/02/22/google-android-facebook-contacts/ Note regarding Events: There is a big problem with events in this editor (better: with Android). The Android SDK documentation states about the database column for the date: 'The event start date as the user entered it.' Unfortunately does every manufacturer have it's own opinion about the format. Some are happy with 'yyyy-mm-dd', my phone uses unix timestamps. So if your phone doesn't accept the 'yyyy-mm-dd' format try entering a unix-timestamp ;-). Seriously, I think about removing this feature until I've found a proper solution. You can help by sending me mails with your phone model, os version and which formats work or don't work for you. Btw: just writing a comment like "Doesn't work on..." won't help neither you nor me to get it running on your device. Please contact me if you have problems. Please report bugs by sending me a mail stating what happened and what you did before it happened. Often the Market bug reports are not very helpful without additional informations. known issues: * on some devices this app hangs when it is opened. If this happens to you, please send me an email! * crashes in some very rare cases. I've no further information about those cases and I'm not able to reproduce them. Please send me an email with your phone model, your OS version and what kind of sync-adapters you have installed. Thanks!
release_text: --- new in 0.6.3.1 -- fix launcher label (was "edit contact" but should be "create contact") --- new in 0.6.3 -- Add launcher icon that always starts with a new contact. This is meant as a workaround for HTC One users. HTC Sense doesn't invoke 3rd party editors when creating new contacts.

description: Version 3.0! Brand New Version! - Completely revamped user interface - Integrated with Translink to look at other stops besides just the UBC bus loop - Post status to other users on a social board Do you go to University of British Columbia and take the bus frequently? Do you wonder if the bus loop is really packed at the moment? Students can submit information about how busy a bus stop is and other students can read this information! You can find out how busy your stop is with the help of other students get a seat on the bus and avoid those packed buses. With Translink integration, you can now look at bus information for any stop in Vancouver! You can look at real time bus arrivals and real time GPS bus tracking.

Tic-tac-toe (or Noughts and crosses, Xs and Os) is a game for two players, X and O, who take turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid. The player who succeeds in placing three respective marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game. The game allows you to: 1. Play against the computer and against each other - Vs Computer or Vs Human 2. Change the graphics of the game - change skin (Rings, Crown, Sports, Makeup, Sstandard) 3. Players choose names 4. Choose an X or O If you want to propose marriage in an original way... or to give a hint about marriage play with the ring skin :) You should select menu - and choose a ring :) Good luck! Created by Androcalc More free android applications on www.androcalc.com

This widget will help you to start your prefered apps or call your best friends - but with style! !NEW! moved swipe functions to new free app 'CircleLauncher Swipe' You can add some frequently used apps, contacts or bookmarks to this launcher and start those apps, contacts or bookmarks with one click from a circle, a horizontal or a vertical line. Use the included launcher icons, load your own image or use a icon from any icon pack (CircleLauncher icon packs, ADW and Go Launcher icon packs supported). If you slide over the icons, they are animated a little bit mac-like ... just try it! Parallax FX [beta]: look behind the widget like on iOS7! This effect can be enabled in the settings: 'More Settings' > 'More ...' > 'Parallax FX' - the result is highly dependent on the sensor in your phone ... some are perfect, other will not work very well. Looks best with '3D Image Live Wallpaper' :-) Additional features in the full version: - custom icons for the icon on the homescreen - support for ADW icon packs for the icon on the homescreen - vertical and horizontal launcher versions Some icons in the screenshots are from 'CircleLauncher IconPack One', 'Minimal UI', 'Glasklart Go Nova Apex Theme', 'Circles Theme', 'Motif' and 'Rain' - the clock is 'lockscreen watch'. Please don't move the app to the sd card - it won't work! If you noticed a bug or have any questions, please send me an eMail. Required permissions: Directly call phone numbers - direct calls for the contact version direct from the app Read contact data - is required to display the contact list Read browser's history and bookmarks - is required to display the bookmark list Modify/delete USB storage contents modify/delete sd card contents - reading and writing of the backup files Control vibrator - optional vibration if the launcher will open French translation by Johan Jaworski. Chinese translation by Leo Yang.

description: Olena Shypilova presents the free course “French in 7 Lessons” for RUSSIAN speakers, a program that will help you bring your French skills to a level of comfortable communication on basic topics! The program is presented by the site http://speakasap.com . Tailored to beginners, this course is simple, logical, structured and short. The course includes only Basic French grammar, the type of grammar used most by people all over the world for everyday communication in French. Every lesson is offered in audio format: we provide understandable explanations that make it easy for you to listen to our course anytime on the go. All the exercises address a specific topic with useful and common vocabulary. All answers are provided in audio format. In contrast to typical exercises where you simply click on the correct translation of a word or the correct verb form, leading to boredom and the inability to think on your own, we composed our exercises in a different way. In our exercises you translate the whole sentence at once. You can always check your answers. You will find 80% of all words used in the exercises either in the lesson materials or in previous exercises, so it’s not necessary to consult a dictionary all the time. Moreover, memorizing new words comes with practice, especially when you construct phrases or sentences without assistance. In case you don’t understand something, just consult our language support. You can just write us an e-mail from the application or contact us using the Skype application on your phone. Just call Language Support and have your questions explained. Write us at admin@speakasap.com Install! Test it! Let us know about bugs! Study with pleasure! For additional information refer to our site http://speakasap.com/ru/french-in-7-lessons.html The course’s founder is Olena Shypilova and the speakASAP team.

description: ◆◆◆【重要なお知らせ】月額課金方法変更のお知らせ◆◆◆ ポケットメディカアプリのご利用ありがとうございます。 この度、有料機能が開放される月額課金方法がdocomoSPモード決済からGoogle Playのアプリ内課金へ変更になりました。 基本無料である点は今までとかわりございません。 ◆「アンチエイジング＋ダイエット」について◆ 本アプリは、体の若さを保ちならがら健康的なダイエットをサポートするアプリです。 毎日のダイエット記録をつけていくことで、独自の判定方法によって算出される「体年齢」が表示されます。「体年齢」を意識し、基礎代謝を高めるための運動を行いながらダイエットすることで健康的な身体作りができます。 ◆「体年齢」を若くするためのポイント◆ 単に体重のみを落とし、体脂肪率に変化がないと「体年齢」が上がってしまう場合もあります。 「体年齢」を若くするためには「基礎代謝」を高めることです。「基礎代謝」を高めるためには、継続して軽い運動を行い筋肉量を維持・増進するように心がけましょう。「基礎代謝」高めつつ、体脂肪率を落して行くことで理想の体に近づき、「体年齢」も若くなっていきます。 ◆利用上の注意◆ 「体年齢」は統計データをもとに、弊社が独自の判定方法によって算出しています。本アプリにおいて表示される「体年齢」はあくまで健康の「目安」として認識し、ご活用ください。 「体年齢」は測定時間や水分の補給時間によって変化しやすい数値になります。「体年齢」が実年齢を上回った等で過度に数値を意識し、急に激しい運動に取り組むことは体を壊しかねませんので、くれぐれもご注意ください。 本アプリの利用およびダイエットの実施は、いずれも自己責任で行うものとします。本アプリを利用したダイエットにおいてトラブルが発生した場合でも、株式会社C2ではその賠償の責任を一切負わないものとします。 過度なダイエットは控えていただいた上で、ダイエット中に体の異変を感じたときは、直ちに医師にご相談ください。 ◆月額課金方法◆ 月額課金をしていただきますと、便利機能が開放されます。 課金方法はGoogle Playから『ポケットメディカアプリ』をダウンロードしていただき、アプリ内課金で『月額課金』を購入していただきます。 『ポケットメディカアプリ』で『月額課金』を購入していただきますと『家庭の医学forポケットメディカ』『処方薬事典forポケットメディカ』『アンチエイジング＋ダイエットforポケットメディカ』の便利機能が同時に開放されます。 サービスの詳細は、アプリ版ポケットメディカのwebページ（ http://pocketmedica.jp/pocket_all_app.html ）をご覧ください。 ◇◆アプリの権限について◆◇ 「ネットワーク通信」 起動画面で他のおすすめアプリを紹介するために利用しています。

description: A safe, simple and free weight conversion application. Conversions made easy! Mark units as favorites and start converting values right away! Do quick conversions between: grams (g) kilograms (kg) tonnes (metric, uk, usa) newton hundredweight oz (ounce) pounds (lbs, lb) grain stone Simply type the numeric value into the text field, and wait for the keyboard to disappear. The converted values should all appear after the value was set. You may repeat this process to do multiple conversions. This app can be used for almost anything related to weight e.g. cooking, physics, engineering, exercise, weight loss its practical application is basically endless. You can also make use of the web version of this app: http://www.meerkathut.com/webapps/weight_conversion/ For more information and news please visit our website: http://www.meerkathut.com Please note: The calculated values are only accurate within certain number ranges. This product does not guarantee the accuracy or correctness any of its results, please use the results at own risk. We do collect anonymous usage-data (non-personal anonymous data).

With Solo you can play to your favourite songs on a virtual guitar, or create some of your own...It's ideal for jamming sessions when you don't have your guitar with you, or an excellent reference for when you do! NOTE: SOLO LITE HAS BEEN REPLACED BY A NEW APP, SOLO AIR. Solo Air still contains all the original features from Solo, and a few more (like support for smart watches, improved UI, etc.) It is geared towards more modern devices, so if you have a relatively new device, download Solo Air instead. This is a free demo version and includes: * Great, authentic sounding acoustic guitar * The same huge chord library available in the full version, with chord diagrams * Hear and see how each chord is played. * Strumming playing style, or pinger picking on a fret board supported * Play with a capo to fit your vocal range * Create and load custom chord layouts * Uses Immersion’s MOTIV haptic effects for advanced haptic feedback * Many settings to customize to your playing style Also available in the full version, or in this app through in-app purchases: * Classical guitar, 12 string guitar and electric guitars, each with authentic sound * Create your own chords * Play along to any music loaded on your phone * Get chord and lyric overlays from the web - excellent for teaching yourself new songs to play * Create, load and save chord layouts for your favourite songs * Customize the UI to fit your playing style * Record and export what you play to save ideas for later use ABOUT PERMISSIONS: Solo Lite is a freemium app, that is ad supported and it uses in app purchases to obtain full version features. (Don't hate me, even developers have to make a living :). For this, the app requires a few extra permissions (these are in the Lite version only, the full version has no ads or extra permissions). Below is a description of how these permissions are used: ************************************************************** Required permissions for Solo Lite and the full version: INTERNET ACCESS - Used for downloading lyric overlays, syncing purchased features, in-app billing and ads VIEW NETWORK STATE - Solo checks if internet connection is up and enables/disables online features as appropriate STORAGE - Used to backup/restore chords on the SD Card ************************************************************** Permissions only required in Solo Lite. These are not used in the full version: READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY - Only used to access the device ID. Solo does NOT access phone calls, etc. only the device ID (needed to uniquely identify the device and sync previously upgraded features) The "Read phone state and identity" permission doesn't give devs access to passwords or other personal identity information. The only id obtained from this is the phone's IMEI number, which is a unique serial number tied to every device with a sim card. Knowing this number does not give devs access to any personal information, it only provides a way for us to reliably distinguish between different devices. GET_ACCOUNTS - This is used by GetJar to identify users across multiple devices. This way, features upgraded through GetJar will still be available if you change your phone and reinstall the app on a new device. It is also used by in app billing to link purchases with your email account. GET_TASKS - Used by the GetJar SDK. Not used any longer, but retained to support users who previsouly upgraded features via GetJar. BILLING - Used for in-app purchases through Google Play and Samsung COARSE LOCATION - Approximate network based location only. Used to serve more useful ads. SYSTEM WINDOW - Used to show an ad on exit instead of on start-up. This makes the app start faster.
release_text: v1.70 Fixed possible crash on Android Lollipop when using vibration Introducing Solo Air v1.67 Fixed bug where full version upgrades had to be synced on every restart Fixed Fret Mode zombie pointer drawing bug v1.66 Replaced GetJar upgrades with Google Play In-App Purchases Replaced some start-up ads with ads on exit, for faster app loading Fixed bug preventing some users from retrieving previous upgrades through GetJar * PLEASE SEE APP DESCRIPTION FOR INFO REGARDING PERMISSIONS

description: This is a free app. TCL nScreen Pro help to connect your smart phone to your smart TV through WI-FI, then you can you can show the video / Music / Picture in your smart phone to your smart TV with your family & friend , and you can use the smart phone as a remote control unit to operate TV by the Remote control application. This app will help you take full advantage of your TV's big screen and good sound. This app should be installed to you android smart phone. Main Features: 1. Media sharing: Simplay transfer your phone's photo, music and video to your Smart TV to diskplay or play, so you can take advantage of your TV's big screen. 2. TV Remote control: Allows controlling your smart TV simply over the local network. your phone can act as a Touch pad or TV Remote(IR Remote). 3. YouTube video shared to smart TV. How to connect your smart phone to your smart TV: 1. Your phone and TV should connect to the same wilreless router, be sure to keep them in the same local network. 2. This app was only tested for TCL SmartTV. Theoretically, it can be used for other TV which support DLNA. 3. TV Remote Control function doesn't work for non-TCL smart tv. Media Share works for most of SAMSUNG, LG, SONY, Toshiba Smart TV. 4. This app can works with the following SmartTVs, If this app is ok for you, please response your SmartTV's Model name, these info will help other users. Support non TCL models (provided by users, not tested by developer): SAMSUNG 6400, SAMSUNG 40 6203 GXD LG 47LM, LG 47LW5700, LG 42LN5710, LG 42LW573S,LG lb652v,LG PB6600,LG 47LM6400 Sony BRAVIA, Sony Xperia,Sony Z1 lzh620 Details step of media sharing: 1.Click “TCL nScreen” on smart phone. Connect smart phone with smart TV via same Wi-Fi; 2.Click “Media Sharing” to browse media files; 3.Send media to TV to playback. (with one of the following options) a)Drag & Drop folder/file to the TV icon on top of the screen; b)Swing phone towards TV to launch the first file; c)Play the media on phone and click the TV sharing icon; 4. While playing on TV, shake the phone to play previous or next file Details step of Remote control 1. Click “TCL nScreen” on Smartphone. Connect Smartphone and Smart TV to the same Wi-Fi router; 2. Click “Remote Control” to operate Smart TV.

"This had to be one of the most creative apps I have reviewed..." -Android Authority, Jan 2012 INTRODUCTION: Control over personal information is your universal human right and PlaceMask Location Privacy for Android™ assists you in maintaining location privacy against threats accessing your GPS and Network location (e.g. location-based advertising and profiling apps). We are focused on delivering technologies that reduce location leakage from on-board GPS and Wireless Network location sources to protect your privacy. Your mobile carrier may still know where you are (roughly) but the applications on your device will not be able to use your GPS or Network location without your permission. If you want to anonymize your country (for apps like Netflix that look up your location from IP address), consider also using a proxy network. We also recognize a number of other uses for this technology when combined with your location-based apps (e.g. including virtual tourism and misrepresentation). You will find this a useful companion to: Angry Birds and Carrier IQ (privacy), Wikitude and Google Places (tourism), or Facebook and Foursquare (spoofing). To learn more about the ways your location is determined and what you can do to stop it, please visit our website at http://www.PlaceMask.com KEY FEATURES: • Three privacy settings (minimum, medium, maximum) that monitor settings, replace real location, and randomize movement to enhance privacy • Scans applications on your device and reports those that use your location with context menu convenience functions • Provides a status view of your "current" location and the policies in force • Runs as a resident service that always watches for location leakage • Easy unmasking to use real location when you need it (e.g. simply tap the PlaceMask to start and stop) • Trial period lasts 15 days (360 hours) QUICK TEST: Activate PlaceMask service at the medium privacy level then switch to another location-based app to view your device in a new location. FUNCTIONALITY: PlaceMask Location Privacy for Android™ is an application that protects your location privacy. It monitors the location settings of your device and provides replacement locations to the other applications to enhance your privacy. You may view the current status of the application through key settings overlaid onto a map view. You may access a list of alerts related to the operation of the application or retrieve a report of all the applications on your device that use your location in some way. The settings in PlaceMask Location Privacy allow you to adjust application parameters like privacy levels. And of course, we have provided an easy way for you to recommend PlaceMask Location Privacy to a friend or colleague by launching a text message from the application. CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE: You are the most important part of this software and we believe usability is a key attribute to its success. If you find anything that you do not understand or is difficult to learn, remember, or use efficiently - please let us know. Your satisfaction is our objective. REFUNDS AND SUPPORT: Comments in the Market are not the most effective way to get support (but we love great reviews!). If you have an issue, please send a report to support@placemask.com with the following information: summary of problem, platform description, expected behavior, observed behavior, and steps to reproduce the problem. If we are not able to satisfactorily address your issue, we are happy to provide a refund. APPEAL FOR FREEDOM Software Products that assist you in preserving privacy are important to maintaining personal freedom. Please help us make this product a success by purchasing it, using it, recommending it, and being a champion for location privacy in your community.
release_text: Release 1.3.1.348 Bug Fix: SMS receiver NPE (premium version) Bug fix: Remove SMS receiver (trial version) Release 1.3.0.345 Trial Feature: Trial period set to 15 days Premium Feature: Remote SMS start and stop (premium) Bug Fix: Trap exception related to Mock Location setting Release 1.2.9.328 Feature: Address geocoding search for replacement locations Feature: Option to set movement radius Feature: Added Korean translation Bug fix: PlaceMask masked but service not running

description: This handy chess rating calculator app can calculate the expected score, rating change and performance rating of your chess games. It uses FIDEs official rating rules and includes the new 400 rating difference rule used in the ELO rating system. You can enter game data and the rating calculations are automatically saved, so you do not need to re-enter them if you add further games later on. You can save a rating list as a tournament to keep track of your results and improvements from tournament to tournament (this last feature is only available in the full version) Furthermore, various k-factors are supported - also non-FIDE k-factors used by many national chess federations, so you can use this app for local tournaments as well.
release_text: Version 1.10: * Android 5.0 support. * Support for FIDE new k factor of 40.

Adaptxt Chinese Keyboard Adaptxt Chinese keyboard offers a wide range of valuable features that includes accurate word prediction and next word prediction for all input methods including Pinyin, Zhuyin, Bihua and Cangjie. Adaptxt learns from you as you start typing and provides personalized suggestion. Its smart context based suggestion feature along with error correction capability provides an improved typing experience with minimal keystrokes. Adaptxt Chinese keyboard offers a variety of methods for fast and easy input of Chinese characters; it supports both simplified and traditional Chinese input methods including Pinyin, Zhuyin, Cangjie and Bihua. The Chinese dictionary also includes commonly used SMS slang that makes casual interactions easy and fun with family and friends. Key Features: • Error correction, word prediction and next word prediction • Sentence Mode Suggestion (SMS) for input methods including Zhuyin and Cangjie • Regional Dictionary support for: o Simplified Chinese (China) o Traditional Chinese (Taiwan) o Traditional Chinese (Hong Kong) • Learns from the user • Provides context based suggestions • Supports Pinyin, Zhuyin, Cangjie and Bihua • Supports Fuzzy Pinyin • Supports abbreviation match which suit for Pinyin, Zhuyin, Cangjie and Bihua • Supports self-composing new words • Supports Quick Cangjie • 12-key and Qwerty layout support • Multi-screen and device compatibility For issues/feature requests on Adaptxt Chinese Keyboard: http://www.adaptxt.com/forum or email us at support@adaptxt.com For FAQ: http://www.adaptxt.com/faq

description: Find jobs using Indeed, the most comprehensive search engine for jobs. Send a reminder to apply later Personalise - Save or email your favourite jobs - Create a free Indeed account - Follow favourite companies to get the latest jobs and news - Have the newest jobs delivered to your inbox - See which jobs you’ve visited and saved Research - Preview page displays full description of job posting - See how companies rate, as evaluated by employees - Read reviews of companies posted by over 3 million employees - See photos of what it’s like to work at companies before you apply - Review your own employer Please send feedback to android@indeed.com

description: NAVIGON - navigation GPS pour la France +++ La version plus récente - 5.4.1 - est maintenant disponible +++ Important : - L’appli a besoin de données supplémentaires à télécharger via WiFi (WLAN) Grâce au NAVIGON, vous transformez votre smartphone Android en système de navigation mobile haut de gamme. Le système «On Board Navigation» permet d’éviter les frais de transfert de données et d’itinérance (roaming), par exemple pour le calcul d’itinéraires et l'affichage cartographique. *** Fonctionnalités *** + Affichage des panneaux tels que de dépassements interdits, risque d'accident etc. + Support Bluetooth : Écoutez en même temps les instructions via votre autoradio Bluetooth ainsi que la musique de votre smartphone (A2DP) + Assistant de voies et Assistant de voies actif (animé) + Latest map guarantee : les cartes les plus actuelles en achat de l’appli + HERE et Foursquare Local Search* + Glympse : Envoyez votre position actuelle à vos contacts sélectionnés. + Info zone danger (installations fixe) + Reality View Pro + Alerte vitesse : Affichage de limitation vitesse avec alerte en cas de dépassement + NAVIGON Reality Scanner : Trouvez des destinations spéciales avec cette fonction « Augmented Reality » + NAVIGON MyRoutes : L’appli calcule jusqu’a 3 routes en parallèle + Text-to-Speech et annonces vocales précises + Navigation piétonne étendue + Cartographie 2D et 3D (bird view) + Cartographie HERE (précédemment Navteq) pour la France et Monaco *Le service nécessite une connexion de données Enrichissez votre système avec des fonctions in-app : + Urban Guidance : Naviguez dans des centres urbains avec des transports en commun** + Panorama View 3D : Affichage de la carte avec des montagnes et des vallées + NAVIGON FreshMaps XL : Recevez la carte de l'Europe (44 pays) et régulièrement des cartes mises à jour*** + NAVIGON cockpit : Présentation graphique animée des donnés conduite + TrafficLive : Informations routières en temps réel * + Destination spéciale pack tout-en-1 : Plus de 100 mille destinations spéciales supplémentaires + Mobile Alert Live : Ce service vous informe des zones danger sur votre route dans votre pay (installations mobiles)* + Mobile Alert Live Premium : Comme Mobile Alert Live mais pour toute l'Europe. En plus : avertissement des radars mobiles, y compris au niveau de la fiabilité, le temps depuis la dernière signalisation et le nombre de rapporteurs dans votre region* + NAVIGON LPG and Bio-Diesel filling stations : Trouvez les stations GPL, GNV et gazole écologique + Smartwatch Connect : Permet la navigation piétonne sur le Sony SmartWatch 2 ou le Samsung GALAXY Gear 2. Nécessite l'installation gratuite NAVIGON SmartWatch Connect, disponible ici sur Google Play, ou NAVIGON Smartwatch Connect Gear disponible sur le GALAXY Gear Manager. *Le service nécessite une connexion de données **Disponible en Europe dans plus de 65 zones de concentration urbaine. Le service requiert une connexion de données ***Le service est garanti pour min. 24 mois Remarque : - NAVIGON est une solution « on-board » : la cartographie, les voix et les données du système sont sauvegardées sur le téléphone, ce qui permet d’éviter les frais et la perte de temps liés au transfert des données. - La version requiert environ 1.6GB d’espace libre. Assurez-vous de disposer d’une mémoire suffisante. Le téléchargement de la cartographie s’effectue après l'installation par WiFi (WLAN) sur le Smartphone. Assurez-vous de disposer d'une connexion stable et sûre. - Au premier démarrage ca. 25kB sont envoyé pour l’enregistrement de votre produit. NAVIGON vous souhaite une navigation optimale, en voiture, en vélo ou à pied ! www.navigon.com/facebook www.navigon.com/twitter NAVIGON - GPS navigation for France +++ The latest version - 5.4.1 - is now available +++ Important: - The app needs more data to download via WiFi (WLAN) With NAVIGON you can transform your Android smartphone into a high-end mobile navigation system. The "On Board Navigation" system avoids data transfer and roaming charges (roaming), for example, for route calculation or map displays. *** Features *** + Display panels such as prohibited overruns, risk of accidents etc. + Bluetooth Support: Listen to the instructions at the same time via your Bluetooth radio and music from your smartphone (A2DP) + Lane Assistant and Active Lane Assistant (animated) + Latest map guarantee: the most current maps app purchase + HERE Local Search and Foursquare * + Glympse: Send your current location to your selected contacts. + Info hazard area (fixed installations) + Reality View Pro + Speed: Display of speed limits with alarm for exceeding + NAVIGON Reality Scanner: Find special destinations with the "Augmented Reality" function + NAVIGON MyRoutes: The app calculates up to three routes in parallel + Text-to-Speech and precise spoken announcements + Extended Pedestrian Navigation + Mapping 2D and 3D (bird view) + Mapping HERE (formerly Navteq) for France and Monaco * The service requires a data connection Enhance your system with in-app features: + Urban Guidance: Navigate in urban centers with transportation ** + Panorama View 3D Map Display with mountains and valleys + NAVIGON FreshMaps XL: Get the map of Europe (44 countries) and regularly updated maps *** + NAVIGON cockpit: animated graphic presentation given Conduct + TrafficLive: Traffic information in real time * + Special package Destination All-in-1: Over 100,000 additional POIs + Mobile Alert Live: This service informs you of the danger zones on your way in your pay (mobile installations) * + Mobile Alert Live Premium: As Mobile Alert Live but for all of Europe. In addition: warning of mobile speed cameras, including the level of reliability, the time since the last signal and the number of reporters in your area * + NAVIGON LPG and Bio-Diesel filling stations: Find LPG stations, CNG and diesel ecological + Smartwatch Connect: Allows pedestrian navigation on the Sony SmartWatch 2 or the Samsung GALAXY Gear 2. Requires free installation NAVIGON SmartWatch Connect, available here on Google Play or NAVIGON Smartwatch Connect Gear available on the GALAXY Gear Manager. * The service requires a data connection ** Available in Europe in 65 conurbations. The service requires a data connection *** The service is guaranteed for min. 24 months Note: - NAVIGON is an "on-board" solution mapping, voice and system data are saved on the phone, which avoids the expense and loss of time related to the transfer of data. - The version requires approximately 1.6GB of free space. Make sure you have sufficient memory. Downloading the mapping is done after installing WiFi (WLAN) on the smartphone. Make sure you have a stable and secure connection. - On first startup ca. 25kB are sent for registering your product. NAVIGON hopes you have fun navigating by car, bike or on foot! www.navigon.com/facebook www.navigon.com/twitter

ETI-Eloquence Text To Speech (TTS) is an Android ported version of the popular Eloquence Text-To-Speech synthesizer. ETI-Eloquence is a TTS engine that you can use in a wide range of applications such as: - Screen readers and applications for blind people (like Talkback or Mobile Accessibility) - GPS software (like Google Maps) - E-book readers (like Play Books) - Translators (like Google Translate) - And many more! The main features of ETI-Eloquence TTS are: - 10 languages included with a single purchase: US English, UK English, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Mexico), German, Finnish (Finland), French (France), French (Canada), Italian and Portuguese (Brazil) - Speed and pitch configuration - User Dictionary: possibility to add, edit or remove words from a dictionary to customize the pronunciation Once the application is installed on your device, you can make ETI-Eloquence your default TTS engine by going to Settings > Language & input > Text-to-Speech output and checking "ETI-Eloquence TTS" as your default preferred engine. All Android devices from 4.0 onwards are supported.
release_text: - Added emoticon setting to optionally speak emoticons - Added translations for emojis to ALL the supported languages - User is now allowed to change settings when Eloquence TTS is not the default TTS - Tweaked application design on Android Lollipop - Added force language option to always speak in the desired language - Added Android Lollipop support - User dictionary file extension change from .DCT to .CFD - Vocalizer folder is looked into when importing a user dictionary - Updated translations

This app allows you to quickly change your wallpaper with one single click on a widget! Additionally, you can enable a timer to automatically change your wallpaper on a predefined time. This app is optimized for battery life & performence, so it might take some seconds to actually change the wallpaper after a click on the widget! Features: • Easily add images or whole folders • Change wallpaper with a timer, on each lockscreen unlock, through a customizable widget or based on different rules • Widgets: change to next wallpaper in rotation list, select the wallpaper you want to see or change the album* with one click • Ordered rotation or random list • Very low battery consumption • No ads • Muzei integration * Organizing your images in different albums requires purchasing the "albums feature" through an in-app payment (0.99 EUR, 1.49 USD) --------------------- Permissions: SET_WALLPAPER - for the non-livewallpaper mode RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED - needed to start auto rotation after reboot WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - needed to save cropped wallpapers & widget images BILLING - for in-app buying of premium Features (0.99 EUR, 1.49 USD) The following permissions are required for the location based rules on Android 2.3 and newer: ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE INTERNET
release_text: 4.2.7: - fixed issue with Italian translation - renamed "disabled live wallpaper mode" to "static wallpaper mode" - minor bugfixes 4.2.6: - app will now only change images if it's either running as live wallpaper or if"static mode" is enabled in the app - minor fixes - translations & dependencies updated 4.2.5: - added ActionLauncher LiveWallpaper API - fixed reported crashes - minor UI improvements

description: Make your telephone or tablet speak to you with Voxygen’s Best-of-Vox Voices. The Hélium voice reads aloud any French text. Get rid of flat voices with no expression or personality! Discover Natural and Fun Voices, and listen to a sample here: http://www.best-of-vox.com/android . Follow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/VoxygenSAS to keep up with new voices! Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/voxygen.fr ★ What is it for? Various ways to use Best-of-Vox voices: voice guidance, E-books and SMS reading, ring tones, alarm clocks, Android accessibility features with Talkback and much more. Share your messages from the Best-of-Vox application on your preferred social networks: SoundCloud, WhatsApp, Skype, hubiC, Evernote, Drive, etc. ★ How does it work? The Best-of-Vox application allows you to type or paste text and to have it read out aloud by the voice that you have chosen. You can then save it as a ringtone or share it with your friends on SoundCloud ! From your emails, your Internet browser, or any compatible application, select some text and make your Best-of-Vox voice read it aloud by simply clicking on the “share” menu. ★ How to install it? Only 2 clicks to activate the Best-of-Vox voice in the Android settings that you reach from the application's main menu. Watch the installation video and follow the instructions. Please note: with Android versions prior to 4.0, one additional first click is required at the bottom of the settings list in order to activate the voice. ★ How to fix an occasional problem? – Cannot hear the Best-of-Vox: First ensure that the volume of your device is sufficient. If this is the case, than it may be that the voice's data was corrupted during or after its installation. In order to reinitiate the voice, please perform the following steps: go to “Android Settings / Applications / Manage applications / Best-of-Vox voice”, click on “Force stop”, click on “Clear data”, return to the home screen, ensure that the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network (which is required to download the data), restart the Best-of-Vox application, wait for the download and data preparation to be fully completed, enter some text and click on the “play” button. Questions? Please contact android@voxygen.fr . Credits: Moteur de synthèse vocale / Voix de synthèse / Synthèse vocale / Speech synthesis / TTS / tts / Text To Speech / Texttospeech / Speech synthesis engine / TTS engine / Synthetic voice / TTS voice : http://www.best-of-vox.com/android
release_text: Version 1.4 : - pause button - save voice settings as default - master volume + voice volume - download gui - gui optimized

description: GAME GOALS - Drive your pocket bus across the unlimited number of lines in the sweet virtual city and transport its tiny citizens. - Observe traffic rules to avoid fines (traffic lights and signs on the streets & speeding). - Arrive carefully with the bus to the bus stations in time and pick up the passengers. - Get as much experience points as possible to unlock new vehicles. - Be fast to obtain some cool time bonus points. FEATURES - The fast reaction and addictive gameplay not just for kids. It is for everyone. - Nine different types of vehicles to unlock (buses & trolleybuses). - Varied environments to explore (sunny, cloudy, rainy - morning, day, evening - summer, autumn, winter). - Randomly generated routes to explore (unlimited fun). - Liveable virtual city with a lot of funny citizens in the streets. - Rich environment sounds with a different engine types included. HOW TO PLAY - Press the green pedal to move the bus forward or red pedal to slow down. - Watch out the traffic lights, signs and stations on the roads (prepare your reflexes)! - Stop the bus correctly at the stations in time (the doors will open automatically) and wait for the passengers. - Drive the bus fast to the final station without getting penalized. ABOUT THE GAME Let’s try something new! Become a public transport driver. Pick up tiny passengers at each station and drive the bus fast & carefully to the final station on each route. Explore the virtual town, raise your experience points, unlock all vehicles, beware of the traffic rules and don’t get penalized. The Bus Simulator 2D offers an addictive and challenging unlimited gameplay with a lot of sweet environments, funny people and a cool real sounds. Download the Bus Simulator 2D and start the bus engine right now because your virtual driving shift is just about to begin!
release_text: - Engine optimization - Bug fixes - A lot of minor changes

Realistic 3D ball animation 2. Touch control for moving the stick 3. 8 Ball Pool and 9 Ball Pool 4. Single Player Mode: Straight Pool Game (no rules) - Challenge (2 minutes time limit with high score record) - Practice (no time limit but no high score record) 5. VS Mode: Player vs. Computer/Player (with rules) 6. Arcade Mode: 180+ Challenging Levels (no rules) How to play: 1) Single Player Mode (no rules) The object of the game is to pocket your set of assigned balls. The more balls sink the higher scores you get. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike. The initial time limit of Challenge Mode is 2 minutes but once you sink a ball you will get additional time. As all the balls have been cleared, the pool will create a new group of balls to keep the game going on. Also you can play the Practice Mode which has no time limit but no high score record. 2) VS Mode: Player vs. Computer/Player (with rules) Play against the computer AI/Player with standard 8 ball rules or 9 ball rules. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike. Touch and hold at any point to move the cue-ball and tap to confirm for Free-ball. 3) Arcade Mode (New and no rules) You need to pocket all the balls on the table within the given number of cues. There is no time limit and rules for this mode but watch out you have only limited number of cues. Rack em! Notes: The permissions required in this game is only used for online leader board. Thanks.
release_text: v2.90: Fixed the issue of ball spin not working on some devices. Thanks.

description: The "Category Quiz" is a quiz where the questions must be answered by category. The "playing field" looks a little bit on Jeopardy! Currently there are over 6,000 questions in German and English available! If there are any problems, crashes or questions please contact me via email ( categoryquiz@live.at ) or on Facebook! The questions are frequently updated! At the moment the questions are divided into the following categories: - Sports - Entertainment - Food - Geography - Science - History - Art & Literature - People - Music - Religion - Technology - Animals - Economy - Politics If all questions in a category are answered correctly you get 100 extra points. If the second category is completed, you get 200 extra points, for the 3rd Category 300 extra points, etc. If a question is answered incorrectly the category gets "locked" and no more questions can be answered in this category. If the question timer is used (can be enabled/disabled using the game options) the user has 30 seconds to answer the question. The faster the question is answered the more points you get (3 points for every remaining second). In addition the user has the possibility to get help using the 3 Jokers (50:50, stop timer, new question). If you decide to start a "quick game" 6 categories are chosen automatically. In a "normal game" you can choose your favorite 6 categories. ! IMPORTANT! You have the possibilty to enable/disable if the correct answer is shown in the case that you answer a question incorrectly in the "options". The available high score list shows the top 15 results. Example Questions: 1) Which famous brazilian model was a Victoria's Secret Angel from 2000 until mid 2007? a) Gisele Bündchen b) Alessandra Ambrosio c) Izabel Goulart d) Flavia De Oliveira 2) Who had a big hit with the song "Gangnam Style" which was recognized by Guinness World Records as the most "liked" video in YouTube history in September 2012? a) Psy b) 2Pac c) Jay-Z d) 50 Cent 3) Which NFL team represents the city of Pittsburgh? a) Steelers b) Patriots c) Giants d) Cowboys Tags: quiz questions answers Jeopardy category bonus millionaire empire intelligence test knowledge lucky nature Celebrity Soccer Tennis Basketball Biology Chemistry Cinema TV beer Pizzaland city state image fairy painter radio tree flower Islam Christian Church Dog Trivia
release_text: Changed: - Questions weren't displayed on some devices

description: This is 0.2beta version of aDosBox, you can always find the latest version and its source codes from here http://androiddosbox.appspot.com Note: it only works on 2.2+ devices. This app is developed based on pelya's SDL port for android and of course the amazing DosBox emulator. Please test it for us and report issues/bugs through our website above. Remember, it is aBETA, don't be scared if you see FCs or other strange issues. And positive feedbacks are most welcome. Have fun! :)
release_text: When app quits, DOSBox exits gracefully. Add DOSBox configuration dialog which allows users to change some config during run time. Following config are supported so far - Increase CPU cycle - Decrease CPU cycle - CPU cycle up step specification - CPU cycle down step specification - Increase frameskip - Decrease frameskip Those changes are **NOT** written to dosbox-<version>.conf file. So when you restart aDOSBox, you lose the changes! In the future, this will be fixed.

description: Download this FREE language pack to use it with your GO Keyboard in Ukrainian . Enjoy your every tap and personalize your keyboard! Are you bored with plain android keyboard? We offer the personalized and customized keyboard, from theme, font to key tone, etc. GO Keyboard is a Emoji Free keyboard that delivers smart auto-correction and a user-friendly interface. It supports 60+ languages. The symbols in the keyboard are compatible across all popular apps, including Facebook, SMS, Gmail, Whatsapp, etc. The most important for us - always listening to your feedback! FAQ 1. Step 1: Download and install Ukrainian FOR GO Keyboard Step 2: Click open GO Keyboard icon from home menu, and click through 2 steps to enable GO Keyboard and set as default one; Step 3: Click into Settings -> Languages -> Select your language For more fun and info, follow us on FACEBOOK: http://goo.gl/kLxbSl MORE FEATURES: ★ FREE 800 Emoji and other cute smiley faces explosion (ʘ‿ʘ) It is free to use a pack of 800 emoticons, emoji, and smiley faces. They are grouped into different categories so you are able to find it real fast. ★ PERSONALIZED EXPERT - type fun There are 10000+ colorful themes in market that are compatible with GO Keyboard and new free themes are delivered weekly ! You could also set keyboard background wallpaper image free. Plus, we have several features to make your typing more fun. Voice recorder can transfer your voice into a different one and it is so fun to send to your friends. ★ WORD CORRECTION and suggestions Smart enough to recognize mistyping and provide correction suggestions to you. Sloppy typing is away from you. ★ TYPE what you speak It supports voice input and it frees your hand. ★ GREEN and Pro It is small(smaller than most of the keyboards), green and professional. ★ PRIVACY and security We will never collect your personal info including credit card information. However, you may receive a warning when activating GO Keyboard saying “This keyboard may collect your personal data.” The warning message is just a standard message in Android for ANY third-party keyboard app, so don’t worry.

description: Gain a mastery of Spanish! Spanish Class contains a complete offline written Spanish course, together with interactive verb, vocabulary, grammar and listening exercises. All words and phrases are available to listen to as well. Great support when you learn Spanish. Easy to practice your verb conjugations, vocabulary, grammar and phrases with. This total course covers the following content: * All tenses, with all irregular verb forms highlighted * 4000+ words, sorted into different categories such as food, transport and vacation * 40 grammar articles, covering all Spanish Grammar * 200 useful phrases And the following features: * Highly customizable exercises on all of the above, with a fun awards system which makes practicing fun, with separate awards for the vocabulary, verbs, grammar, listening and speaking exercises. * Keeping track of your progress by saving statistics and summaries of all done exercises, together with errors made. The first strength of this app is the extended content. No other Spanish app offers this much for the same price. The other strength lies in its fun, addictive and useful exercises. The app also contains a fun speaking exercise, which should not be taken very seriously as it is now Also, although basic voices are included, it is also possible to enable additional higher quality voices from within the app, but these have to be bought first from the third party company Svox. If you are serious about learning Spanish, this app is for you. IMPORTANT We believe in a long term strategy for this app and customer feedback is very important to us. If there is something you do not like, please contact us at our developer email instead of giving us a 1 star rating. If you give us a 1 star rating, we do not even get your details so we cannot contact you back to solve the problem. If you contact us with a remark or problem and we fail to help you within a few days/weeks, depending on the severity of the problem, we understand that you give us a bad rating. Also, if your audio sounds way off, please read http://www.ceardannan.com/products/android-language-classes-text-to-speech . SOME COMPLIMENTS WE FOUND IN OUR MAILBOX Your language apps rock!! The interface is well designed, simple yet very very effective and it is as you described, very addictive. Your language apps are the best on the market. You offer far more for less. Unbelievable! I'm blown away by this app. It's almost as good as my pc version that I paid $$$ for except voice recognition could be better. Definitely worth the money. Perfect format. I like how quickly you jump on comments. Keep up the good work. PLANNED UPDATES * Writing exercises: the word, verb and grammar exercises will get a “writing” instead of multiple choice option, which will present the user with a textbox to type in instead of the multiple choice questions, for a bit more of a challenge. * Image exercises, such as on clock times. * Making it possible to add your own words and phrases to the app through http://www.languageshq.com .
release_text: * Content updates * Some ui improvements * Added search to vocabulary

description: Attendance is an app for teachers that want to take attendances in their classes using their phones. This is the first beta release of the app so expect some rough edges here and there. With Attendance you can create courses, terms and course occurrences; create groups of students with different schedules; add students to groups; and finally take attendances. Attendance status can be configured for each occurrence and are Present, Absent and Late by default. Attendance also supports importing student lists from text files, importing student photos and you can backup and restore the whole database. You can also add notes to a student in a particular class and add a topic to a class for future reference. Export attendance data to CSV and HTML. In a future release, it will be possible to export to Excel, Markdown, Dokuwiki; and also e-mail students and a bunch of other planned features.

description: If you own a firearm then you need Gun Vault! Keep tabs on all of the firearms in your collection. Gun Vault allows you to save two pictures along with the serial number and other detailed stats and specs on your investments. This is great for insurance purposes, buying and selling, tracking data and just showing that precious new rifle off to your buddies! Gun Vault can even be used for paintball and airsoft guns! -Gun Vault features a Gun Law/Concealed Carry Reference Guide for all U.S Sates , allowing you to stay up to date with your local laws and other states as you enter or pass through them. *Gun Vault Pro Only* -Easy transfer form for the private sale of firearms . *Gun Vault Pro Only* -Keep track of Ammunition quantities, stats and images with the Ammo Tracker . *Gun Vault Pro Only* -Quick search for all shooting supply stores and ranges in your local area . -Keep up to date with a feed of the latest news from the NRA . -Gun Vault is password lockable . -Easily research your firearms . -Export a printable report of all Gun Vault contents. *Gun Vault Pro Only* -Keep secure notes with Gun Vault Notes . *Gun Vault Pro Only* ★Upgrade to Gun Vault Pro To Unlock The Full Power of Gun Vault! ★ Gun Vault Is A Top Free Tool App! ★ ★Gun Vault Pro Reached The Top New Paid Apps List Within The First 4 Days!★ ★Gun Vault Is The Number One Firearms Inventory App On The Market!★ *Tips:* •In order to activate the lock you need to go to the Gun Vault menu and (depending on your device) you need to tap the gold lock symbol in the top right of the menu or if your device has the drop down menu instead, you will need to click the option that says “Lock Settings”. •You can rearrange your firearms list by taping and holding on a firearm to select it and then tapping and holding on another firearm to move it above, move it below or have them swap places. •The "Additional Info" section is a great place to hold information that is not specifically asked for, such as the price, trigger type, etc. •The "Attachments" section and the "Additional Info" section become scrollable if a lot of text is entered. •Gun Vault saves all of your Vault data to your devices SD card (or internal SD card depending on your device) into a folder titled “GunVault”. You can copy this folder from your device to your computer for safekeeping and this way if your device ever breaks, is lost or you get a new one, you can copy the saved folder from your computer into the root of your new SD card and your Gun Vault contents will be transferred. Any modifications to your Gun Vault contents need to be done in Gun Vault. *Note: plugging your device into your computer via USB cable is usually the best way to perform the transfers. HimeWare appreciates all of the support and feedback we have received. The HimeWare team is made up of military members who have a passion for creating software and applications in our free time for you to enjoy. Thanks again! Hooah! For questions and support contact: Support@HimeWare.com *We are unable to assist you through the comment section.* *Note: Some rooted devices may have compatibility issues.* Privacy Policy All information entered into your Gun Vault is only available to you and only you. No info is EVER saved, sent or sold to any online databases, servers or organizations. Only you have access to your Gun Vault and its contents. Permissions Explained -Your devices internet connection is only used to load the NRA news feed. © 2013-2014 HimeWare All Rights Reserved

description: Castle Jigsaw Puzzles is a jigsaw game for all family. Enjoy of high quality images. The game contains 60 levels with beautiful castle pictures. Drag the pieces to the right place to create the image. Use "Peek" button to preview the original image. Completed levels will be unlocked and you can save images to SD-card. If you can not complete any level you can simple skip it and try to complete it later. Just press "Skip" level button to skip current level. Lets start and enjoy!

Manage your MS Dynamics CRM Contact and Contact related activites using this easy to user Client application that directly works with your Microsoft Dynamics CRM server. In addition to the usual information browsing and editing features, it provides integration with the Android device applications that makes it easy for you to make phone calls to a contacts, send emails to a contacts, conduct meeting with a contacts and record the proceedings, and be able to automatically track them on the Microsoft Dynamics CRM server. It also saves you time in entering information using the device microphone and camera. Features include: • Does not require any server side modifications • Works in Offline and Online mode • Add / Edit /Delete/ View Contacts using the standard MSCRM defined filters • Assign Contacts to another user • Add/Edit/View Contact Related Activities • Attach text notes with image, audio and other types of attachments. Mobile extension features include: • automatic recording and uploading of phone call logs as activities • automatic recording and uploading of meeting notes as activities • DVR style memory buffers that makes recording before and after a point is made possible. • Attaching multiple picture and audio notes • Emailing and automatically tracking emails on the server • Syncing CRM contacts with device native Address book • Searching for contacts on server • Saving search results • Searching for contacts on locally cached contacts • Failsafe upload allows you to email failed uploads to your email id Just download, install the client and start using. It directly connects with the Microsoft Dynamics SCRM server and you do not need to install any addition server modules. License is a full license and no monthly subscription fee needs to be paid.
