description: Southern Cookbook Recipes from Southern Cooking 123! Experience joy of cooking southern food. People all over the world are fascinated by southern cooking due to it's deep flavor and unique culture. Learn how to retain flavor while cooking healthy food recipes. These hand picked recipes are time tested and sure to please a hungry crowd. Be sure and try these well known dishes and impress your guests! Todays upscale restaurants often try to mimic southern cooking but they always seem to miss the mark. Get the secret formula for these legendary recipes: Apple Pie Cornbread Flank Steak Hush Puppies Southern Fried Chicken Buttermilk Biscuits Garden Salads Relish Tray Squash Casserole Lentil Soup Powerhouse Salad Baked Cod Blackened Catfish Cornbread Casserole Italian Spinach Casserole Never before have these secret recipes been unleashed on the public! Our southern cookbook recipes have been proven over generations and across multiple families, all located in the south. This is authentic southern cooking at its best! Of course, this recipe app is FREE and can be used as a quick reference even when rushing in the kitchen. However, we recommend taking your sweet time with these. Remember to always use fresh ingredients and pay close attention. Let the flavors seep into the taste buds. Although many of these are full flavor, we have added some healthy recipes as well. Search for your favorite southern dish and favorite the top performers. You'll have the worlds top southern cookbook recipes at your fingertips. DIG IN! Features: *Beautiful layout with images of the dish *Simple instructions for bringing out full flavor *Personal stories and food tales from Chef Nell *Easy to use southern cooking interface

Babyphone App mit einer sehr einfachen Benutzeroberfläche. Alle erforderlichen Parameter lassen sich individuell einstellen. Es gibt also kein "funktioniert nicht", sondern nur ein "schlecht eingestellt". Da im Gegensatz zu einem echten Babyfon ein Anruf hergestellt wird muss die App unterscheiden, ob das Kind nur kurz unruhig ist und weiterschläft, oder schon tatsächlich wach ist. Daher wird eine gewisse Anzahl an Sekunden überwacht (default 15s) und ermittelt wie oft die Lautstärke (default auf mittlere Lautstärke wie lautes Reden) zu hoch war. Wird die Lautstärke in diesem Zeitraum mehrmals überschritten (default 4 mal) wird der Alarm ausgelöst. Da Sie diese drei Werte anpassen können, sind Sie als Nutzer in der Lage das Verhalten des Babyfons ganz auf Ihre Bedürfnisse anzupassen. Dieses Babyphone-App kann eine SMS senden, oder ein anderes Telefon anrufen (oder beides). Es können die Lautsprecher für den Aufruf aktiviert werden, sodass Sie auch zu Ihrem Baby sprechen können. Sobald die App aktiv geschaltet wird, werden alle Telefonfunktionen stumm geschalten (Wecker, Anrufe, Nachrichten etc.). Die vorherigen Einstellungen werden automatisch reaktiviert, sobald die App geschlossen oder der Baby-Alarm ausgelöst wird. Lizenzhinweis: Das Icon basiert auf einer Grafik von http://www.iloveclipart.com/baby-clip-art.html Baby monitor app with a very simple user interface. All required parameters can be set individually. So there is no "does not work", but only a "set bad". Because unlike a real baby phone call is being made must decide whether the child is and continues to sleep for a short restless, or is already actually awake the app. Therefore, a certain number will be monitored to seconds (default 15s) and determine how many times the volume (default to medium volume as loud talking) was too high. If the volume in this period several times exceeded (default 4 times) the alarm is triggered. Since you can adjust these three values, you will be able to adapt the behavior of the room monitor all users as to your needs. This baby monitor app can send a text message, or another phone call (or both). It can use the loudspeaker to be activated for the call, so that you can speak to your baby. Once the app is switched active, all telephone functions and mutes (Alarm, Calls, Messages, etc.). The previous settings are reactivated automatically when the app is closed or the baby alarm. License Note: The icon is based on a graphic of http://www.iloveclipart.com/baby-clip-art.html

description: ★ AndroidAuthority: Almost like a real notebook ★ Gizmodo: One of the 10 Best S Pen Apps for the GALAXY Note II. ★ Applatter: An app for all your note-taking needs! ★ XDA: Awesome Note taking app Handy Note not only works as an organizer but also as a handy-dandy notebook. Whether you're keeping track of the projects you're managing or taking down notes for class or work, Handy Note will work well for you. Say good-bye to bringing large and bulky bags with Handy Note. It's a personal, professional, and school notebook all at the same time, it almost like a real notebook. Private Notes You can create password-protected journals. This way, you’ll be able to prevent other people from sneaking into your private notes. Highly recommend this feature to anyone who likes to write diaries and personal memos. Magic Pen What’s great about paper notebooks is that you can write things using your own handwriting style. It makes you feel more connected to the things that you write. The same goes for Handy Note. It provides its own handwriting tool which is great for stylus pen users. Freedom of input and layout put all following elements on the same page: text, handwriting, free drawing, photo, video, symbol, shape, SMS, contact, date/time, apps, and more. change element's size, color, background, and put them anywhere on pages freely. Customizable Templates Unlike other note-taking apps, Handy Note features a lot of customization options. You are also free to choose from its wide range of build in templates. There are templates for diaries, business, academics, etc. You can even create a personal notebook planner. Plus, you can create unlimited pages. Quick View and Preview Widget: Are you too lazy to flip the pages? Well, you don’t really have to. With this app, you can simply take a quick glance of your notes via Quick View. You can also browser notebooks page by page on your Android desktop without open Handy Note. People like most about Handy Note Magic Pen: No matter you are using finger or stylus, double panel writing allows you to write without stopping and feel like writing on a paper. Editable handwriting: handle your handwriting just like editing text: copy & delete word by word, bulletin & numbering, alignment, and mix with text. Notelet: Insert combinations of contents / functions into a page just like put widget on your desktop. Items such as Date, Time, SMS, contacts, link, video, webview . Notelet can make your notebook a personal hub. Difference between Handy Note free and Handy Note Pro: 1.Sync with Dropbox is not allowed on Handy Note Free. 2. Import and share of Evernote only works for limited time on Handy Note free, to continue to use Evernote, please upgrade to Handy Note Pro. 3.All Free templates (ResPack)only support Handy Note Pro. How to upgrade to Handy Note Pro? Handy Note free is a ad free version with limited function, if you like to expand the full function, please buy Handy Note Pro Key to upgrade to Handy Note Pro edition. ★ Highlighted Reviews in Google Play ★ "Great App I use this almost everyday for work. Keeps my notes in order and keeps from having to carry a real notebook." - Aaron Medina "Perfection This app is the perfect partner to the Note's S-Pen, providing the perfect note taking solution, then combining with Evernote for perfect archiving and organization of those notes." - Ben Humphry "Great, does what is supposed to do Very handy. You can mix any kind of data." - Filippos Fragoulis "Superb!Amazing detail. My new favorite app!" - nassi ball "Best note taking app on the market!!! I have used a few different note taking apps for my galaxy note including s note and none of them offer as much organized control of my note taking as much as handy note has! Thank you for this app!!!!!!!" - Gary Chambers "Rating This app is really good and useful! Please keep on updating this app!!!!!!!!!!!!" - Shannen Millar

Wybierasz się w góry? Wejdź do największej mobilnej wyszukiwarki szlaków górskich w Polsce! Dołącz do górskich pasjonatów, odkrywaj szlaki, dziel się swoimi trasami, opiniami i zdjęciami - wspólnie twórzmy kompletną i użyteczną bazę szlaków górskich. „Szlaki w górach” to aplikacja, która powstała dzięki współpracy Żywiec Zdrój, Trail.pl oraz samych Użytkowników. Aplikacja ta pozwala wyszukiwać i przeglądać szlaki turystyczne oraz polecane przez innych wycieczki. Każda trasa opisana jest pod kątem długości i przebiegu szlaku na mapie oraz dopuszczalnych aktywności, np. „pieszo”, „rower” czy „obserwacja ptaków”. Aplikacja umożliwia też nawigację po wybranym szlaku, w trakcie wycieczki, przy użyciu jednej z kilku dostępnych map. Dzięki aplikacji „Szlaki w górach” można zapisywać swoje trasy i dzielić się nimi z innymi miłośnikami gór. Funkcje aplikacji 1. Wyszukiwanie szlaków w górach na terenie Polski: ● wyszukiwanie szlaków wg miejscowości i regionów w polskich górach; ● wyszukiwanie szlaków po nazwie szlaku; ● wyszukiwanie szlaków po aktywnościach dostępnych na szlaku; ● Podpowiedzi przy wyszukiwaniu po miejscowościach ; ● Wyszukiwanie po kliknięciu palcem na mapie. 2. Przeglądanie szlaków polecanych przez Żywiec Zdrój i Trail.pl: ● Przeglądanie wybranego szlaku, jego mapy, opisu i zdjęć (jeśli są dostępne); ● Powiększanie mapy z wybranym szlakiem na cały ekran urządzenia; ● Poruszanie się po wybranych szlakach w oparciu o GPS i transmisję danych z sieci komórkowej; ● Dodawanie szlaków do ulubionych(tylko dla zalogowanych użytkowników); ● Komentowanie szlaków wraz z dodawaniem zdjęć (tylko dla zalogowanych użytkowników); ● Możliwość meldunku na szlaku (tylko dla zalogowanych użytkowników); ● Współrzędne startu szlaku. 3. Możliwość wyboru jednego z 3 rodzajów map: ● Szlaki TRAIL; ● Szlaki TRAIL Mobile; ● UMP WAW. 4. Opcje widoku mapy: ● "pokaż szlak" – mapa centruje się na wyszukiwany lub sugerowanych szlakach; ● "pokaż mnie i szlak" – na mapie widoczna jest lokalizacja użytkownika w stosunku do wyszukiwanych lub sugerowanych szlaków; ● „pokaż moją lokalizację” – mapa pokazuje lokalizację użytkownika. 5. Nieograniczone nagrywanie, zapisywanie i opisywanie własnych tras: ● możliwość nagrywania trasy podczas korzystania z innych funkcji telefonu, tzw. nagrywanie w tle ● podgląd czasu, aktualnej i średniej prędkości, dystansu, pokonanej oraz aktualnej wysokości; ● zapisywanie nagranych tras jako prywatne; ● możliwość anulowania nagrywania trasy. 6. Możliwość korzystania z elektronicznego kompasu (ustawienie geograficznego oraz magnetycznego bieguna północnego). 7. Korzystanie z aplikacji bez logowania, z możliwością zapisywania własnych tras offline w pamięci urządzenia, (ale bez możliwości ich zapisywania on­line). 8. Logowanie się do aplikacji poprzez konto na Facebooku i zapisywanie własnych tras on­line w serwisie Trail.pl. 9. Dodanie zakładki aktualności (aktywności użytkowników aplikacji i serwisu TRAIL.PL). Uwagi Korzystając z aplikacji należy pamiętać, że jej działanie jest zależne od: ● jakości sygnału GPS, ● dostępności i siły sygnału sieci komórkowej, ● sprawności urządzenia Aplikacja może uzupełniać profesjonalne urządzenia GPS, ale nie może ich zastępować. Aplikacja korzysta z bazy szlaków tworzonej przez profesjonalistów i użytkowników ­ górskich pasjonatów. Pamiętaj, że zawarte w niej informacje nie muszą odpowiadać aktualnemu stanowi szlaków, dlatego zawsze sprawdzaj warunki terenowe i pogodowe bezpośrednio przed wyruszeniem na wycieczkę. Korzystanie z aplikacji GPS, działających w tle, może znacznie zmniejszyć żywotność baterii. Na szybsze zużycie akumulatorów w smartfonie wpływają przede wszystkim stale uruchomione funkcje nagrywania w tle, GPS i włączony wyświetlacz. Going to the mountains? Access to the largest mobile search engine mountain trails in Poland! Join mountain enthusiasts, explore trails, share your routes, opinions and photos - Let's create together a complete and useful set of mountain trails. "Trails in the Mountains" is an application that is a collaboration of Zywiec Zdroj, Trail.pl and the same users. This application lets you search and browse hiking trails and recommended by other tours. Each route is described in terms of the length and course of the route on the map and permitted activities such as "walking", "bike" or "bird watching". The application also allows you to navigate the selected route, during the trip, using one of several available maps. With this application, "Trails in the Mountains", you can save your routes and share them with other fans of the mountains. App Features 1 Search trails in the mountains in Polish: ● Search routes by cities and regions in the Polish mountains; ● Search trails by name the trail; ● search paths cross the activities available on the trail; ● Tips on finding po towns; ● Search by clicking on the map with your finger. 2 Przeglądanie routes recommended by Zywiec Zdroj and Trail.pl: ● To view the selected route, the map, description and picture (if available); ● Zooming map with the selected route on the screen of the device; ● Navigating the selected routes based on GPS and data from the cellular network; ● Adding trails to favorites (only for registered users); ● Comment on trails with the addition of pictures (only for registered users); ● Can check in on the trail (only for registered users); ● Coordinates off the trail. 3 The choice of one of three types of maps: ● Hiking Trail; ● Hiking Trail Mobile; ● UMP WAW. 4 Map display options: ● the "show route" - map centered on the search or suggested routes; ● the "show me and the trail" - the map shows the location of the user in relation to the search or suggested routes; ● the "show my location" - the map shows the location of the user. 5 Unlimited recording, storing and describing their routes: ● the ability to record routes while using other phone functions, so-called. background recording ● preview time, current and average speed, distance traveled and the actual amount; ● save the recorded tracks as private; ● the option to cancel the recording path. 6 The ability to use electronic compass (the geographic and magnetic North). 7 Using without logging in, the ability to save your own tracks online in memory (but without the possibility of their online store). 8 Log in to the application through a Facebook account and save your own tracks online at Trail.pl. 9 Add a bookmark news (user activity and service applications TRAIL.PL). Comments Using an application, please note that the effect is dependent on: ● quality of the GPS signal, ● availability and signal strength of the cellular network, ● availability of the device The application can complement professional GPS device, but can not replace them. The application uses the base paths created by professionals and users pasjonatów mountain. Please note that the information contained herein do not necessarily correspond with the current state routes, so always check the terrain and weather conditions immediately before embarking on a trip. Using GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. The faster your smartphone battery usage is primarily affected by the recording functions run continuously in the background, GPS and enabled display.
release_text: Aplikacja „Szlaki górach” stale się rozwija, zgodnie z potrzebami użytkowników. Właśnie powstała jej wakacyjna wersja na platformę Android! v1.10 -naprawiono błąd wyświetlania mapy v1.09 -poprawiono działanie mapy -zmieniono markery v1.08 -zmieniono domyślną mapę -poprawiono wyświetlanie nowości -naprawiono drobne błędy v1.07 -naprawiono drobne błędy v1.06 -naprawiono drobne błędy -dostosowano część widoków do tabletów

description: In our galaxies, Inferno, Ice, Pegasus, Colossus ... There are many of the lost planets, I decided to find some of them. I wonder myself what can be found there ... At this time, succeeded find 12 lost planets, after examination it seemed that the two of them have life! Guess which are ... I also found a new Earth, Young Earth Currently we have 12 planets, and 7 deep space backgrounds, all are 3D with many options to set: 1. New Earth 2. Fimes Planet 3. Nebanu Planet 4. Gelidon Planet 5. Emos Gas Giant 6. Doa Planet 7. Maleama Planet 8. New Hope 9. Atlantis 10. Balross 11. Zea 12. Cyberon You can set : + Deep space backgrounds ( 7 ) + Planet rotation speed + Lighting the Planet + Clouds type + Wind speed + Clouds on/off + Atmosphere lighting color + Atmosphere lighting power + Atmosphere on/off + Stars on/off + Planet rings + Suns. Sun illuminating the planet + Satellites of the Planet + Accelerate Camera (Accelerometer Sensor) + Random type of planet, backgrounds, sun ,clouds, atmosphere lighting + Daydream feature This wallpaper can be run on phones and tablets. Please comments, thanks ! Thanks for help !
release_text: :: 2.0.2 + NEW 3D scene, 7 deep space backgrounds + NEW option 'Camera position' set the planet closer or farther from us. Default moved the planet to 'old' position. + Daydream feature Thanks for help !

description: CONNECT WITH FRIENDS. PLAY WITH WORDS. Get a game of SCRABBLE going with just about anyone – or play solo against the computer! Plus, now you can play SCRABBLE in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, or Brazilian Portuguese. WHO WILL YOU PLAY? • Challenge friends via Facebook and more • Find an instant opponent with a single touch • Play solo against the computer to improve your skills • Get numerous games going at once – more than any word game on the App Store SHOW OFF YOUR SKILLS Connect to Facebook and share your best scores. You can even talk a good game with enhanced chat and notification features. IMPROVE YOUR SCORES WITH THE TEACHER Become a SCRABBLE master with the exclusive “Teacher” feature - see what your best word could have been after every turn. LOSS FOR WORDS? Use the in-game word list, built-in official SCRABBLE dictionary, or the exclusive Best Word feature to see your highest scoring choices. THINK FAST Want to recreate the feeling of a real-time in-person game? Try the new Speed Play mode where you and your opponent agree to 2 or 5 minute turns. If words aren't played in time, nudge and forfeit options are unlocked. LOOK SHARP! View every detail on the board with HD-quality graphics made to maximize the Retina display. Ready for the first and last word in word games? Don’t accept imitations. Just say, “LET’S PLAY SCRABBLE! You must be 13+ to play this game.
release_text: Hey SCRABBLE fans, now you can play Speed Play without ads! Use Coins to opt-out of ads in the create Speed Play game menu. If you run out of Coins, you can purchase more in the all-new store. We’ve also made some behind-the-scenes changes to improve the overall gameplay. Update now and play against a computer, challenge friends, or play random opponents. As always, thanks for playing.

Caros Diary is a personal diary which supports full of calendar functions, monthly and weekly plans, home screen widgets and some more to manage your daily schedules and plans. Meeting schedules with friends, the work schedules on your company business, Anniversary of your children and future plans will be managed in easy way. In addition, Each calendar is displayed on different colors depending on the type of schedule so you can easily distinguish the type of schedule. Google calendar sync function gives you chance to import interesting sports calendar, national public holidays, sharing calendars with friends, etc… Manage your schedules and plans using this Caros Diary. It will gives you new experience. * Major feature - Management of monthly and weekly plans - Daily schedules - Simple todo and memo function - Google calendar synchronization - Home screen widget - Backup and Password management - Screen theme function(Changeable Text Color, Size and Font type) - Lunar Calendar

Torrnado allows you to remotely access your Transmission© BitTorrent client running on your desktop or server. It connects through the Transmission web interface, to manage your torrents. The app is designed to give you access to the most important information and functions with minimal navigation needed, even on a relatively small mobile screen.
release_text: Various small fixes and improvements - spelling of data size units corrected (looked up SI standards) - action mode status bar coloring used globally (android 5.0+) - animated torrent detail open (android 4.0.3+) - added missing uploaded size to torrent details - added select all and none buttons to file list - etc.

description: Discover the timeless excitement of Championship Draughts, the most fully-featured Draughts game on mobile. Treat yourself to a much-deserved board game break. Play against our bots or hotseat with a friend in real life and save yourself the need for a board! Soothing jewel tones, cheerful HD graphics, helpful hints and interesting characters will leave you feeling positive and refreshed. Sneak a few hands of Draughts in throughout your day, or sit down and enjoy a full game. ★★★★★ Love that I can play against my real friends! - Ron L. "I haven't played Draughts since I was a kid, but I've been playing it almost every day." A step-up from a simple Draughts game, Championship Draughts delivers a game with personality: ✔ Discover 9 amusing computer opponents to both challenge and entertain you ✔ Enjoy a sense of accomplishment as you (re)master Draughts game play ✔ Play against bots or use it as a virtual board to play with real friends ✔ Sharpen your skills with Questie, our adorable in-game DreamCoach™ dragon ✔ Improve your game as you learn not just what to play, but why ✔ Explore in-game options that allow you to cheat in numerous ways and play exciting variations Enjoy unlimited free Draughts games with this interactive version. Playing Draughts is simple and an intuitive menu system will let you explore a variety of game options. Easy enough for your inner child and engaging enough for your adult side. You'll enjoy unlocking options that keep you engaged once you've mastered the free version. This FREE version of Championship Draughts includes the following: ✔ Unlimited Games ✔ Colorful HD Graphics ✔ Engaging DreamCoach™ ✔ Educational Draughts Tutorial ✔ Friendly Beginner AI ✔ 3 Entertaining Characters ✔ Realistic Sounds and Player Taunts Universal app features HD graphics for hi-res Android tablet devices and newer Android phones running Honeycomb or Ice Cream Sandwich (3.x) as well as support for older Android phones running Froyo 2.2 or Gingerbread 2.3. For even more challenge, you can optionally purchase these add-ons: 1) No Ads ✔ Disable third-party banner ads ✔ Disable in-house and addon banner ads ✔ Support the developer ✔ Have more space to play! 2) Expert Bots ✔ Play Against Our Toughest Master Characters: - the vivacious Amber - the brainy Nicole - the flirty Wes ✔ Better opening move sequences and counter jumps 3) Practice ✔ Undo ✔ Auto Hint ✔ Play Suggested ✔ Replay Hand ✔ Switch Sides ✔ Random Layout 4) Cheats ✔ Illegal Plays ✔ Promote (King any piece) ✔ Demote (deny their King!) ✔ Nuke (feel the power!) ✔ Custom Arrange Board 5) Master Bots ✔ Play Against Our Toughest Master Characters: - the crafty and sly Chuckles - the whimsical and brainy Sparky - the musical and sharp Starla ✔ Master opening move sequences and jump prioritization 6) Variations ✔ English - English Draughts or Classic American Checkers ✔ Spanish - Kings fly down the diagonal ✔ Speed - Timed Game ✔ Suicide - Giveaway pieces ✔ International - 10x10 Draughts ✔ Brazilian - 8x8 Draughts ✔ All Kings - Promotions for All! ✔ Double - Two Games at Once, both Black and Red Squares! 7) Personalized Avatar ✔ Select and Save Your Personalized Avatar ✔ Create New Avatars Directly From Your Built-in-Camera ✔ Import a Photo from the Albums on Your Device 8) Custom Character Creator ✔ Build New Custom Characters ✔ Select Opponent Characteristics: - Beginner, Expert or Master - Timid, Competative, Agressive - Forgetful, Sharp, Wise - Wild, Flexible, Predictable. ✔ Use Your Own Photos to Represent New Characters ✔ Save Character Settings. 9) Royal Treatment ✔ No Ads, Experts, Masters, ✔ Cheats, Variations, Practice, ✔ Personalized Avatar, Custom Character Creator ✔ Save 40% over purchasing separately
release_text: + Facebook Integration: Share your scores and achievements! + Trophies: Perform special feats in game to earn these awards. Share them on Facebook as well! + Casual Difficulty: New difficulty between Easy and Expert. + New Opponents: Three new opponents to pick from. + Save and Restore: Your game saves automatically, you can continue it when you launch the game again. + Stability and usability improvements across the game. + More visible pieces + Higher Quality piece capture animation

description: Tap and hold these cute animated 3D cats/kittens and play music. They blink, open their little pink mouths and sing. Each kitten corresponds to a piano key with realistic pitch intervals. Thus, you can play as if you were playing the piano. But kittens are much cuter. They are "partially talking" because they sing "mee-mee-mee" with funny voices. You should hear it. A piano with a bigger keyboard is coming soon. You can strike a chord of up to five kittens. This is a cool animal piano for all animal and pet piano, animal and pet sounds lovers. And of course for funy and cute cat and kitten lovers.

A fantastic cartoon town scrolls across your screen! You can launch beautiful air balloons in any place! This version include: - Nice cartoon graphics - Smooth parallax effect - Interactive air balloons on your screen More fun soon! Enjoy! TO USE: Home -> Press Menu -> Select Wallpapers -> Select Live Wallpapers -> Select "Dnepr Live Wallpaper" from the list.

Are you commuting on Austin public transport? Then TripMate Austin Lite is your ideal companion. TripMate Austin Lite is a powerful offline timetable app which provides fast timetable access for Capital Metro Buses & Trains. With TripMate in your pocket you have access to Austin's transit information anywhere and anytime. Unlike other transit applications you do not need network access to check your timetable information. This means you get results fast. TripMate makes your commute easy with a variety of benefits: * TripMate works anytime and anywhere. No data network connection required. * Immediately find the next departure for your Stop. By Route or by Stop name. * Use predictive search from the action bar on the top of the app to quickly find your Route or Stop. * Scan the Stop's QR Code to view next Departures. * View next Departures for any CapMetro transit Stop or Station in Austin. * Check the latest CapMetro Realtime Departures online. * View Trip details. * View the Stops for your Trip on the map. * All the timetable information is stored on your phone. * TripMate informs you when updated timetable information is available for download from the 'More' screen. Don't worry, TripMate has the tiniest timetable files among all other transit apps out there. This saves you both bandwidth and storage space on your device. Check your notifications bar to download the most up-to-date timetable available. * Note: all times displayed are local Austin times This free version is ad supported. For an ad-free version and additional functionality (Favourites, Nearby Search, etc) please check out our paid version. Get access to fast timetable information and download TripMate Austin Lite today! For any feedback or bugs please contact us on Twitter (@trip_mate), our website ( http://www.tripmate.info/contact ) or like us on Facebook ( http://facebook.com/tripmateapp ).
release_text: * Now supporting Android Wear. Favourite stops and their next departures show up on your Android Wear watch if you are nearby. * BETA: Boarding now feature to track your progress while on your trip. Please note: this feature needs GPS coverage, will not work underground! * Improved user interface for map screens * Various bug fixes

description: Cat Snaps is a fun photo snapping game for your cat! Cat Snaps puts taking photos of your cat into your cats paws. Let your cat play a simple game and when it catches the target Cat Snaps will take a fun and unique photograph of your cat. Keep your cat entertained with different targets such as lasers, mice and insects. Cat snaps really does but your pet in charge of your phone's camera. Complete with gallery and social media tools, the world of cat selfies is now fun, easy and accessible. Share your cat selfies on facebook and see other peoples pictures on the cat snaps facebook page. This app is must have for all Cat Owners!
release_text: ***VERSION 1.3*** Chinese added Animated target choosers ***VERSION 1.2.6*** Fixed Facebook sharing link ***VERSION 1.2.4*** Facebook fixed for phones that don't have the FB app installed. ***VERSION 1.2.3*** Hidden Facebook Content Faster Target Speed for high resolution devices. ***VERSION 1.2.2*** Wool Pack available - fixed Buy all available - fixed GUI Changes ***VERSION 1.2.1*** Improved Tablet Support ***VERSION 1.0*** Android 2.3+ now supported. Interface Changes. Bug Fixes.

description: Lampe de poche transforme automatiquement et instantanément votre appareil Android en une VERITABLE Lampe Torche. L'outil lumineux essentiel qui tire le meilleur de la LED du dispositif Andrdoid. Fonctionnalités : - Pratique - Allumez la lampe automatiquement en lançant l'application. Profitez-en! Flashlight automatically and instantly transforms your Android device into a REAL Flashlight. Most light tool that makes the most of the LED device Andrdoid. Features: - Practice - Turn on the light automatically launching the application. Enjoy it!

LightControl is an application for controlling your Philips Hue lighting system. It provides quick manual controls over the single light or a group as well as presets. You can write an NFC tag and to execute a Preset with it. LightControl is designed around the separation of bulbs/groups and colors/moods/color temperature so that any bulb/group can be used with any color/mood/color temperature. Click on the group name and it will open a new view only with the bulbs in this group. In the current version you can create a presets with bulb-mood pairs. So with one click you can set your entire home lights. When you want to change the lights based on time mood, multiple presets can be executed at the same time if they don't have bulbs in common. If bulb in common exist the last activated preset will be the active one. Support of the schedules supplied by Philips Hue and stored on the bridge. Multiple themes in the program, so you can select between light and dark look. In the free version you can control up to 5 lights. If you need more you can unlock it from the menu as an in-app purchase. Enable the automatic updates so you can get all new features when they are released! App tested on: - Nexus 4 - Nexus 5 - Nexus 7 - Asus TF-101
release_text: - Start the lights by just selecting the brightness or the color. - Added setting so the frame around the color icon can be removed/shown. - Improvements in the presets execution engine. - Improved the way to switch between local and remote connection. Check the settings. - Added NFC support so you can start preset though NFC tag. Long click on preset to be able to write the tag. - Added more icons for the presets - Bug fixes.

description: Improve your kids preschool reading skills with this fantastic Story Book game full of stories, songs and narration! You'll find tons of FREE sing-along story books with songs, pictures, stories, narration and animations for your preschool kids and children! Kids Story Books will develop your childrens preschool reading skills. Designed to help develop your children and toddlers reading and recognition of common words in a fun, safe and educational environment. Learning to read has never been SO MUCH FUN for preschool toddlers! Tablet Support! ALL stories and books are completely free for your preschool childs learning and enjoyment during their preschool reading years. There are 13 stories for your child to read, and more will be coming over time. Your child will learn how to: ★ Read simple words ★ Match words to their correct positions in sentences ★ Identify objects ★ Sing popular songs Your child will LEARN TO READ by following the NARRATION that accompanies each page. Each word will be expertly pronounced whenever pressed, therefore teaching your child the pronunciation of each word of the story. Most importantly, your child will also LOVE THE POPULAR NURSERY RHYME SONGS that play on each page when they hit the "play" button or when they complete all the words for the page. And all characters and objects have their own UNIQUE SOUND EFFECTS so that your child will have endless hours of fun playing with each character and object on the page. Some of the key features include: ★ ALL FREE uniquely themed stories ★ BIG, FUN and BRIGHT PICTURES that appeal to your childs natural curiousity ★ Most characters on the screen will animate in some way when touched and moved around the screen! ★ INTERACTIVE PICTURES that allow your childs imagination to run wild as they move the pieces around the page in play! ★ TEXT is highlighted as the narrator reads the sentences ★ Teaches your child where each word belongs in a sentence by requiring them to drag the word into the correct part of the sentence before progressing ★ All sentences and words are PROFESSIONALLY NARRATED to teach your child how to pronounce words correctly ★ NURSERY RHYMES accompany each page to allow your child to SING-ALONG to the story Currently includes the following popular stories and nursery rhymes for your children to read and sing along to: - Jack and Jill - Five Little Ducks - Where is my dog - Wheels on the Bus - Old MacDonald - Row Row Row your boat - If you're happy and you know it MORE STORIES and SONGS to come soon as we create and release them! Acknowledgements ============== - http://www.freesfx.co.uk for the use of the music "psyche up" for the menu screens background music
release_text: ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Please light up all stars if you like this app :) Improved the graphics to be of a much higher quality. Now graphics and text will be rendered at their proper resolution and won't be fuzzy anymore.

description: Tornado Season is a Weather App that contains all the information you need on storm patterns, cloud types & formations, Weather related News feeds and more. The App contains: ★ Doppler Loop feed ★ European Weather Loop feed ★ Take Video and instantly share out to your network(s) ★ Storm Handbook ★ Cloud Formations ★ Inbuilt RSS readers - already setup to read NOAA (US) and Met Office (UK) news feeds ★ Inbuilt RSS readers - already setup to read Storm Chaser Network (reports and position) feeds ★ In-App browsing of latest weather information - NOAA Severe Weather Alerts (US) and Met Office Severe Weather (UK) ★ Built-in Search feature - type a keyword and it searches our App and shows you the results ★ Built-in Aviary Photo Effects - take your favourite Storm / Weather photos and add effects ★ Built-in Notes feature - take and update your notes as you go All contained within one App - a raft of information and functions at your fingertips. ■ Our App updates are always FREE and we never put ads in our paid for Apps. If you see a mistake or want something adding, drop us an email and we will do our best to include suggestions in future App updates. Our "Info" tab contains App information - including last and next update dates. So, keep checking as our info page changes regularly to reflect our App status. The info page also has our email link for contact. Tornado Season has all the information you need and lots of useful extras too. What are you waiting for?
release_text: Added Doppler Radar Loop Added European Radar Loop Added quick access tab to USA Doppler Radar loop Added Video - can now take and share video (and photos) directly from the App Added Storm Chaser RSS feeds (reports and position feeds)

description: From now on, PlanMaker Mobile is free to download and use, both for home use and business. Now there is no excuse to use an inferior office solution – you can have the best without paying a dime: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=softmaker.applications.planmakertrial Tablet users should also check out our new PlanMaker HD which offers the feature set of a desktop spreadsheet: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=softmaker.applications.planmaker.hd PlanMaker Mobile is the only spreadsheet for Android that lets you open, edit, and save all your Microsoft Excel worksheets with all data, formulas, and formatting intact. It displays your Excel worksheets exactly like they look on your PC - it even displays the charts in your Excel files correctly and updates them! ► Edit and save all .xls and .xlsx files from Microsoft Excel 5.0 to 2013 seamlessly, without loss of data, formulas, or formatting ► Also opens and saves password-protected Microsoft Excel files. ► Charts are not only correctly displayed but even updated if their underlying values change. ► More than 330 calculation functions (maths, financial maths, statistics, data analysis, date and time, etc.) ► Supports complex numbers and array functions ► Perpetual time format (20:00 + 5:00 is not 1:00 but 25:00) which also allows negative times ► PDF export directly from within the app ► Access documents in Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote, and OneDrive directly from within the app ► Syntax highlighting and formula display help you quickly find errors in your calculations. ► Many character formatting options, including bold, italic, underlined, font and size, text and background color, subscript and superscript, small caps, and all caps ► Flexible number formatting (default, numeric, currency, accounting, date/time, percentage, scientific, user-defined) ► Display any TrueType or OpenType font ► Freeze rows and/or columns ► Insert, view, and edit cell comments ► Insert, hide, and delete rows and columns ► Size and auto-size rows and columns ► Merge and split cells ► Line wrap and vertical text in cells ► Cell borders and shades ► Up to 255 worksheets per file ► Multi-level undo and redo ► Send worksheets by e-mail directly from PlanMaker Mobile in any of its file formats (PDF, XLS, XLSX, HTML, etc.) ► Menus and dialogs switchable between English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Japanese, Chinese, Russian, Hungarian, Bulgarian, Greek, and Turkish ► ... and much more! PlanMaker Mobile is the only spreadsheet for Android that truly deserves its name. Discover for yourself its superior compatibility with Microsoft Excel, the wide range of functions and the friendly user interface! Imagine this: You can start a worksheet in Microsoft Excel on your PC, edit it using PlanMaker Mobile, then finish it with Microsoft Excel. Everything stays intact, no formatting or data is lost. No other Android spreadsheet does this! Supported file formats: PlanMaker, Microsoft Excel (XLS, XLT, XLSX, XLTX, XLSM, XLTM), RTF, HTML, SYLK, dBASE, DIF, CSV, plain text in many encodings Notes: If you have questions about this application, please do not post them in the ratings, but contact our support team directly: E-mail: support@softmaker.com Forum: http://www.softmaker.com/forum Web site: http://www.softmaker.com We look forward to hearing from you! You can view the built-in help pages by opening the menu and then tapping on Tools > Help . Additional tips can be found at http://www.softmaker.com/english/tipsandroid_en.htm
release_text: - New design for the toolbars - New design for menus and dialog boxes - New Transpose function in the Table menu - Improvements to the import/export filters - Bug fixes

description: Zeezam's a single-player sequence dice game along the same lines as Generala and Poker Dice. The rules and scoring will be familiar to anyone who's played Yahtzee before. Exceptions are unused rolls are rolled-over and entering a Zeezam (all five dice showing the same face) into the Chance, 3 of a Kind, and 4 of a Kind categories scores double the normal points. The minimum possible score is 6 and the maximum is 465.
release_text: 2.12 ▪ Layout + operation refinements 2.10 ▪ Interstitial ad shown between games instead of banner ad

description: Do you have high mobile phone bills? What to install? VoipBlazer! You are one click away from saving loads of money. Get the maximum out of your android phone with this VoipBlazer app for your mobile phone. You can save up to 90% on international phone calls. Use your regular wifi network or 3g network to access our platform. Crystal clear calls are now available for absolute bargain prices. Download the VoipBlazer app on your andoid phone and start saving today! Let’s bust those expensive phone bills now!! Using our app as a default dialer may interfere with dialing 911 emergency services.

The app. detects and offers solutions to issues around USB Host and OTG cables. THIS SOFTWARE WILL NOT MOUNT OR SHOW THE FILES ON A USB DRIVE. It verifies your OTG cable is good and that Android can see the USB device. Other software may be required to see the files. Usage: 1. Disconnect your OTG cable when prompted. 2. Connect your OTG cable when prompted. 3. If everything is OK, you will get 4 green check marks. If nothing happens or you get less than 4 green checks, tap More Info (Web) for a description of the problem. Software can not overcome a hardware limitation. If your device does not support OTG, nothing will happen when you connect the cable. Please do not write a bad review because your hardware does not support OTG! If your device does support OTG and it is not detected by this software, please contact me via the "Email Developer" link. Required hardware: 1. An OTG cable 2. A flash/pen drive, card reader or camera.
release_text: Added cable detection for Nexus 5 and Moto X.

description: Netatmo Discover the first Personal Weather Station made for Android phones and its App! A Netatmo Weather Station is required. Find out more about the Netatmo Weather Station at www.netatmo.com. Become a contributor and be part of this unique Personal Weather Station network: measure locally with your Netatmo Weather Station, monitor directly from your phone with the Netatmo app! DASHBOARD: -Access your station’s measurements (temperature, humidity, barometer, felt-like temperature, CO2 and air quality) directly from your phone. -Intuitive and easy navigation! Swipe between outdoor measurements and indoor measurements in one easy gesture. EVENTS AND NOTIFICATIONS: -Notifications for peak and variation events (CO2 concentration, extreme temperatures, low and high pressures…). -Automatically logs events in your personal timeline. EMBEDDED FORECAST: -7 days of forecast, available at your exact Netatmo Weather Station location!

Hunting signals and calls featuring hunting horns, traditional hunting tunes. With this Apps you can play horn ring melodies related with hunting rituals: -Hunting hymn -Breakfast -Hunters Convening -Standing -Participants greeting -Call to hunt -The end of the Hunting -St.Hubert marche -Hunting King -Killed beasts tribute -Wild Boar tribute -Birds tribute etc.

Fully 3D live wallpaper depicting beautiful rose flower reacting to touch gestures. You can rotate flower by swiping through your home screens - scene will change its rotation according to touches. Features: - flower rotates as home screen changes - tilt rose by swiping up and down - customizable flower color and background - random flower colors every day - photographic vignette to draw attention to flower App supports Daydream mode on devices with Android 4.2 or higher to be displayed when device is docked or charging.
release_text: Improved speed of restoring live wallpaper. Implemented opening live wallpaper after installation. Fixed glitch in settings screen.

description: Ride fast and avoid obstacles that aim to wreck your life by making you crash n burn hard. Help paperboy run his route as best you can while managing the cards that are weapons of destruction. Paper boy aspires to be the best he can be, however in order for him to do this he needs to successfully avoid everything that stands in his way. Stay alive longer by catching and using the power cards to punk those that aim to stop you in your tracks. In this game, the paper boy is done with his route and all he is trying to do is get home safely. This game is REALLY CHALLENGING AND FUN for all ages and you will ENJOY IT being a part of your collection!!
Do you love yogurt? Of course every one love it, well then come to make your own yogurt now!

description: Pink Sweet theme for GO SMS Pro is available now! Designed and developed by GO SMS Dev Team. Cute, sweet, pink, fantasy, what's more, this theme embeds a matched font（Need the support of LATEST version of GO SMS Pro), suggest downloading the font to make theme nicer. Important: 1. This is not a standalone app, you need to download the LATEST version of GO SMS Pro app in order to apply this theme. (Search “GO SMS Pro” to download) 2. To apply the theme within GO SMS Pro, download it from Menu->Theme(or Plug-in UI->Theme shop). After downloaded, it will displayed in "Installed Theme" Tab, click and apply it. GO Sms Pro theme gosmstheme

Lock screen widget with notifications Features : • Locky allows you to check your notifications without unlocking your device. • It monitors notifications coming from any app on your device, and displays them on your lock screen. • Pebble Watch support Locky Widget can display : • SMS, missed calls notifications • New Gmail/Email/Exchange messages notifications • Messages notifications from IM apps (Hangouts, WhatsApp, Skype, ...) • Social networks updates notifications (Facebook, Twitter, Google +, ...) • Calendar reminders Support : XDA thread : http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2358010 Google+ beta community : https://plus.google.com/communities/114726077366703351611 Support page : http://getsatisfaction.com/productigeeky Follow us : http://twitter.com/productigeeky http://facebook.com/productigeeky http://silverfingersoftware.com/google-plus ~~~ Checking notifications from third party apps requires the activation of the Locky accessibility service/notification listener. Status bar notifications must be enabled in the monitored apps for Locky to be able to process them.
release_text: - Integrated a crash detection tool that should make the detection of crashes easier (and the correction faster) - Pebble Watch support - Bug fixes

description: FL Studio Mobile allows you to create and save complete multi-track music projects on your Android phone or tablet device. You can even load the FL Studio Mobile projects into the 'FL Studio Desktop PC' version* and take them to the next level. If it’s a beat on the step sequencer, a melody on the piano roll or a full song on the playlist, FL Studio Mobile has you covered. Never lose that idea again. Get it down and happening wherever you are. FEATURES • 133 high quality instruments, drum kits & sliced-loop beats • All instruments have FL Studio desktop equivalents for FL Studio desktop import and extension • Step sequencer for fast percussion programming and sliced-loop reworking • Configurable virtual piano-keyboard • Drum pads: Configurable number of pads • Audio tracks: audio recording (with monitoring), wav/m4a import • Wave editor: cut, trim, normalize, reverse, insert silence, fade in/out (3 curves) • Browser with preview button and logical sorting into Instruments, Synths, Drum kits & Loops • Pan, volume, release and attack time configurable per instrument • Pitch bend via accelerometer • High quality, battery-friendly audio engine (latency depends on the device) • Drum loops and sliced loops ready to start your project with a cool beat • Effects include Limiter, Reverb, Delay, EQ, Amp & Filter to enhance your mix • 99 track sequencer and intuitive editing options • Per-track mute, solo, effect bus, pan and volume adjustment • Edit at the level of tracks, bars or down to individual notes • Piano roll editor for manual entry of note & chord sequence data or detailed editing of recorded performances • Undo and redo for all editable screens • Metronome with tempo & time-signature settings • Intuitive positioning of screens with the slide gesture and resize with the pinch gesture • Save and load your songs, export to WAV and AAC • MIDI file import/export • Share your songs via Email or Dropbox • In-app user manual • Android 2.3.3 required • Works with all screen resolutions, optimized for 1280x800, 800x480, 960x640 and 480x320 screens. Visit www.flstudiomobile.com for video tutorials, demos and access to the FL Studio Mobile community. For sales support email flstudiomobile@image-line.com . TROUBLE-SHOOTING INSTALLATION ISSUES Please visit this link for step-by-step troubleshooting options http://support.image-line.com/redirect/flmobile_android_troubleshooting NOTE: A custom ROM, a rooted Android OS (with privileged apps installed) and antivirus software can cause significant performance issues. * "FL Studio" desktop PC version (sold separately) is installed, on average, over 30,000 times each DAY making it one of the world's most popular and exciting music production systems. Everything you need in one package to compose, arrange, record, edit, mix and master professional quality music, the perfect studio partner for FL Studio Mobile. You can download the demo version of the FL Studio Desktop PC version and enhance your FL Studio Mobile projects for free then save to .mp3, .wav, .ogg or .mid format.

Event Flow is a clean and beautiful calendar widget that displays your agenda or calendar, with lots of features and customization options. What you get - Agenda widget, with a list of your events grouped by day; - Calendar widget, with a (resizable) month view; - Weather forecast for up to 5 days on the agenda widget; - Extensive customization: you can change the background and font colors, the font type and its density, customize the header, etc; - Preset themes, with nice defaults for colors, fonts and other options; - Select which calendar events to display; - And more. This widget is free, but some configuration options are locked. To unlock, click "upgrade" and you'll be able to buy the premium version via Google Play. Permissions We dislike apps that ask a lot of permissions without justifying them. So here's what we need and why: Your personal information : To read your calendar events Network communication and Your location : To show the weather for your location (only your approximate location) Have fun and join us at https://plus.google.com/communities/100148874755192683155
release_text: v1.5.4 - Added new day indicator on calendar widget; - Romanian translation (thanks Gabriel Diaconu); - Weather tweaks. v1.5.3 - German translation (thanks Toni Müller) v1.5.1/v1.5.2 - Polish translation (thanks Tomek Banaszak and Zas) - Small tweaks v1.5.0 - Updated design to conform with Google's Material design guidelines - New font option (Roboto regular) - New themes (Material Light and Dark) - Bug fixes

description: A classic slide puzzle game filled with 144 unique images and 196 levels. Based on the classic 15-puzzle, you must take a picture that is split up into blocks and mixed up, and slide the pieces back to the correct order. Conquer each level as you progress in single player mode or compete against your friends and others with challenges. Earn achievements by doing both! You can also play quick and random games if you just want something to play to pass the time. Be sure to check the leader boards! You can easily challenge anyone you find on the leader boards, but beware, they are up there for a reason. To have your stats on the leader boards, you must create an account and log in. To challenge others, you must also have an account. Features: - Keeps track of saves across devices - Multitudes of achievements to obtain - See where you rank among the best on the leader boards - Create levels from any of your images in quick play Full Version: - Ability to play all 196 levels - Ability to challenge others - Quick play any level, plus any image from your device Permissions: - WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : we use this to cache data for leader boards, thus speeding up load times for menus and using less internet data - INTERNET: we use internet access to sync game data to the cloud - ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: we use this permission to determine whether or not we can perform a sync (error handling) - READ_CONTACTS: allows you to challenge a player from your contacts list (we do nothing else with it) - BILLING: we use this to allow for upgrading and in-app purchasing

With a fresh new atmosphere, easier controls, and a rich storyline with new characters to meet and play with, this game offers many new ways to experience the joy of farming! - Rediscover farming adventure in the new Green Farm! - Take on the challenging task of restoring a manor with the help of friends and neighbours! - Complete many missions full of farming, harvesting, crafting, and more. - Being social will help you grow! description: Extreme Roller Skater 3D is an addictive free roller skating racing game in a traffic bound downtown street road with bounty collection makes to uplift your sporting spirits to the highest level of action thrills with natural 3d animations of jump, pedal, spin stunts or tricks etc. Highly addictive roller coaster extreme skate racing is waiting for you. Game is well suited for outdoor or indoor sports gamers as well as car or motor cycle or bike riding racing gaming experts. Excellent game for kids including boys & girls. Now you can - with this Extreme Roller Skater 3D! As you cross certain game thresholds of speed and distance, roller skating speed moves to next level automatically to get more thrill. Try, not to hit moving vehicle objects while collecting bounties either same or opposite side of the road. Learn to focus and maneuver or steer the roller skates using motion or button or joystick controls. More you collect, more to brag about it in game center with others. Pro inline free top street skater simulation with stunts or tricks with speed rush not to dash or smash hit real fast cars or moto biker or trucks and end the great sk8 roller coaster game with super sonic run of bounty board of points and brag others. Don't miss this wonderful 3D Extreme Roller Skater game with modern cityscape track and various biker natural animations. Also try to find out hidden or surprise random animations during game play. Also as a bonus, we added new cool bridge track to extend the cool play. Total thrill & addictive. Also custom level for absorbing music and motion sensitivity levels to fit your needs. What are you waiting for ? Thrill never stops! Ready, Set, Go.! Fun starts here and never stops with superb background music blended with wheels, decks and landing gear makes it own grinding noise. Limited time special offer. - prologue – One day, I got a strange letter saying:"I'll give you money. Come to the address in the letter." I couldn't say no to the possibility of free money, so I went to the house at the designated address, but there was no one there. But then, for some reason, money started falling from a hole in the ceiling. Your mission is only to escape from the room by opening the door. However, to do this, you'll need to gather some items and use those items in solving puzzles. The rules are very simple. You can tap various locations, and you can also flick when you need to move about the room. description: This handy app can help you get out of debt quickly. It will show you how much you can save and create a payment schedule. It uses the debt snowball technique of paying off debts. This method speeds up debt elimination by using the payment from a paid off debt as an extra payment on the next debt. See how much you can save. You can even send your debt plan to your email account
release_text: Bug that sometimes paid off the debts in the wrong order has been corrected. Although dollar signs are shown the app will work in any currency as long as all debts are in the same currency.

description: With this new, free application ALDI keeps you updated on the move, providing: * "Specials" menu - a quick overview of special buys on the scheduled days * "Shopping list" menu - allows you to save an item to a mobile shopping list * "Stores" menu - a convenient store locator with store opening hours Highest quality at the lowest prices at ALDI Permissions * Your location: This permission retrieves your GPS location in order to customise the Store search. * Network communication: This permission is used to retrieve the current search action and the relevant store data. With the exception of the email reminder service, no information about the user is sent. For more information, see our Privacy Policy www.aldi.com.au/en/privacy-policy. * Your personal information: This permission allows the results of a Store Search to be saved as a contact. Existing contacts are not accessed and call logs are not evaluated by the ALDI Australia app, this permission is automatically assigned depending on the Android version installed on the device. * Hardware controls: This permissions allows for enhancement i.e. Displaying the nearest Store with a larger Logo. * Network communication: This permission relates to the retrieval of current product information, the ALDI Australia app checks for a current data connection, and if there is none will display a warning. * System tools: This permission relates to the memory being reloaded for the ALDI Australia app when you restart your smartphone. * Google service configuration: This permission is required for Google Maps. The ALDI Australia app does not access the Google service configuration. * Access to protected storage: This permission allows the ALDI Australia app to test future functionality that will allow caching of google maps. The ALDI Australia app does not access external memory or modify/delete SD card contents *: Refer to "Accessing protected memory test". * Approximate location: This permission allows the Store Locator to determine your location using alternate methods prior to GPS to conserve energy consumption.
release_text: * Several bugfixes and enhancements have been implemented.

developer: i Learn With - Kids Educational Games
description: Counting and Addition Kids Games will get your child ready for school with these fun math learning games and educational games for kids in Preschool and Kindergarten! Poko will teach your child key math skills such as numbers, counting and addition by playing with toys. These fun math learning games have been designed with educational experts for kids 3, 4, 5 and 6 years old and either in Preschool, Kindergarten, Pre-K, 1st grade of Primary school, or Homeschool to learn counting, addition and numbers. • Over 7 million downloads of the "i Learn With" suite of educational games. • "i Learn With" apps won numerous awards such as "Best In Family-Friendly Products" - Moms' Choice Awards 2012, and "Brain Toy Award" - Academics' Choice Awards 2012. “As always, Tribal Nova‘s apps are superbly designed and although this app takes on the common subject of early math, it does so in a way that is fun and educational without over reliance on “gaming” to teach.” - Best Apps for Kids “A really stellar educational app, excellent for learning and reinforcing the basics of addition.” - Famigo TRY BEFORE YOU BUY Develop your child’s curiosity and education. **FREE** Add up to 6 - Count and add up to 6 bowling pins by playing with Poko and Minus. **Unlock the full version of Counting and Addition Kids Games in a single in-app purchase and learn more with these fun math educational games:** Add up to 10 - Building blocks: Help Poko, Bibi and Minus group sets of blocks and learn to add up to 10. Add up to 15 - Find all the objects Poko is looking for in his room and learn to add up to 15 by adding two or three groups of objects to form a basic equation. Primary skill taught: Kids Math - Counting - Addition Secondary skills: - Progressive introduction to math symbols - Number recognition - One-to-one correspondence KEY FEATURES Counting and Addition Kids Games is part of the "i Learn With" program for kids in Preschool, Kindergarten and Homeschool designed to get your child ready for school while having fun! • Cross-curricular game-based learning program in Math, Science, Literacy and more • Self-adjusting levels of difficulty • Unique progress tracker for parents • Detailed success stats for your child that can be compared with children the same age • Recommended learning path personalized for your child • 27 fun rewards and medals to motivate your child to learn • Designed with educational and child development experts Find out more on www.ilearnwith.com. Need Help with Counting and Addition Kids Games? Have questions, suggestions or concerns? Please email us at support@ilearnwith.com and we’ll be happy to help! Tribal Nova is a leading developer and publisher of educational games featuring famous characters such as Bob the builder, Dino Train, Curious George from the PBS KIDS network, Poko and Bo from the CBC network, Totally Spies Academy!, Spiez from the Cartoon Network, The Mighty Jungle on the Disney Channel,... Copyright © 2005 Poko. Poko is a trademark of Halifax Film Ltd. All rights reserved. This app was tested on Samsung Galaxy and Google Nexus tablets.

TAP POLICE Experience the thrill job of police driver in the city full of escaped criminals. Catch all thugs to bring order on the streets in this fast paced arcade game! KILLER WEAPONS AND POWERUPS Fight villians with powerful weapons including shotguns, miniguns and rockets. Empower yourself with collectible bonuses including nitro, shields and mines. WIDE VARIETY OF MISSIONS Apart from main storyline game offers sidemissions and minigames. Mission types include search and destroy, catching criminals or loot recovery. Moreover you will be challanged with minigames including best officer contest or donut delivery. RULE THE CITY Roam around the city in fully destructible environment. Discover new city districts by advancing in the storyline. Catching every last of convicts is your ultimate goal!

Modern Snake is a fresh new version of the famous “Snake” game with a modern minimalistic Holo design and optimizations for touchscreens. Let’s revive the good old times of the old Nokia phones and play this Snake which features many different levels and customization options. Furthermore, Modern Snake contains no advertisements and does not need any special permissions. A mode for two player at one device as well as online leaderboards and achievements complete this game. "This game will surely keep you out of the boredoom" theandroidgalaxy.com "I like the game and not just because I loved the original arcade game: this was a fresh take on a classic" androidroundown.com Modern Snake offers: • a large gaming area which fills the whole screen • 15 different levels • 3 simple ways to control the snake • no advertisements • no special permissions • a mode for 2 player at one device • online leaderboards and achievements • an alternate dark design to save energy on devices with an AMOLED display • personal settings for the speed and difficulty • options to turn on walls, sound and vibration • a fresh minimalistic Holo design Please note: The game contains 15 different Level - 7 of them are free to play. The other levels can be enabled by a small donation of 0.79€ / $0.99. This single time donation gives access to all current and future levels. Thanks a lot! Optimizations and new levels in future are planned! Feel free to send me an email for questions, problems or feedback!
release_text: If you like the game, feel free to support the developer and leave a nice feedback in the Google Playstore. Thanks a lot! version 2.6.2 - fix: pause the game when it is in the background - fix: correct donate achievement version 2.6 - new score calculation based on speed and difficulty - added Google Play Games Integration with online leaderboards for each level and achievements (sign in to Google+ in the "info"-menu) - improved level selection - food in other color then the snake

description: iFiszki Niderlandzki Trening od podstaw to aplikacja do skutecznej nauki języka dla osób zaczynających naukę języka niderlandzkiego zawierająca 1200 słówek i zdań. Dzięki iFiszkom łatwo i przyjemnie nauczysz się słówek, poznasz przykłady ich użycia oraz udoskonalisz wymowę i rozumienie ze słuchu. iFiszki masz zawsze przy sobie. Możesz uczyć się w każdej wolnej chwili! Aplikacja iFiszki Niderlandzki Trening od podstaw zawiera: * 1200 słówek i zdań -> poznasz słówka niezbędne do swobodnej komunikacji w na poziomie A1-A2 * nagrania wymowy wszystkich słówek w wykonaniu native speakerów -> nauczysz się poprawnej wymowy * blisko 600 przykładowych zdań wraz z tłumaczeniem -> uczysz się użycia słów w praktyce * praktyczny i wygodny podział na 21 kategorii tematycznych -> uporządkujesz swoją wiedzę * system powtórek -> zoptymalizujesz naukę i zaoszczędzisz czas * opcję managera słówek -> możesz dodawać własne słówka * testy podsumowujące i przejrzyste statystyki -> sprawdzisz postępy nauki Aplikacja dla osób na poziomie podstawowym (A1-A2). Przykładowe słówka: woning, verkoper, gezin, geldautomaat, prijs, gezondheid, toerist, kaart, werken, vacature, vierkant, terugkomen, kwalificatie, fietsen, reizen. Dzięki iFiszkom: - poznasz 1200 zwrotów i wyrażeń najczęściej używanych w języku niderlandzkim - nauczysz się prawidłowej wymowy i akcentu. - zaczniesz się swobodnie komunikować na poziomie podstawowym Dzięki aplikacji iFiszki masz zawsze pod ręką na swoim smartfonie lub tablecie. Możesz uczyć się języka o każdej porze i w dowolnym miejscu! Aplikacja i materiał językowy zostały przygotowane przez wydawnictwo językowe Edgard, twórcę ponad 300 publikacji do nauki 30 języków obcych. EduCards Dutch training from scratch is an application for effective language learning for beginners learning the Dutch language contains 1200 words and sentences. Thanks EduCards easy and fun to learn words, know examples of their use, and perfected the pronunciation and listening comprehension.  EduCards you have always with you. You can learn at every free moment! Application EduCards Dutch training from scratch includes: * 1200 words and sentences -> know words necessary for communication in the level of A1-A2 * Record the pronunciation of all words in the execution of native speakers -> learn the correct pronunciation * Nearly 600 examples of sentences with translation -> learn to use words in practice * Practical and convenient division into 21 thematic categories -> Organize your knowledge * Replays -> optimize learning and save time * Option vocabulary Manager -> You can add your own words * Tests summarizing and transparent statistics -> check the progress of science The application for people on a basic level (A1-A2). Sample Tag woning, verkoper, gezin, geldautomaat, prijs, Gezondheid, toerist, kaart, werken, Vacature, vierkant, terugkomen, kwalificatie, fietsen, reizen. Thanks EduCards: - Know 1,200 words and phrases commonly used in Dutch - You will learn the correct pronunciation and accent. - Begin to freely communicate on a basic level With this application EduCards you always have on hand for your smartphone or tablet. You can learn anytime, anywhere! Application and linguistic material has been prepared by the publishing language Edgard, creator of more than 300 publications to learn 30 languages.

But that’s not all, there’s much more zombie action fun tucked inside - so go ahead, install Zombiewood today. It’s funny, free, and one intense adventure! description: The number-match game that inspired 2048 & many others with completely different play style! TO PLAY: Slide same numbers together to add them. New numbers then drop down to fill the board. Play until no more moves. YOUR GOAL: Get highest score possible! Learn in seconds, hooked in minutes. However, it will take months if not longer to master it. This is the game that will keep your brain sharp and spinning for a lifetime! If you enjoyed 2048, you will love this game and see how it is much more strategic, addictive and challenging! Play and Play Again to achieve personal best and compete on GameCenter Leaderboard! Want to have fun later on? Your progress is saved automatically! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ HOW TO PLAY & MASTER POWER OF 2! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ - Slide two identical numbers together to add them up. - A new, random number then drops down to keep the board filled - Play till there is no more moves - Create larger numbers to earn more score and coins - Coins can be used to activate power ups! - It's a simple game that takes time to master. While a beginner's game could end in minutes, a master's game could last hours or days! You don't have to finish it in one sitting, since your progress are always saved as you play! - To master the game, you may have to even think 10 steps ahead. Kind of like a chess game, for one person. - With a perfect strategy, you will earn enough coins for your spending needs. In-App Purchases are available and completely optional. - Challenge yourself and others on Gamecenter Leaderboard. This is a game that measures your brain power, and improves it as you play. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ "Power of 2!" is brought to you by veteran puzzle game development team Thinkcube Inc. Like us on facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ThinkCubeGames Try our other puzzle games like "Hexic Flow", "Slide & Roll", "Glow Free", "Blockbuster" and more! Love our game? Share it with your friends! Comments? Feedback is always welcome!

The goal of Tamagochi Tree is to let your tree be always growing. Water the dying oak tree and your plant will grow. Take care of your Oak Tree and water it if needed. Improve your attention, memory and fine motor skills. Tree Life features: - Exciting gameplay - Cool music - Easy to play - Handy interface - Nice graphics Tree Life: It's very busy gardening!

description: Want to video call your Facebook friends? The OpenMarket Seen application lets you make high quality video and voice calls over Wi-Fi or 3G to your Facebook friends and groups. Better yet, these calls are FREE worldwide (mobile operator permitting and data rates may apply). By downloading, you agree to the Seen End User License Agreement - please see http://jointheseen.com/eula for details. N.B. Seen on Android is currently in PUBLIC BETA. Please help us improve the app by reporting any bugs: press your phone's menu button whilst on the main app screen and selecting 'Submit Bug Report', clearly explaining what went wrong. Thanks! Seen lets you: * Make video or HD Audio voice calls without using cellular voice minutes * Call any Facebook friends or groups worldwide * Share your visual experiences with your friends Making a call is simple — just log in to Seen with your Facebook account and tap on a friend's profile picture to place a call. If they don't have Seen, you can invite them to use it through the app. Seen also includes privacy settings so that you can choose who can call you. See friends from the past and share your experiences with them! It's a great way to connect and talk! All you need is a Facebook account and an Android phone, iPhone 3GS or iPhone 4. Grab the app, tell your friends, and join the Seen! Download now and enjoy! --- Seen is built using the OpenMarket Softphone Toolkit. Please visit http://jointheseen.com/sdk if you'd like to add Seen video/voice calling to your own app!

description: Droidsheet is a spreadsheet app that includes a built in Macro Programming language and File Manager. Droidsheet has the usual facilities for inserting, deleting, copying and pasting cells either individually or in blocks. together with a range of formatting options. The formatting options allow you to change your locale (County / Region), number formats, typeface, text size, font effects, text alignment, text colour, background colour, row height and column width. A variety of functions are available including:- Mathematical Functions: ABS(), ACOS(), ACOSD(), ASIN(), ASIND(), ATAN(), ATAND(), COS(), COSD(), EXP(), EXP10(), LOG(), LOG10(), POW(), SIN(), SIND(), SQRT(), TAN() and TAND(). Logical Function: AND(), NOT() and OR(). Selection Function: IF(), HLOOKUP() and VLOOKUP(). Text Functions: CONCATENATE(), LEFT(), LEN(), MID() and RIGHT(). Stats Functions are AVERAGE(), COUNT(), COUNTBLANK(), MAX(), MIN() and SUM(). Financial Functions: FV() and RRI(). Droidsheet also includes a powerful Macro Programming language that can be used for performing more complex calculations. This macro programming environment is based around a structured dialect of BASIC which includes ten data types (BOOLEAN, BYTE, SHORT, INTEGER, LONG, FLOAT, DOUBLE, COMPLEX, STRING and VARIANT) together with a variety of functions including mathematical, string manipulation, time and date, type checking, type conversion, and most importantly, some for manipulating spreadsheet cell values. Your files are stored in either your devices internal memory or on an external memory card. The included file manager helps you organise your work and allows you to browse files and folders, create new droidsheet files, opening existing droidsheet files, duplicate files, rename files, copy files, cut files, paste files, delete files, create folders, rename folders, cut folders, pasting folders and deleting folders. The free version of droidsheet periodically displays a "free version" dialog which can be deactivated by purchasing any of the following upgrades:- 1. Pro Version which includes all of the upgrades (Includes upgrades 2, 3 and 4). 2. Macro Programs without size restriction. 3. Reading and writing of standard CSV files. 4. Multi-Level Undo / Redo Capability - the standard version only has single level undo / redo. ******************** If you have any problems, find any bugs or have any suggestions for this app then please Email us directly using the link provided on this page. Leaving a one star ratings on Google Play does little to help fix the problem and is not as effective as sending us an email describing any problems you have seen. ********************
release_text: 3.4.20 - Fixed problem that sometimes occurred referencing blank cells. 3.4.19 - Fixed problem with spreadsheet cell borders not always lining up. 3.4.18 - Added support for multiple languages:- English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese and Russian. 3.4.17 - Fixed problem that sometimes occurred following upgrade. 3.4.16 - Undo / Redo Capability Added (InApp Upgrade Required for Multi-Level Undo/Redo). Moved Zoom In / Zoom Out Tools to the right end of the toolbar.

Ymax is a Mobile VoIP dialer application that allows to make VoIP calls from any of the Android devices and it uses 3G/Edge/Wi-Fi Internet connectivity.

myBook Lite is a personal organizer application targeted for the busy mobile tablet user to coordinate events, contacts, tasks and notes with ease. The myBook Lite application conveniently groups these tools in one application to allow a user to maximize organization, interoperability and efficiency. myBook Lite is a "try before you buy" version of the myBook Standard Edition. It is limited functionality and also limited number of entries compared to the Standard Edition. If you like the application, please support the developer by purchasing the Standard Edition, which has unlimited entries and full save/export capability. Also please remember that only the Standard Edition will export or save to files (csv, txt, vcs...etc.), this is NOT available in the Lite Edition, so there is no way to transfer data from the Lite Edition to the Standard so please switch to the Standard before storing hundreds of useful events ;) We would love to get your feedback, to make a better product. Please send your comments and user experiences on our support page: www.myBook-mobile.com/contact.html Currently Supports Android 2.1 & up Operating Systems (Optimized for 10 inch 1280 x 800 screens and 7 inch 800 x 480 screens) Features: Calendar – Event Scheduling and Alarms in Easy views: Year, Month, Week & Day Contacts – Save, View, Sync and Prioritize Contact information and Photo Task Lists – Save, View, Update Status and Prioritize Notes – Save, List, Sort and View Text Notes, Memos…etc. Save Multiple Projects – Business, School, Personal…etc. Supports Google Android Speech to Text typing for fast easy data input and updating. Features available in Standard Version: All Lite features No Advertisements! Import and Export common formats – txt, csv, vcalendar & vcard Save unlimited amounts of projects events and lists Password protection for projects Priority Support for first 6 months Websites: Product Website: www.myBook-mobile.com Developer Website: www.indeaengineering.com/products.html Support Form (for fastest response): http://tracewidth.com/helpdesk Keywords: mybook, organizer, personal organizer, notes, tasks, contacts, calendar, schedule, events, reminder, address book, month, day, year, alarm, alert, vcal, vcard, text, tasklist, task list, memo, notepad, productivity, organization, phone number, address, email, planner, daily planner, event planner

description: The VizZle Student Player (TM) is a kid-friendly environment that allows educators and parents to launch interactive instructional lessons for children who learn best from visually supported materials (e.g. children with autism, in early education, or typical children with a visual learning style). VizZle Student Player was designed using exclusively licensed intellectual property stemming from research proving the efficacy of a visual language-based approach to educating students with autism. It is also equally effective for any student who learns best visually.

Are you worried about finding the right place to eat to meet your fussy friends' preferences and to get there without getting lost? Not to worry! Now with Hot Pepper Gourmet with new features, you'll be able to find series of restaurants with the "Google Voice Search," and narrow down your choices by going through some of the high resolution pictures from each of the restaurant. Once you have picked the perfect restaurant that suits your needs, tell your friends about it through Twitter; in the mean time, study ahead how to get there with the "Google Street View." Finally on the day, get great offers with a coupon and enjoy your outing with your friends! Only supports Japanese.
